About Us
Difference
 
History
 
Mission
 
Facilities
 
Team

PNP Pharmaceuticals is a unique contract manufacturer of nutraceutical and pharmaceutical products. We are a highly accredited company with an emphasis on quality and service, on a level which sets us apart from our competitor. From the minute, you enter our facility or speak to us via telephone our commitment to excellence is clearly evident.

We are simply different, from our unrivaled service, knowledge and expertise, and overall quality, to our professional yet friendly demeanor. We are a young, energetic, and exciting company that strives to be the best at what we do; manufacture quality products.

Mr. Glen North founded the company in 1999 under the name Pacific Natural Products Inc. PNP has rapidly grown to become one of Canada’s largest contract manufacturers of nutritional supplements. In 2007 the company changed it’s name to PNP Pharmaceuticals Inc. to better reflect the current scope of services provided. Today PNP Pharmaceuticals manufactures Nutraceuticals and OTC products for markets worldwide.
“Our customer service shall be fair, expedient, without prejudice, and ever present”

PNP Pharmaceuticals' commitment to excellence begins with genuine dedication of each and every employee. We diligently perform our specific duties without compromise to ensure all products manufactured are of the finest quality possible.

We at PNP Pharmaceuticals are strong in our convictions to see our commitments are never compromised, for that reason we promise that ethics will always take precedent over profits.

- Glen North, President & CEO

Our newly constructed facility is over 78,000 square feet in size located in Burnaby, British Columbia, Canada. We are 15 minutes from Vancouver International Airport and only 20 minutes from downtown Vancouver.

Our manufacturing facility meets or exceeds all GMP requirements and includes:

Negative pressure Hepa filtered air throughout all production rooms to eliminate cross contamination.
All plant air is humidity monitored and controlled to eliminate mold and bacteria growth and maintain material stability
Production area air is supplied with 100% sterile air via UV light system.
All plant air is temperature controlled
Production area floors are chemical resistant MMA with coved corners for durability and ease of cleaning.
Walls are non-porous fiberglass or custom paint for easy cleaning
Refrigeration and freezing units.
24 hour security surveillance, HD internet camera and alarm monitored

Our facility was designed for function as well as employee comfort therefore extra glass was incorporated wherever possible to give the production area a staff friendly feel.

PNP Pharmaceuticals has brought together a talented team of professionals that collectively bring a wealth of knowledge from their specific fields of expertise.

See our team
Services
Coating
The coating of a tablet, softgel or two piece hard gelatin capsule offers many advantages, such as a higher physiochemical stability, better compliance and increased therapeutic efficacy of the active ingredient. Our expertise in coating can offer the following possibilities for your product:
GI targeting (gastroresistance, release in the colon)
Protective coatings (taste and odour masking, protect against moisture)
Elegant appearance with a colour coating of choice
Our coating system allows us to film/enteric coat tablets, softgel capsules, two piece hard gelatin capsules or two piece vegetarian capsules.  We can colour coat your product to match an existing product colour or develop a new colour to your specifications.
Encapsulation
We are industry leaders in encapsulation with the ability to produce over 10 million capsules per day. We have all new high speed fully automatic as well as semi-automatic capsules fillers to do both large and small runs. Our extensive capsule filling equipment allows us to produce capsule sizes #4, #3, #2, #1, “0” and “00”. We can offer a choice of colour or have your logo printed on the capsule. Capsules are available in vegetarian, bovine gelatin or porcine gelatin, and Halal and Kosher certified if required. Two piece hard gelatin or vegetarian capsules are the preferred and most common solid dosage form in the nutraceutical industry, because they have some advantages. Two-piece capsules are preferred by consumers, get products to market faster and use less excipients.
Tableting

Tablets comprise the largest group of delivery systems for all prescribed and over-the-counter (OTC) medications. Reasons for the popularity of tablets include the ease of accurate dosage and the good physical/chemical stability because of low moisture content, as well as the competitive unit production costs and the easily identifiable, elegant distinctive appearance.

We have the expertise and equipment to make almost any shape and size tablet you require. Some of the most common types of tablets we manufacture are:

Immediate release, coated or uncoated
Modified release, coated or uncoated
Effervescent (dissolved/suspended in water before drinking)
Chewable (chewed before swallowing)

We can custom design tablet tooling for specific shape or size along with company logo or product name embossed into the tablet.

Blister Packaging & Cartoning

We have a high speed blister packaging line that can accommodate all of your blister packaging needs. Our online printer can print your logo, company name or anything else you require on the back of each blister pack. We can produce a custom blister card to your requirements with little lead time.

Our high speed cartoner is capable of erecting the carton, inserting the blister card(s) or bottle, inserting a pamphlet, printing LOT/Exp, and sealing the carton at a speed of one every second. We can assist you in design and printing of the carton or just let us do it all.

Bottling & Labelling
We have three fully automatic high speed bottling lines that can accommodate any size or shape of bottle and/or cap. Our lines include bottle descrambling, high speed counting, dessicant dispenser, cotton inserter, capper, induction sealer, neckbander and automated shrink wrapper.
Pouching & Sachet Filling – Powder, Liquid, Capsules and Tablets
We have the ability to produce single serving pouches or sample packs with powder or multiple capsules or tablets in large or small volume. Our pouching equipment can accommodate a minimum pouch size of 63mm x 94 mm (2.5” x 3.75”) to a maximum size of 112mm x 150mm (4.5” x 6”). Our equipment has the versatility to pouch in a variety of material including foil, paper, and poly. We can liquid fill custom shaped sachets for easy single dose applications, such as cough syrup or energy gels.
Stick Packaging
Our high-speed stick packaging equipment can produce over 800,000 sticks per day and accurately dose both pharmaceutical and nutraceutical powders. Stick packs are ideally suited for single dose applications from 0.5 grams to 10 grams, depending on material bulk density.
Formulation

To consistently produce a product of high standard you must first begin with a Master Formula. A quality Master Formula may take extensive R&D to ensure the formulation meets all specifications. A correctly formulated Master formula ensures that the product: meets all product specifications (dosage, disintegration, stability, etc.), can run successfully on specific equipment, has an elegant appearance, can be readily duplicated.

PNP Pharmaceuticals has the expertise to formulate most any dry dosage form, such as, capsule, tablet, and powder.  From the simple to the most complex formulations our experienced formulators can confidently fulfill your requirements.

Blending

The blending stage is a critical area of production, for without a homogenous blend the finished product will not meet specifications. PNP Pharmaceuticals employees several blenders that are specifically designed and validated for different applications.  Our blending equipment includes:

large ribbon blenders - with a maximum blend capacity of 1500kg (3300lb).
large V-blenders - with a maximum blend capacity of 500kg (1100lb).
small offset twin cone blender - with a maximum blend capacity of 100kg (220lb).

All blenders are custom manufactured from high quality stainless steel and meet or exceed all GMP requirements.

Quality Control & Compliance

Speed, efficiency and service are meaningless without the most important component of all, QUALITY. At PNP Pharmaceuticals we are always industry leaders in implementing new methods and technology to ensure quality is ever-present.

As a GMP company, ALL vendors are rigorously screened and qualified before given an approved vendor status.
All incoming raw material is immediately received into quarantine and immediately sampled.
Sampled raw material is sent to accredited third party laboratory and tested for identification, potency, chemical and microbial contaminants. Results are analyzed to our client’s specifications and either approved or rejected.
Approved material is electronically released into inventory to await manufacturing.
As material is dispensed for manufacturing our computer system electronically monitors the material, checking for correct raw material, quantity dispensed and valid expiration. This system reduces the chance of human error.
Throughout the manufacturing process, our QA/QC personnel performs in-process sampling and in-house testing to ensure uniformity to our specifications. In-house testing may include but not limited to disintegration, hardness, friability, and weight variation. The product in bulk form is tested by third party laboratory according to applicable specifications. If all tests meet applicable specifications, the manufactured product is released for packaging or shipment in bulk.
During the packaging phase, again our QA/QC personnel perform in-process sampling and testing (such as fill accuracy, integrity of seal, label verification, and correctness of lot number and expiry date) to ensure conformity to specifications. If all specifications are met the product will undergo finished product testing before being released for shipment.
Site Licence (Can be provided upon request)

Under the NHPD regulations set forth by Health Canada all manufacturers of natural health products must have a valid Site Licence to fabricate and/or package nutritional products. PNP Pharmaceuticals holds the honor of being one of the first manufacturers to be issued a Site Licence in Canada.

Establishment Licence (Can be provided upon request)

Regulations set forth by Health Canada state all manufacturers of drug products must have a valid Establishment Licence to fabricate and/or package drug products. PNP Pharmaceuticals holds a valid Establishment Licence permitting fabrication and packaging of such products.

Precursor A Licence (Can be provided upon request)

For the fabrication and packaging of ephedrine and pseudoephedrine products.

Gluten Free Certified (Can be provided upon request)

The GF logo stands for the independent verification of quality, integrity, and purity of products. Products carrying the GF logo represents the unmatched reliability for meeting strict gluten-free standards. GFCO is one of the leading gluten-free certification programs in the world.

Organic Certified (Can be provided upon request)

Pro-Cert Organic Systems Ltd. (Pro-Cert) is one of North America’s foremost national certifier’s of organic products. With a client base including producers, processors and traders from across Canada and the United-States of America, Pro-Cert has become one of the most prominent players in the certification field.

BRCGS Certified (Can be provided upon request)

BRC initially developed its Global Standard for Food Safety in order to help the food industry meet legislative requirements of the EU General Product Safety Directive and the UK Food Safety Act. This standard is recognized as a GFSI (Global Food Safety Initiative) benchmarked food safety scheme and has been accepted by 8 major international retailers: Carefour, Tesco, ICA, Metro, Migros, Ahold, Walmart and Delhaize.

SFCR Certified (Can be provided upon request)

Safe Food for Canadians Act and Regulation came into force on January 15, 2019 to strength Canada’s world class food safety system. The SFCR represent a proactive response to new threats to food safety, evolving consumer preferences and supply chains, and prevention-focused international food safety standards. This applies to food for human consumption that is imported, exported, or in interprovincially traded for commercial purposes.

What Makes Us Special
Rigorous Quality Assurance and testing processes for delicious and trusted sport nutrition products.

Fit Foods Ltd is a Canadian company and a world-class manufacturer of sports nutrition and healthy-living powder supplements. We apply our founding principles of promoting healthier, happier lives to everything we do. This means we bring our very best practices and processes so that our consumers can be confident when they purchase our brands. We are proud of bringing superior taste and cutting-edge formulations to over 80 countries around the world. By using high-quality ingredients and products we can ensure that ever product delivers on its promise and is delicious to consume.

Our Team

Our great culture facilitates cross-functional work and enlivening problem solving. Learn more about how our teams inspire the best work.

Manufacturing

Every scoop matters. Our manufacturing team combines scientific precision with genuine care, crafting premium sports supplements in our state-of-the-art facilities. We're proud to create products that help athletes and fitness enthusiasts reach their full potential.

Distribution

When you're committed to your fitness goals, timing is everything. Our distribution team ensures your supplements arrive fresh and ready when you need them. We treat every package as if it's going to our own training partner, because in a way, it is.

Research & Development

Passion meets science in our R&D lab. This dedicated team of sports nutrition experts and researchers works tirelessly to develop supplements that truly deliver. We believe everyone deserves access to effective, science-backed formulas that support their fitness journey.

Sales

Our sales team doesn't just know our products—they live the fitness lifestyle. As active members of the fitness community, they understand your goals and challenges firsthand. Count on them to help you find the right supplements for your personal journey, because your success is our success.

Marketing

The fitness journey is personal, and our marketing team gets it. They're the storytellers who share real success stories from our community and spread our message of accessible, science-backed nutrition. Because everyone deserves to feel confident in their supplement choices.

People & Culture

Walk through our doors and you'll feel it—a culture where wellness isn't just what we sell, it's how we live. Our People & Culture team nurtures an environment where team members thrive, grow, and support each other.

Everyday Innovation

As a world-class frozen food manufacturer, we have over 40 years of experience developing a menu of extraordinary frozen meals, soups and snacks perfect for maximizing business growth, financial performance and customer loyalty.

Contact Us Today
About Us

It is no coincidence that Plats du Chef was founded by a professional chef. The company was established in Montreal in 1981, with a focus on creating high-quality appetizers for local grocers. The business expanded rapidly and by 1994, it had become a leading international frozen food company offering a wide range of delicious meals, dips, soups and snacks. Today, having earned a reputation as expert manufacturers and innovators, we remain passionate food lovers at heart.

Industry Partners

Our talented team turns culinary ideas into delectable realities and pairs them with our frozen food technology. We work closely with our business partners to help achieve their goals and enhance their growth.

Retail &
Club

From irresistible meals and snacks to seasonal offerings, we offer the flavours, quality, convenience and resources to turn consumers into loyal customers of your private label brands.

Contract
Manufacturing

Our state-of-the-art facilities allow us to deliver the manufacturing expertise, insights and technology to ensure the success of your frozen food business.

CAREER OPPORTUNITIES
Working at Plats du Chef

Beyond cutting-edge manufacturing, innovation and frozen food technology, Plats du Chef offers exceptional collaboration and support. As part of the C.H. Guenther & Son family, our head office is in Montreal, where our dedicated team is united by a shared love of food. We work in a friendly, creative and inclusive environment where we grow together by developing great-tasting products that excite and inspire.

Explore Our Careers
WE ARE THE BEST AT WHAT WE DO
A Portfolio of
Extraordinary Products

In addition to complete meals, we offer single-serve dips, soups, cereals, egg-based favourites such as quiches and baked eggs, as well as microwaveable and specialty snacks and appetizers made with phyllo and puff pastry dough. Our products serve up the tastes, aromas and pleasures that turn everyday consumers into loyal customers. All our products are prepared and frozen immediately to ensure the freshness and flavour that make them a staple on the shelves of homes and grocery stores everywhere.

FROM SEA TO PLATE



We are a family owned business providing quality fresh and frozen seafood.

We are committed to understanding our customers’ needs in order to bring value to their business.



	

Our business has been built on sourcing quality seafood and providing premium service to our customers for over 35 years.

Located on the shores of Cape Breton Island, on Canada’s East Coast, we are on the doorstep of the pristine cold waters of the Canadian North Atlantic. We draw on the experience of a centuries-old seaside way of working and living to provide our customers with a safe, healthy, and quality produced product.

Premium Seafoods Group specializes in fresh and frozen seafood. The majority of our seafood is either harvested by us or purchased directly from local fishers. We specialize in fresh North Atlantic seafood including Atlantic Snow Crab, Canadian Lobster, Northern Shrimp and Ocean Perch.

Since 1984 Premium Seafoods Group has grown to numerous companies employing over 200 workers, buying and or processing in excess of 15 million pounds of seafood annually for sale to the world.

Our Method
Giannone Poultry
Why Giannone
Home
Careers
Contact us
Français
Simply
THE BEST CHICKEN!
The Giannone Method
Selection
A quality chicken starts with the best egg.

To produce the best tasting, best quality chicken, Giannone oversees every detail, from the egg to the grocery shelf or restaurant table. We choose our chicken producers with care.

Raising chicken
The best quality chicken comes from the finest raising method.

It is said that we are what we eat, and this is true for animals too. Our requirements cover the kind of food that chickens are fed and the overall conditions under which they are raised. We also promote animal welfare and humane care so that we may offer our customers chickens that were raised under the best conditions.

Transportation and slaughtering
By respecting the animal, we respect the consumer.

The transportation of live chickens from the producer to the slaughterhouse is a critical step in the whole transformation process. We make sure that the chickens are transported under the best conditions. Handling and slaughtering operations are conducted in a matter to reduce stress to a minimum. Respect for the animal welfare is as much a question of ethics as it is of quality meat.

Our chilling process
By remaining dry, the meat remains wholesome and flavourful.

With our totally unique chilling method, we have perfected a 100% air-chilling process that ensures greater food safety and superior natural flavor. Unlike other methods employed in North America, there is no added water in Giannone chicken. Our chilling process reduces the risk of contamination and conserves the meat's natural juices, preserving also its precious enzymes and proteins.

Vacuum-seal technology
For the ultimate in appearance, flavour, shelf-life and food safety

Take advantage of a product that is fully vacuum-sealed over the entire surface in contact with the tray. In addition to improving presentation and optimizing the conservation of every cut, this method enhances flavour. Vacuum-sealed packaging serves to accentuate the action of the seasonings or marinade.

Custom products for retailers and restaurants
The best chicken is good; presented your way is better.

We have innovated to the point that we had to coin the term "value-added processing plant" to define what we do. We are forming more and more product development partnerships in areas of cuts, recipes, packaging and shelf display. This all-inclusive approach means we can create custom, value-added products for retailers and restaurants.

Sourced from local, safety-conscious farms and rooted in close-knit Saskatchewan communities, our high-quality, ethical, free-run chickens come with the assurance of family values, safety, and trust

Committed to Quality and Community

We source our live product exclusively from Saskatchewan, with 85% of our poultry farms within an hour’s drive of Saskatoon. This close relationship with local farmers ensures the freshest, highest quality poultry, fed on wholesome, wheat-based diets.

Read More
Local Impact, Global Reach

Prairie Pride Natural Foods Ltd. is a privately owned poultry processing company, located in Saskatoon, SK, supplying fresh and frozen poultry products to customers located in Saskatchewan and across Canada. Prairie Pride is also actively involved in the exporting of poultry products to a variety of countries around the world. Currently 14% of our production is sent to customers outside of Canada.

Industry Leaders

Since beginning operations, in Jan of 2006, Prairie Pride has grown to become one of the major partners in the Chicken Industry of Saskatchewan and is currently the largest processor of chicken, turkey and breeder fowl in the province.

Innovation

Prairie Pride Natural Foods Ltd. operates one of Canada’s most modern hatcheries, located in Grandora, SK, where we employ 19 full time employees. The hatchery currently has capacity to hatch up to 500,000 chicks per week and the ability to double that amount when the need arises.

Operational Efficiency

Prairie Pride’s 110,000 sq. ft. federally Inspected processing facility, located in Saskatoon, SK, employs over 300 full time staff and has a current capacity to process, package and ship 750,000 chickens per week. The plant design also allows for the ability to process breeder fowl and turkeys.

Our Mission
Providing quality produce for Canadian families

Prairie Pride stands at the forefront of poultry production, dedicated to serving grocery stores and exporting quality products globally. Our partnership with local poultry producers and the Chicken Farmers of Saskatchewan is the cornerstone of our success.

Quality
Responsibility
Reliability
Trust
Ensuring Excellence

Prairie Pride rigorously adheres to the highest production standards through strong partnerships with federal and provincial agencies. These partnerships and certifications ensure the delivery of fresh, safe, and superior quality chicken while fostering an industry focused on consumer needs, innovation, and environmental responsibility.

NOTRE COMPAGNIE
Montpak International est d'abord et avant tout une famille et nous prenons donc à cœur notre mission d'honorer cette appartenance afin d'offrir nos clients à travers le monde un service exceptionnel et des produits de haute qualité. Nous nous soucions profondément de la qualité de nos produits, de notre capacité d’approvisionnement et de la continuité de nos services pour que nos clients puissent savourer nos produits de veau et d'agneau tout au long de l'année.

Notre expertise nous permet d'offrir une assurance de qualité du plus haut niveau. Ceci est important pour nous… notre réputation en dépend. Notre engagement pour satisfaire nos clients demeure en tout temps au plus haut de nos priorités. Pour une entreprise de notre taille, nous sommes fiers d'offrir à tous nos clients un service personnalisé.
 
Produit avec soin et fierté au Québec, Canada depuis 1959.

GAGNANT DU GRAND PRIX CANADIEN DES NOUVEAUX PRODUITS
Nous sommes très heureux d'annoncer que le veau Prêt à Cuire de Famille Fontaine a gagné deux prestigieux prix au Grand Prix Canadien des Produits Nouveaux du Conseil Canadien du commerce de détail.
VOIR PLUS


Transformation de viande de veau et d’agneau
Société familiale établie depuis près de 60 ans, Montpak International est une entreprise de transformation et de commercialisation de produits de veau et d’agneau à valeur ajoutée. Faisant affaire tant l’échelle provinciale qu’internationale, nous transformons des produits de veau et d’agneau à destination des distributeurs, fournisseurs et grossistes du secteur agroalimentaire du Québec, et du monde. Nos produits, frais ou congelés, alimentent restaurants, boucheries, épiceries, traiteurs et autres détaillants. Chef de file de l’industrie, notre récent partenariat avec Délimax nous a permis d’élargir notre réseau de distribution et de nous hisser au rang de plus important transformateur de veau et d’agneau en Amérique du Nord. Au Québec, le secteur agroalimentaire est un pilier économique de plusieurs régions. En tant que transformateur de viande de veau et d’agneau de classe mondiale, nous nous faisons donc un devoir, en vertu de cette entente, de faire rayonner plus que jamais le savoir-faire des producteurs québécois et d’assurer notre compétitivité sur l’échiquier mondial. Montpak International, produit avec soin et fierté au Québec, Canada, depuis 1959.

Welcome to Bakestone Brothers, 

where baking is our passion and providing you with the most delicious baked goods using only the finest ingredients is our commitment. Our baking family, operated by the Pita Bread Factory, is proud to provide you with bread products and baked goods that can be found in your favourite stores and restaurants across the country, many in organic and gluten-free options. We invite you to learn more about who we are and what we do. 

Our Story
Our History

The old saying “Mother knows best” sure came true for us! Our story began after Fady Hayek and his family moved to Vancouver from Ottawa, sold their restaurant business and were looking for a new opportunity. His mother teasingly suggested opening a bakery to sell pitas made from an old family recipe, and thank goodness 25-year-old Fady took her advice to heart. Over thirty years later the Pita Bread Factory, under the Bakestone Brothers and 24th Avenue labels, continues to thrive. Today, we are a certified organic bakery that offers a wide array of ethnic bread products and baked goods that are sold throughout Canada and parts of the United States under our own labels and the private labels of many happy retail partners.

While our origins began in 1984 with pita hand-made in a small commercial kitchen, we now proudly offer a wide range of wholesome products from our certified and sophisticated manufacturing operation that still relies on the traditions of our artisanal roots. Even though we have grown in size, our Bakestone Brothers family continues to create the finest baked goods for your family, using timeless techniques and the legacy of the Hayek family’s commitment to fresh, wholesome products made in the spirit of Mama’s kitchen. We take our responsibility to our family and yours seriously, so you can always count on fresh and fabulous food for your table.

Our Pledge to You

At Bakestone Brothers we know that while the kitchen is said to be the heart of the home, fresh bread is its soul. This is why our family is committed to providing your family with a reason to gather around the table by baking the highest quality products, created from the finest ingredients to ensure that every bite you take is delicious. Each of our mouth watering recipes is fashioned by dedicated artisans in our BRC Global Standards-certified kitchens, who have sourced the best methods from bread baking cultures around the world. As a certified organic facility, we also provide product options that are gluten-free to ensure that all of our bread-loving customers can enjoy their favourite baked goods regardless of dietary needs. Providing you with the finest flavours, textures and unparalleled quality is our promise grounded in the tradition of integrity and customer service we have taken pride in since 1984.

Our People

The Bakestone Brothers’ steadfast commitment to deliver first rate breads and baked goods begins with our staff; they are the people in our kitchens and offices who we are proud to call important members of the Bakestone Brothers family. We have a dedicated team of highly trained artisans and administrative staff who continue our proud tradition of family; in fact, several members of our team have worked with us for over twenty years!

Our professional Bakestone Brothers family is serious about bread and baking and we go to great lengths to provide them with the best work environment possible. We love to see our team flourish creating and delivering the mouth-watering tastes our customers love to your favourite stores and restaurants when they are fresh out of the oven. We get excited about what we do and take pride in our products, so you can be guaranteed of quality, wholesome products on your table.

Our Vision, Mission and Values

Bakestone Brothers is a leader in providing products of exceptional quality to our customers across the world.

Our mission is to manufacture and deliver high quality baked goods that exceed the expectations of our customers in terms of delivery, specification and price. We accomplish this by cultivating a caring environment where our dedicated and passionate team relentlessly service our customers.

We are committed to:

SAFETY: is our number one priority, in our workplace and in the goods we produce
QUALITY: producing top quality products with high performing teams
CUSTOMER SERVICE: outstanding, internal and external
PRODUCT INNOVATION
GROWTH: we will grow our customer base, production capabilities and financial bottom line
ACCOUNTABILITY: we are accountable to each other
PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT

Alfred Couture Ltée
Accueil

Depuis 1945, notre mission est de produire une moulée de qualité supérieure afin d’améliorer de façon significative les performances de nos clients et de nos élevages corporatifs tout en respectant notre entourage, les normes environnementales et les valeurs familiales qui nous habitent.

Vivre l’agriculture avec passion : voici la raison d’être d’Alfred Couture Ltée depuis maintenant plus de 75 ans! Avec une équipe de plus de 180 employés, c’est la 4e génération de la famille Couture qui a débuté son implication dans l’entreprise qu’Alfred a modestement créée en 1945. Les activités de l’entreprise sont les suivantes : fabrication de moulée pour animaux avec sa meunerie située à Lévis (secteur Pintendre), production porcine (de type naisseur-finisseur) avec ses 11 maternités, pouponnières et engraissements, production avicole (œufs de consommation, poulet de chair, dindons).

Afin de soutenir ses activités, l’entreprise effectue son transport de porcs, de moulée, de purin et possède la machinerie ainsi que les divers équipements pour effectuer les travaux sur les fermes et sur ses terres. Une quincaillerie a également été ouverte par la famille Couture en 1990, desservant ainsi une clientèle locale et lui permettant de répondre à ses nombreux besoins.

La qualité, notre priorité

Un produit de qualité nécessite quelques éléments essentiels : des ingrédients de qualité supérieure, un contrôle de qualité rigoureux et des pratiques de sécurité et salubrité irréprochables.

Chez PLB International, c’est la combinaison de tous ces facteurs qui rend notre approche gagnante et nous permet d’offrir à tous nos clients des produits promettant qualité et sécurité à tous coups.

En savoir plus
Découvrez nos gammes!

1st Choice Nutrition

Nos formules 1st Choice Nutrition sont développées par des experts en nutrition et répondent aux conditions de santé spécifiques de votre animal et aux différents stades de sa vie.

Pronature

Inspirée par la nature et l’amour pour les animaux, Pronature offre deux gammes de produits distinctifs qui sont à la fois savoureux, sains et nutritifs.

Lily & Jax

Notre gamme Lily & Jax se distingue par des recettes simples, savoureuses qui conviennent à tous les stades de vie, et ce... à bon marché!

Une entreprise familiale d'exception à l'écoute de vos animaux
PLB International, une grande famille avant tout

Faire carrière chez PLB International, c'est travailler au sein d'une famille dynamique, déterminée et qualifiée.

Partnering for safe, healthy diets and a sustainable world

Avena is a specialty miller that provides food, pet food and nutraceutical manufacturers with sustainably grown and milled purity protocol oat and functional gluten-free pulse ingredients.

Pulses and Pulse Ingredients

Bean, chickpea, lentil and pea flours, cracked pulses and grit.

Whole and split yellow and green peas, whole green lentils, chickpeas.

LEARN MORE

Purity Protocol Oat Ingredients

Whole grain rolled oats, quick flakes, steel cuts, groats and flours.

GFCO Certified gluten-free (<10ppm), glyphosate-residue free.

LEARN MORE

Specialty Milled Ingredients (RTE)

Ready-to-eat functional pulse flours and natural dietary fibers.

Egg and starch replacers. Pea hull fibers (TDF 90%) and organic oat hull fiber (TDF 87%).

LEARN MORE

Quality Ingredients​

Avena is a specialty miller with a strong history of sustainability and reputation for quality and innovation. We are committed to bringing gluten-free, functional pulse and oat ingredients from the Canadian Prairies to customers throughout the world.

gluten-free and allergy-friendly
clean label and clear label
fully traceable from farm to finished product
certified organic or conventional
non-GMO
Kosher
Halal
ready-to-cook (RTC) or ready-to-eat (RTE) with a validated kill-step

LEARN MORE

Grown with Care

With facilities located in the heart of the Canadian Prairies, Avena is rooted in the world’s largest growing regions for oats and pulses. We partner with farmers who share our commitment to providing safe, quality ingredients to food, beverage, nutraceutical and petfood manufacturing companies globally.

MEET OUR FARMERS

From the Ground Up

At Avena, we collaborate with all members of the supply chain to produce and process food ingredients in an environmentally sustainable way. We continue to develop regenerative agriculture programs with our partners.

LEARN MORE

Providing Solutions

The NEW Avena Solutions Portal is a backstage pass to our  resource centre with focused topics, information, research and data to assist food industry professionals in their product development goals and marketing strategies.

LEARN MORE  CONTACT US

Established in 1964

Winkler Meats: Premium Quality, Community Driven

At Winkler Meats, we are committed to excellence in every cut of meat we produce. As a federally inspected abattoir regulated by the Canadian Foods Inspection Agency and adhering to the HACCP program, we ensure each product meets the highest standards of quality. Our gluten-free meats, made entirely from Canadian-sourced ingredients without byproducts or MSG, are enjoyed across Western Canada—available in various chain and independent stores and featured in top restaurants nationwide.

Proud Partners of Canadian Sports

We take pride in supporting our local and national sports teams, fostering community spirit and athletic excellence. From the Winnipeg Jets, Blue Bombers, and Goldeyes to our 2024 MJHL champions, the Winkler Flyers, we stand side by side with athletes who share our dedication to quality and performance.

Engaging and Supporting Our Community

Since 2000, we have collaborated with the MCC Meat Canning Project, among other local initiatives, demonstrating our ongoing commitment to give back to the community that supports us. These partnerships not only enhance our operational standards but also bring us closer to the people we serve.

Why Choose Winkler Meats?

Choose Winkler Meats for a taste of 100% Canadian quality. Our wieners, smokies, and sausages are crafted with care, guaranteeing a premium product that reflects our dedication to excellence and community values.

TRANSFORM YOUR CAREER

Proud to transform it all

To build a greener tomorrow for future generations.

Our expertise: reclaiming agri-food industry by-products and transforming them into industrial ingredients that are used to create everyday items.

At Sanimax, we make every effort to transform all of the materials we collect.

The agri-food industry generates huge quantities of unconsumed by-products. Sanimax reclaims and transforms them into ingredients that are useful for several industries. Our actions, which are at the very heart of the circular economy, give new life to more than 2 million tons of organic materials each year.

Transforming it all in 3 simple steps
Reclaim

Each day, our Transportation and Logistics team collects agri-food by-products from more than 25,000 sites across the Americas.

Renew

Our automated facilities are equipped with sophisticated control systems that produce high-quality ingredients to be used in a wide range of industries.

Return

The value-added goods manufactured by Sanimax are returned to companies that, in turn, use them to make everyday items.

Careers that make a difference
Careers
Concerned about how human activity is affecting the environment? At Sanimax, we work hard to minimize its impact every day.

We are your wholesale baked good partners, providing you with the product delivery you need across the continent! We aren’t just a large-scale bakery, we are a food processing and manufacturing solutions provider!

We want you to have peace of mind as you work with us, knowing that we’ll always get you the products you need when you need them. Missed fulfillment rates isn’t in our vocabulary, if you need a quality Sunrise Bakery product, we’ll ensure it’s delivered to you in full, every time!

Deep in Tradition

Sunrise Bakery began as a simple, door-to-door bakery in 1963. Over the decades the bakery has evolved from a neighborhood bakery to manufacturing for some of North America’s most recognizable food brands and shipping millions of units a year. What hasn’t changed, however, is Sunrise Bakery’s commitment to taking care of our customers and our staff members.

Our team of over 100 dedicated staff is committed to your success and goes above and beyond to make sure you receive your products on time and at the quality level you expect. Many of our team members have been with us for decades, and this is because we work together, as a family! No matter how large or small Sunrise Bakery has been, at our heart we are a family business who is built on hard work and quality service.

Interested in working with Sunrise bakery?

50 years of Health, Innovation, and Nutrition
CELEBRATE WITH US

For over 50 years Sunny Crunch Foods has designed and developed healthy whole foods for some of the largest brands in the world. We create food that is healthy, nutritious and great tasting. From granola cereal to keto bars, we source raw ingredients that promote health and vitality.

Our methods are scientific and uncompromising. We are among the few manufacturers that use full-time pharmacists and food scientists as part of our team. Our standards are among the highest in the world with A ratings and certifications. When it comes to finding your healthy whole food manufacturing partner, look no further than Sunny Crunch Foods.

One Of The Biggest Innovators In Health Foods
The Right Ingredients Make All The Difference

We source raw ingredients from around the world. From high-quality ingredients come high-quality foods. Our raw materials are picked at the peak of freshness, therefore, locking in their nutritional value. From our family table to yours – just good food, made naturally.

Our Story.

Idaho Pacific Holdings, Inc. is a family of potato dehydration companies spanning North America – from the nutrient rich farmlands of Idaho to the San Luis Valley of Colorado to the red sandy soils of Prince Edward Island, Canada.  Our factories are situated in prime potato producing areas because that is where it all begins.  We manufacture potato products for the world using the best raw potatoes in North America.

Our Company began in 1987 in the farming community of Ririe, Idaho, which today remains our Company headquarters.  Over the past 35 years we have grown from our roots in Ririe, Idaho to being one of the largest potato dehydration companies in North America consisting of four manufacturing facilities. Our manufacturing facilities utilize state-of-the-art equipment and processes which allow the ability to produce a wide variety of dehydrated potato products.  Our highly talented team is ready to provide the technical know-how to support our customers’ needs.

Potatoes, whether eaten fresh, frozen or dehydrated, are the #1 consumed vegetable in North America.  We are proud to be an integral part of the potato industry supporting the farmers in our local communities, the foodservice operations serving school lunches, cafeterias, nursing homes and restaurants, and food manufacturers that utilize our ingredients to make a wide array of delicious products.  The versatile potato with its nutritious attributes has many applications and we stand ready to assist you in your current dehydrated potato needs and to help you innovate the products for tomorrow.

Our Little Story

Flash forward to today.  Olivier’s utilizes the latest technologies and is a thriving modern operation.  While we have gained the advantages of modernization, we have not lost the old time flavor and spirit that started with Gaspard.

2019

Gaspard Olivier first fired up the copper kettles back in 1909 in Calgary , Alberta , Canada. Establishing a bake shop in the heart of downtown, Gaspard soon expanded his bakery offerings to include candy and ice cream. Known as "The Geisha", the brightly decorated shop became a popular social gathering place for Calgary residents on a Saturday evening.

1909

Gaspard sold the original shop in 1913, and soon opened another candy shop in Medicine Hat. By 1924 he was back in Calgary where he set up a candy factory and retail store just two blocks from his original location at 1005 1St. S.W.

1924

Producing sweets for his faithful customers, Gaspard continues on for over 62 years in the candy business before finally hanging up the apron in 1971.

1971

Flash forward to today.  Olivier’s utilizes the latest technologies and is a thriving modern operation.  While we have gained the advantages of modernization, we have not lost the old time flavor and spirit that started with Gaspard.

2019

HOME

Calgary Italian Bakery, a family owned and operated bakery and deli founded in 1962 is committed to providing quality products that meet customer specifications. We are committed to travel along the path of integrity without looking back, adjusting to an ever-changing road while holding on to our unchanging principles.

Quality is our measure of success as we continue to produce consistent and safe products. We continue to strive for excellence and to lead the market in quality initiatives. We place a strong emphasis on food safety through implementation of a HACCP program, employee training and controlled activities and work processes.

We believe that quality is a joint effort and every person working with us directly impacts the quality of our product. It is the responsibility of all employees to conduct their activities in a manner that will ensure that all food safety and quality parameters are met.

Our promise to you and your family is the same promise we made to our family – to never do anything we couldn’t tell our Mothers about.

How It All Began

Reinhard Springmann, his wife Gertrud, and their two sons, Markus and Peter, created Country Prime Meats in 1996 in the realization of Reinhard’s lifelong dream of having freshly-grown food on the table for his family. For 25 years, Country Prime Meats has remained committed to creating wholesome meat snacks using local, natural ingredients and preserving the environment by using safe farming practices and carbon-neutral facilities.

Our Story
We produce products that we
are proud to provide
to our families.
Premium Quality

We use only the highest quality domestically sourced ingredients, carefully selected to ensure delicious flavour & freshness. When you taste these snacks, you immediately notice the quality difference.

About Us
Carbon Neutral

Surrounded by nature, Country Prime Meats recognizes the importance of preserving the environment. Our commitment to the environment begins with our facility which is designed to be carbon neutral and fossil fuels friendly.

Our Facility

We manufacture and distribute the finest quality Meat Snacks while conforming to the highest levels of food safety regulations and demonstrating our commitment to continuous improvement in good agricultural practices and manufacturing principles.

Irresistible Indulgence

Everywhere you go, enjoy delicious and tender meat snacks! Country Prime Meats products are made using natural ingredients with no additives, hormones, artificial colours, or flavours. Naturally smoked, high in protein, gluten, and lactose-free, our meat snacks have zero trans-fats and no added MSG.

Cap Dauphin Fishermen's Cooperative

Cap Dauphin Fishermen's Cooperative has been supplying Canada and the Eastern Seaboard of the United States with live lobsters of the highest quality for more than 30 years.

 

At Cap Dauphin Fishermen's Cooperative we understand that our clients want the best and the freshest products. As such, we work with state-of the-art equipment, from aquariums on each fishing vessel to a sophisticated irrigation system to oxygenate and refrigerate our live lobster pounds in order to obtain this quality. We aim to satisfy our customers with our quality products and excellent service.

 

Cap Dauphin Fishermen's Cooperative is a member of AQIP 

(Québec Fish Processors Association)

Welcome to Farmfed

Farm Fed, a division of K&R Poultry Ltd, is a poultry processing plant located in the scenic Fraser Valley. Since being formed in 1995 we have focused on producing a high quality product and as a result our products are in high demand. We are a federally inspected plant and are able to ship inter-provincially and internationally. In addition, our plant is HACCP certified.  Our main focus is on the main stream processing of chickens, ducks, silkie chickens and turkeys.

Welcome to Schep's Bakeries

Let us introduce you to the best cookie ever made! Syrup Waffles or stroopwafels have been our specialty since 1985. Now, after many years of introducing them to Canadian and American residents they are often referred to as "Waffle Cookies". A Syrup waffle is a cookie baked by being pressed together using an iron, sliced through the middle while they are still steaming hot and filled with a special syrup filling. Using a closely guarded recipe brought over from Holland we at Schep's Bakeries produce a syrup waffle in the same manner as those who started making them in the early 1800's. Still importing many of our specialty ingredients directly from Holland we strive to make the best possible stroopwafels and are delighted when visitors from Holland comment on the great taste of our waffle cookies.

Natural Products. Pharmaceutical Quality.

WN Pharmaceuticals is the parent company of Webber Naturals®, Holista®, MetaSlim®, Multisure®, and WN Pharma®.

Our mission is to provide consumers with unmatched quality, innovation, value, and convenience. We are committed to producing vitamins and supplements of the highest purity and potency while continuing to implement environmentally sound business practices and manufacturing operations.

 

Proudly Canadian since 1948, Webber Naturals is dedicated to delivering superior vitamins and supplements that put your health and the planet first. Our products are sustainably sourced and are of the highest quality, without compromise. That’s Webber Naturals.

With Holista health, you can find natural ways to maintain and enhance your life. We make dietary supplements, creams, and topical products using high-quality ingredients, so you can feel confident that we have your health at heart.

MetaSlim products are nutritional supplements formulated to help achieve weight goals without sacrificing good health. From Apple Cider Vinegar to Green Tea Extract, MetaSlim products are formulated by doctors, and tested thoroughly for purity and potency.

MultiSure offers multivitamins and multiminerals delivered in easy-to-swallow capsules and available in four custom formulations: Men’s MultiSure, Women’s MultiSure, Men 50+, and Women 50+.

WN Pharma products are designed to meet the needs of people looking for easy-to-take vitamins and minerals. Suitable for young adults to seniors, our non-GMO, dye-free, and one-per-day supplements provide the body with daily nutritional insurance for the maintenance of good health. 

Careers

Our care for health and wellness includes our commitment to creating a workplace where employees can flourish, be themselves, and deliver their best work. We are always looking for individuals who possess integrity, believe in teamwork, offer a helping hand, and do the right thing.

ABOUT US

Joriki has been servicing the beverage contract packaging needs of North America for over 20 years. We pride ourselves on delivering high quality, cost effective manufacturing solutions for some of the largest brands in the world. With manufacturing sites across Canada, and capabilities in multiple packaging types, our highly dedicated and knowledgeable team will exceed your expectations.

 

We take pride in understanding your unique needs, and provide a collaborative, creative and innovative solutions.  With a focus on flexible manufacturing, extensive quality controls and value-added distribution services we  are confident we can meet all of your needs.

OUR INNOVATIVE AND FLEXIBLE APPROACH MAKES US AN IDEAL PARTNER. WE ARE ALSO OPEN TO INVEST IN CAPABILITIES TO ENSURE WE CAN MEET ALL OF YOUR NEEDS NOW AND IN THE FUTURE.

Premium IQF Ingredients: Serving Our Customers for 30+ Years

Boosting healthy food consumption, one grain and pulse at a time. With over 150 ingredients and the ability to customize flavor profiles, discover how we can help your business create unforgettable dishes.

Ready to Eat • No Cooking Needed • No Prep Required

GFSI HACCP Certified • Organic • Kosher • Non-GMO • All-Natural

Get in Touch 
Ready to Use and Fully Customizable

Our IQF (individually quick frozen) products are frozen fresh from harvest, preserving their natural state and ensuring peak freshness. They maintain their original quality and flavor from the moment they are cooked.

 Fully Cooked Grains

Frozen to Preserve Freshness

Seenergy Foods is a supplier of natural bulk Individually Quick Frozen (IQF) food ingredients, such as beans, grains, rice and lentils. Our mission is to develop strong partnerships by providing the highest quality ingredients with exceptional service and meticulous attention to detail. We aim to understand your specific needs and goals in order to support the growth of your business.

Explore all our Products 
Delivering Quality

We recognize the significance of staying updated on regulatory standards and quality certifications within the constantly evolving food industry. That’s why we see ourselves as an extension of your Quality Assurance team, offering ready-to-eat IQF ingredients that seamlessly integrate into your production process.

About Us 
More Info

We highly value collaboration with our clients on their research and developmental process in the food industry. We offer sample products and share our expertise to ensure the success of your goals. We are constantly updating our product offerings to stay ahead of market trends and to meet the ever-changing needs of our customers.

FEATURED PRODUCTS
Revolutionary and tasty products!

 

Whether you’re alone or with company, the best way to enjoy winter evenings is certainly around a good meal! Roma is here to offer you tasty, simple, and versatile products, perfect for revolutionizing your traditional recipes! Whatever your choice, discover our best recipes for game nights or cozy evenings here!
DISCOVER OUR NEW PRODUCTS

Our products

OUR FAMILY OF PRODUCTS

Everything you want, we put it at your disposal, for you, your family and you guests.

SAUSAGE

Prepared from an authentic Italian tradition, our tasty juicy sausages will enhance your recipes and grills to perfection! They can be perfectly added to the following dishes: couscous, pasta, soups, subs, rice, and many other recipes on the menu.

CHARCUTERIE

The Roma name is a synonym to tradition, excellence and unique aromas and flavors. The reason is that since producing our very first product, we have never compromised on quality. 100% Quebec made cooked deli or 100% Italian made cured charcuterie, Roma et Roma d’Italia present the passion of generations and the art of excellence.

COOKED SLICED SAUSAGES

When it comes to versatile and flavorful meat options, cooked sliced sausages can elevate your game meal to a whole new level.

PEPPERONI

It’s not a pizza without the fun and zesty flavors of Roma Pepperoni! The famous taste and our family recipes make it the best-selling Pepperoni brand in Quebec and Canada! We have a wide variety of recipes, flavors and formats to please everyone.

Over 75 Years of Excellence!

Naleway Foods is the second largest processor of perogies and panzerottis in Canada.

The company was established as a restaurant in Winnipeg in 1945 by Anne and Leon Naleway. Over the years, Naleway Foods expanded into catering and is now a global manufacturer of perogies and panzerottis.

Naleway Foods concentrates on providing high quality private label and branded products of a specialty nature in the frozen food sector. These products are distributed to food wholesalers and retailers in North America including most major retail chains.

Ocean Pier Inc.
WHO WE ARE
WHAT WE OFFER
SUSTAINABILITY
CONTACT US
Your hand-finished, value added seafood and appetizer solution
Leaders in Quality since 1989.
About Ocean Pier

Ocean Pier is a leading North American innovative processing company specializing in value-added seafood products and appetizers, expanding in poultry, meats and vegetables in the private label sector. Our products are sold throughout the continent, supporting our local and nearby retail partners throughout 30 years with our expertise.


Our mission sets the premium standards in quality first to elevate the at-home consumer experience.

Our robust product catalogue sets us apart with capabilities to customize client needs and put innovation at the forefront. Ocean Pier also holds its owned brand outside the private label sector, supplying restaurants, faculties and establishments in the food service sector.

Ocean Pier is proud to provide healthy food options for our community that play a key part in our market’s food supply chain. All-natural options, clean label decks, and gluten free certifications are amongst many values we hold true at Ocean Pier.

We are a family-owned business and are thankful to continue into a second generation for more value and quality to come.

CONTACT US TO LEARN HOW WE CAN HELP YOU
Quality First.
We offer the freshest of the fresh and the best of the best with our hand-crafted seafood and appetizer products, ensuring premium quality every step of the way. Our unique location allows us to access three of Canada’s most productive fisheries, and we combine this with our exclusive processing services to deliver exceptional quality for every piece.

CONTACT US TO LEARN HOW WE CAN HELP YOU
Our branded products
Lobster Mac & Cheese Bites
Bacon Wrapped Wild Sea Scallops
Split Lobster Tail Skewers
Our Commitment to Sustainability
Committing to sustainable development is a core component of our operational plan and we continuously look for opportunities to preserve long term sustainability within our practices and processes. We are HACCP, MSC, GFSI, GF and SQF certified and continue to invest in long-term sustainable technologies that provide value to both us and our customers.
Contact us
We would love to hear more about your business, answer any questions you have and explore how our services could help you grow.

Or give us a call at 506-532-3010 ext.200

Inscrivez-vous à notre infolettre pour recevoir nos spéciaux du mois!

Des viandes biologiques et naturelles de qualité en direct de la ferme

Soucieux de la qualité de notre viande bio, nous mettons un point d’honneur à respecter toutes les conditions strictes de l’agriculture biologique. Ainsi, nous adaptons l’alimentation de nos animaux chaque saison, et leur apportons une alimentation sans pesticides et sans engrais de synthèse.

Nous les préservons également des organismes génétiquement modifiés, ainsi que des hormones de croissance et antibiotiques. Grâce à cette nutrition et aux conditions de vie en liberté de nos animaux, nous pouvons vous proposer une gamme de produits variée : bœuf, poulet, volaille, veau, agneau, et vous garantir une viande bio de qualité en direct de notre ferme au Québec, pour toujours être au plus près de vous. 



Producteur de viandes bio et naturels au Québec

“L’avenir appartient à ceux qui mangent mieux”

 

Le bien-être animal au cœur de nos valeurs

Chez Les Fermes Valens, nous favorisons la santé et le bien-être animal. Nourris à l’herbe ou au foin récolté durant l’été, nos bovins bénéficient d’un accès libre aux pâturages.

Nos poulets sont nourris à la moulée (mélange de graines) et profitent d’un vaste poulailler, qui leur permet de se déplacer en toute liberté.

 

Livraison de viande à domicile au Québec

Nous proposons la livraison de nos produits directement chez vous !

Dans le respect de la chaîne du froid, votre commande conserve la température adéquate en tout temps grâce à nos véhicules réfrigérés. 

La livraison à domicile est proposée à partir de 150 $ de commande. Ajoutez 15 $ pour la livraison. Elle est offerte gratuitement au-delà de 225 $ d’achat.

 

Retrouvez toutes les informations sur notre page de livraisons

Découvrez nos recettes simples à base de viande

Retrouvez nos idées recettes en bas de la fiche de votre produit, ou rendez-vous notre page dédiée aux recettes réalisées par nos clients. 

Découvrir les recettes

Questions Fréquentes

TYPES D'AGRICULTURE

Que signifie le terme viande naturelle? Et pourquoi est-elle moins chère que la viande biologique?
Le bœuf naturel est élevé avec un régime composé d'herbe (pâturage) et d'une petite quantité de céréales telles que l'orge, l'avoine et le maïs. La différence de prix reflète le processus de certification des producteurs biologiques en ce qui concerne la certification et les directives de l'agence et de leurs inspecteurs.
Quelle est la différence entre de la viande naturelle et de la viande biologique?
Le bœuf biologique, tout comme le bœuf naturel, est élevé avec un régime fourrager. Ces animaux ruminants sont faits pour consommer des fourrages. Ils sont tous deux élevés sans aucune forme d'hormones ni d'antibiotiques. Cependant, la différence réside dans les grains qu'ils reçoivent. Les producteurs biologiques respectent des réglementations strictes pour s'assurer qu'aucun herbicide ou pesticide n'est utilisé lors de la culture de leurs cultures. Alors que le bœuf naturel est élevé sur des fourrages et des céréales qui sont cultivés de manière conventionnelle.
Quel est la différence entre des oeufs de poules en liberté ''FREE RANGE'' et ''FREE RUN''?
Les œufs ''Free Run'' sont produits par des poules qui courent librement dans une grange à aire ouverte qui a une variété de nids et de perchoirs. Ils ne sont pas hébergés dans des cages. Les poules en liberté ''Free Range'' ont les mêmes libertés, mais elles ont en plus accès à l'extérieur. Les œufs produits par Les Fermes Valens sont 100% en liberté ''Free Range'' donc avec accès à l'extérieur.
Que signifie un animal 100% nourri à l'herbe?
Un animal qui est élevé et strictement

nourri à l'herbe Il ne mange que de l'herbe de la naissance à la fin de sa vie. Cela inclut également la mère qui suit un régime fourrager.

 

 

CONSERVATION DES ALIMENTS:

Les produits Valens sont-ils frais ou congelés?
Notre viande fraîche est mise sous scellé puis congelée. Ainsi, elle peut se conserver un an dans votre congélateur, tout en gardant ses apports nutritionnels.
Combien de temps puis-je garder dans mon congélateur la viande emballée sous-vide?
Une viande bien scellée et congelée peut durer jusqu'à un an dans votre congélateur sans aucun problème.
Une fois ma viande décongelée, combien de temps puis-je la garder dans mon réfrigérateur?
Une fois que vous avez décongelé la viande de votre choix, il est préférable de la consommer dans les 3 à 5 jours.

 

Pour toute question sur la LIVRAISON, veuillez vous référer à notre page > LIVRAISON DE VIANDE À DOMICILE <

 

RETOUR ET REMBOURSEMENT:

Les crédits et les retours sont basés sur les produits manquants dans une commande. (Non compris les produits en rupture de stock qui ne devraient pas être facturés). Produits reçus ou descellés, etc. Pour toute préoccupation, il est préférable de nous contacter pour plus d'informations.


Un remboursement partiel est envisageable après accord de l'équipe des ventes, pour les raisons suivantes :

- Produits endommagés durant la livraison ;

- Produits expirés lors de la réception de la commande ;

- Produits jugés en mauvaise condition par l'équipe de vente.

En dehors de ces conditions, aucun remboursement ni retour n’est accepté.

 

INFORMATIONS RELATIVES AU PAIEMENT

Chez Fermes Valens, vous avez la possibilité de payer par carte de crédit ou virement interac. Une fois votre commande placée : 1. Tweets by PEAquaFarms


Prince Edward Aqua Farms

Prince Edward Aqua Farms of New London, Prince Edward Island has been harvesting and processing top quality shellfish since 1989. Over 25 years of experience has led us to providing our Island Gold Blue Mussels enjoyed in homes and in fine dining establishments across North America and beyond, along with our quality PEI Oysters, PEI Clams, and PEI Quahogs.

Prince Edward Aqua Farms has access to some of the most ideal growing and harvesting conditions available that Atlantic Canada has to offer, such as the scenic Malpeque Bay. These natural bays provide the best environment for rope grown blue mussels, offering top quality, hearty mussel meats harvested year-round.

Island Gold Blue Mussels by Prince Edward Aqua Farms have gained a worldwide reputation for nutritious and delicate meat, rich in flavour and nutrients, that can be prepared in a number of ways: steamed, baked, breaded, stewed, or tossed in a salad. From home cooks to culinary chefs, Island Gold Blue Mussels are a favourite as they are so easy to prepare and even easier to enjoy. Click here to try our select recipes.

Always striving to offer the best quality shellfish, Prince Edward Aqua Farms has expanded several times in recent years resulting in the most modern and efficient shellfish processing plant in Prince Edward Island, Canada. Along with technical improvements, the company's dedication to innovation is matched only by its environmentally-sound practices and procedures. Prince Edward Aqua Farms is dedicated to preserving environmental harmony.

Most recently, the Ocean Wise designation granted to Prince Edward Aqua Farms as an ocean-friendly seafood choice further reinforces our determination to provide the best PEI Shellfish to our customers.

OUR PHILOSOPHY

 

We built our company on one very simple idea. The idea, that sharing a meal with friends, a colleague or your family builds memories. Food is the connective fabric that binds us all. Think back to special events in your life. Whether it was a celebration, a holiday meal or even a lunch you shared with a long lost friend. More often than not, you remember something about the meal you had. It could be something as simple as your aunt’s mashed potatoes, your mom’s brisket, your dad’s steaks or that banquet hall’s rubber chicken.

Smell, taste, colour, texture, they are all components of a memory that we can carry with us for a lifetime. It’s astounding that you can taste something and instantly pull out a memory of a time and place possibly decades past. You could say that we are memory makers or at the very least, that is what we try to be.

Our single goal is to create food products that will contribute to the fond memories you make. Whether you are cooking with your family, sitting down with friends over a cheese board and a glass of wine or putting food out for a celebration, we want to be a part of your Wildly Delicious life.


MY WILDLY DELICIOUS LIFE

 Find us, Follow us, Tag us! @Wildly_Delicious #mywildlydeliciouslife

Deeply Rooted in Atlantic Canada

We at Clarence Farm Services Ltd. pride ourselves on delivering high-quality Purina feeds to our customers, while also providing excellent technical service. We have a highly trained team of Farm Consultants positioned throughout Atlantic Canada to contribute in growing our business, and to aid in the success of our customers.

Learn More
Leaders in Atlantic Agribusiness

For over 50 years, locally owned Clarence Farm Services has provided food nutrition for livestock and pets. With stores and an independently owned dealer network in Nova Scotia, New Brunswick, Prince Edward Island and Newfoundland and Labrador we are uniquely positioned to service the Atlantic agricultural community.

Our affiliation with Cargill Animal Nutrition Canada, allows us to access the most current research and developments in the global feed industry. This, in combination with our dedicated team, keeps us on the leading edge of Atlantic agribusiness and beyond.

Clarence Farm Services is committed to working towards an inclusive and barrier-free environment for all stakeholders, including
customers, employees, job applicants, suppliers, and any visitors who enter the premises, access information provided by the company, or use the company’s goods and services; read our Accessibility Plan 2024-2026.

Media Investments

Anchor investor in leading global plant-based media platform, with over 2,400,000+ social followers and 80 million monthly impressions across multiple channels

VIEW MORE

AGRIBUSINESS
Belle Pulses - 100% Ownership

On July 31 st, 2021, Eat Well Group acquired Belle Pulses Ltd., one of the top pulse processors in Canada led by Tony and Francis Gaudet. The company has been operating for over 40 years, has won several awards, and continues to accelerate its operations and production. The company exited 2021 with over $57,900,000 in sales.

VIEW WEBSITE

CPG
Amara Organic Foods - 4% Ownership

Amara, one of the fastest growing baby food brands in America, is a food technology company that uses science and proprietary IP that locks in taste and texture to make healthy, organic, non-GMO, plant-based, convenient baby and children’s food possible for modern-day families. From baby food to toddler food and beyond, Amara is driven by the belief that setting kids on the right path from a young age will help them live better, feel better and think better for the rest of their lives.

VIEW WEBSITE

MEDIA
Plant Based News – Anchor Investor

PBN is a multi-award-winning news site with an internal design agency creating awareness about ethical consumerism, sustainability and the plant-based lifestyle. The platform boasts over 2,400,000 followers across its social media channels and receives over 80,000,000 monthly impressions. The company also has access to an expansive network of vegan influencers that is continuing to grow. PBN has expanded beyond its traditional web and social based roots to contribute to leading mainstream films that include Netflix’s original documentary, Seaspiracy, and Eating Our Way To Extinction, narrated by Kate Winslet and backed by Sir Richard Branson.

Buying Green Report 2023

The Buying Green Report is our annual comprehensive survey of consumer perceptions of sustainable packaging, conducted in partnership with Euromonitor International. The survey reveals insights on consumer willingness to pay for eco-friendly packaging, and consumers’ perceptions of packaging materials.

BUYING GREEN REPORT
A wide range of sustainable, reliable, and customisable products

Trivium provides industry-leading expertise in producing and supplying metal packaging for a variety of applications and industries. Our range includes two- and three- piece cans, aerosols, threaded bottles , and more. If you need sustainable metal packaging, we can make it happen.

SEE OUR PRODUCTS EXPLORE IN 3D
Infinitely recyclable, highly reliable, decidedly sustainable

Metal recycles forever without any loss of quality. It also enjoys high recycling rates around the world. That means metal stays in the loop, enabling a circular economy.


That's not all. Metal provides unrivalled protection of your product and an exceptional canvas for brand promotion and messaging with graphics that pop and stand out on any shelf.

SUSTAINABILITY WHY METAL?
Innovative solutions for a wide range of industries and applications
We continually pursue innovative product designs and production technologies to create breakthrough metal packaging for industry-leading global brands. Our versatile and infinitely recyclable packaging solutions can help drive sales in these market categories.

YOUR FAMILY FARM IS STILL OUR CROWNING ACHIEVEMENT

As the cornerstone of the Friesen Group of Companies, Clearbrook Grain & Milling is BC’s longest standing, privately-owned feed business for the commercial dairy and poultry industries throughout the province.

Throughout the many changes in our industry and our Valley, what has endured is our commitment to upholding our founding principles of quality and integrity through:

HARD WORK

We are passionately professional to the core, striving for continuous improvement, committed to delivering the best solution for our customers every single time.

HIGH STANDARDS

Everything we do carries our stamp of excellence and a guarantee that our work isn’t finished until we achieve the right result for our customers no matter what it takes.

HONESTY

We believe in transparency, accountability, in always doing what we say we’ll do with humility and respect, and most importantly, doing what’s right.

HARMONY

We treat customers as family, working to understand each other, respect each other, laugh together and share successes; this creates teams that enjoy working together.

Welcome to Louisbourg Seafoods

Louisbourg Seafoods Ltd., home of Mira Bay seafood products, is a family-operated seafood business. James and Lori Kennedy, owners, credit the company's success with their levels of control and expertise at all stages of seafood production.

The company harvests its product using its own fleet of vessels, and has direct control over each stage of production. This innovative Nova Scotian company is commited to the conservation and care of ocean species and habitat.

Richardson International is a global leader in agriculture and food processing.

WHAT YOU NEED TO KNOW

ABOUT GOURMET DU VILLAGE

We love to share our passion for food by creating new and innovative quality products, supported by our superior service and great “Village” attitude.

Since 1982, we have been creating award winning recipes and artisan blends in our home village of Morin Heights, located in the Laurentians, a land of lakes and mountains an hour drive north of Montreal, Quebec, Canada.

Our range of products includes gourmet dip mixes, hot baked dip mixes and chilled dip mixes, gourmet hot chocolate, brie bakers and baked brie toppings, pulled pork seasonings, burger seasonings, beer can chicken seasonings, cake in a mug mixes, and much more!

At Gourmet du Village, we make it easy to make homemade. We add the taste to the basics in our customer’s pantry or fridge with our easy to make recipes and products to share with family and friends.

: Premier Ice Cider Craftsmanship and Orchard Innovations
The Orchard Ice Cider
admin1  February 24, 2021 

Orchard

Contrary to what many people think, apple juice and apple cider are not one and the same thing. Both are prepared from squeezing juice from apples but the processes are quite different. Apple cider is primarily made from juiced apples; so, it has pulp, and high amount of minerals and vitamins compared to regular apple juice. Juices and refreshments can enhance the experience while playing betting games, keeping players refreshed and focused. Whether it’s a casual game or intense betting session, staying hydrated is key. Some platforms, like gambling site not on GamStop, offer a relaxed atmosphere, where players can enjoy their favorite games alongside a beverage. Apple cider may not be pasteurized but apple juice is always prepared through pasteurization where the juice is heated up to 190 degree Fahrenheit during processing.

What Is Ice Cider?

Ice cider is prepared using apple juice that is naturally concentrated using cold. This creates high-sugar and full-bodied juicy syrup that is afterwards fermented. Ice cider, popularly called cidre de glace at its place of origin or Quebec, is essentially a cross between hard cider and ice wine. Similar to ice wine, the apples are kept on the vine for these to shrivel up during the winters. This ensures that they have sweet nectar. These super-concentrated apple juices are then fermented for that extra zing. Ice cider will typically have alcohol content ranging between 7% and 13%.

Ice cider is originally a product made in Quebec where it was possible to produce it because of its extremely cold temperatures. However, today you will find apple cider being made in other places too where the climate is not only conducive for growing apples but also where temperatures fall below freezing point. A cidery is the place where one can commercially prepare ice cider. It will use cryoconcentration were juices from the late-harvest apples are pressed and then allowed to freeze in winter.

All You Need To Know About Ice Cider:

Ice cider can be prepared using two processes, namely, cryoconcentration and cryoextraction, for concentrating natural sugars inside the apples using cold temperatures. The commonly used apples for ice cider production are Cortland, McIntosh, Spartan, and Empire. Since cryoextraction demands that apples be left on branches for much longer than when they are usually picked, orchards are growing new types of apples for producing ice cider. Cryptocurrencies empower farming by facilitating transparent payments, funding agricultural projects, and enhancing supply chain tracking via blockchain. Tokenized platforms connect farmers directly to markets, reducing intermediaries. With sustainability in focus, choosing the best crypto to buy for 2025 can support eco-friendly innovations, ensuring financial growth alongside agricultural development. Cryoconcentration, or using cold for freezing apple juices, is similar to methods used earlier by Canadians for making maple syrup. Once frozen, a part is broken off that is more concentrated.

Almost 95% of ice cider production is by harvesting apples during the autumn, keeping these fresh, and then pressing these in winter. The juice is thereafter packed inside containers left outside during the winter. In six months time, the water freezes, separating sugar. In cryoextraction, the frozen fruits are left hanging on branches until middle of winter. By this time, they get dried by the winds and cold. Then they are picked at night when temperatures are hovering between -15 degrees and -8 degrees Centigrade.

Ice cider has many health benefits. Apples have polyphenol and these antioxidants can prevent cancers and inflammation. They reduce risks of cardiovascular diseases and boost overall health. Phytonutrients can prevent bad cholesterol from oxidizing and triggering plaque build-up in your arteries. Apple cider may not be very rich in fiber but it has been found to alleviate constipation and irritable bowel syndrome symptoms. The drink, being unfiltered, retains pectin fiber that is responsible for good bowel movements. It is excellent for hydrating the body and prevents dehydration. When you dilute it with water, you can reduce your sugar intake.

En étant le leader dans l'emballage des huiles depuis trois décennies, nous chez Sager comprenons la nécessité d'apporter de l'innovation dans une catégorie qui prospère grâce à l'innovation. Nous travaillons avec nos clients pour développer de nouveaux produits innovants de A à Z. Parce que nous avons une compréhension approfondie des tendances et des lacunes du marché, nous pouvons aider à faciliter tout, du développement de produits au mix de assortiment.

Processus innovants :

Sager Food Products dispose d'une installation de mise en bouteille de pointe avec plusieurs lignes dédiées pour produire des produits en volumes élevés comme en volumes plus bas. Cela permet à nos clients de avoir l'opportunité d'innover sans la peur des coûts de démarrage élevés ou des engagements d'inventaire. Grâce à la flexibilité de nos processus, nous avons l'opportunité de créer de l'innovation plus rapidement que quiconque dans l'industrie.

Partenariats innovants :

Nous avons créé de nombreux partenariats réussis avec nos clients de valeur au cours des décennies. Nos partenariats ont transformé cette industrie en un segment prospère et rentable dans l'alimentaire. Nous créons des programmes spécifiques autour des stratégies commerciales développées grâce à de solides relations avec nos clients. Nous sommes impatients de collaborer avec vous en créant un programme qui apportera des résultats rentables à votre entreprise !

OUR MEILLEURS SERVICES
Services
Marque Privée

Sager emballe tous types d'huiles d'olive et végétales dans des contenants allant de 6,25 oz (185 ml) à des bacs de 264 gallons. Nous mettons continuellement à jour nos équipements et améliorons nos opérations pour offrir une qualité et une valeur exceptionnelles.

Services Alimentaires

Nous offrons une excellence opérationnelle dans les services alimentaires grâce à une gestion fiable de la chaîne d'approvisionnement, des produits de haute qualité, des solutions personnalisées et des technologies de pointe.

Solutions De Péage

Le client fournit tout ; la formule, les ingrédients, l'emballage et les étiquettes. Sager Foods gérera le traitement en fournissant la machinerie et la main-d'œuvre, charging a 'tolling fee' for utilizing our facilities to produce the final product.
