Welcome to The Pickle Station!

The Pickle Station is a family owned and operated processing vegetable business, specializing in cucumbers and peppers located in the heart of Chatham-Kent, Ontario. We are committed to growing and grading only the best quality product through innovation, determination and a passion for the industry.

About Us

Our cucumber and pepper operation called The Pickle Station, located in Chatham, Ontario, is a proud employer to over 200 local students every summer.

We are a third generation family owned operation who have been growing and grading for over 50 years. Our way of celebrating this milestone was launching our own brand of pickles.

Unmatched Service

Sunrise Bakery offers artisan quality and care paired with wholesale manufacturing coast-to-coast distribution capabilities. We are your wholesale baked good partners, providing you with the product delivery you need across the continent! We aren’t just a large-scale bakery, we are a food processing and manufacturing solutions provider!

We want you to have peace of mind as you work with us, knowing that we’ll always get you the products you need when you need them. Missed fulfillment rates isn’t in our vocabulary, if you need a quality Sunrise Bakery product, we’ll ensure it’s delivered to you in full, every time!

Deep in Tradition

Sunrise Bakery began as a simple, door-to-door bakery in 1963. Over the decades the bakery has evolved from a neighborhood bakery to manufacturing for some of North America’s most recognizable food brands and shipping millions of units a year. What hasn’t changed, however, is Sunrise Bakery’s commitment to taking care of our customers and our staff members.

Our team of over 100 dedicated staff is committed to your success and goes above and beyond to make sure you receive your products on time and at the quality level you expect. Many of our team members have been with us for decades, and this is because we work together, as a family! No matter how large or small Sunrise Bakery has been, at our heart we are a family business who is built on hard work and quality service.

ABOUT US

LUDA Foods has been crafting soups, sauces and custom blends for the food service and industrial markets since 1951. A third-generation, family-owned company, we are humbled by the long-standing trust North American chefs, buyers and their organizations have had in our LUDA brand line of dry mixes and refrigerated concentrates as well as the many custom private label products we have developed. And all of them are made-to-order, right here in Canada.

LUDA Foods’ specialties include gluten free, vegetarian, sodium reduced, Halal, Kosher, and clean label. Our manufacturing facility is HACCP and GFSI certified under the SQF referential, and all products comply with the GS1 FS3 certification. What is more, we are a CFIA meat and fish registered establishment with daily inspections.

About Us

We are the Nova Scotia Seafood Alliance.

An established organization built upon a very solid foundation that is dedicated to helping the shore-based sector flourish in a changing world.

With our origins as the Nova Scotia Salt Fish Packers in 1975, we have since transitioned  to the Nova Scotia Seafood Alliance to better reflect the broad interests of our membership. We represent land based seafood companies of all sizes based throughout the province. Our membership base continues to grow and now includes members with a presence in almost every fishery.  

We have 200+ Member Companies all of whom have fascinating individual stories and products. But we are one Nova Scotia Seafood Alliance anxious to increase our membership, broaden our voice and our benefits and maintain the same good policy initiatives which our association has become well known for.

We are the Nova Scotia Seafood Alliance.

Mission

We are the voice for Nova Scotia seafood suppliers, built on the legacy of the Nova Scotia Fish Packers Association. We promote, represent and advocate for land-based seafood buyers and processors across the province, for the advancement and prosperity of all.

 

Goals

To accomplish it's mission, the Nova Scotia Seafood Alliance will strive to achieve the following goals:

GROW

We aim to grow our membership among seafood companies in Nova Scotia. We will listen carefully to our members to understand their objectives.

SPEAK

We will speak to the issues and concerns of our members in a professional manner.
 

ENGAGE

We will engage with the fishing community, the media , the public and Government.
 

SERVE

We will serve as a platform to introduce the best in Nova Scotian Seafood to the worldwide marketplace.

NSSA Infrastructure & Innovation Program

PRODUCTS AND SERVICES

 Nova Scotia seafood enjoys an international reputation for excellence. Our products are transported and enjoyed throughout Canada and across the globe. 

Our cold, North Atlantic waters provide a wide variety of seafood throughout all seasons. We deliver it fresh, frozen, smoked, salted, processed and live. Members of the Nova Scotia Seafood Alliance rightly pride themselves on offering the best quality seafood and fair value. We like to think our products speak for themselves.

Canadian Made

We are proud to be the only company that has the ability to source and produce our edible animal fat products – including tallow and lard – entirely within Canada.

Industry Versatility

We provide cooking and baking ingredients for food companies and the restaurant industry as a whole. Our ingredients are also used to make soaps, animal feed and pet food.

Quality

We are committed to working with our suppliers to ensure that we source the highest quality raw materials. This allows us to create a premium and unique product for our customers.

About

Bank Brothers Sustainable Ingredients (BBSI) is part of the Bank Brothers group of companies. We are a multi-generational family business with more than 70 years of experience focusing on adding value to key by-products of the beef industry. In 2017, the Bank Brothers family purchased Hubberts Industries to expand our operations while providing our customers and suppliers with the same level of quality and service we are known for.

Dave — Bell Vet Services

Reko Pizzelle – Taste The Tradition
Play

Our pizzelle was born from bakers with the determination and precision of the finest craftsman of the time. Classic waffle batter, a rich mixture of select ingredients, is carefully poured onto a hot cast-iron griddle and baked until perfectly golden. Today, our Reko Pizzelles have stayed true to the original authentic baking process, made with simple clean ingredients and no preservatives.

Enjoy waffle cookie goodness straight out of the package, top with jam, accompany with coffee, tea or your favorite libation, or create ice cream sandwiches, s’mores, cannoli and much more – each light crispy bite is as rich in flavor as it is in history.

Commisso Bakery

Founded in 1957 Commisso Bakery has become a Toronto landmark. Famous for our  hot table we also offer traditional Italian breads baked daily,  deli meats and cheeses, pastries, a convenient mini-market to stock up on food, and even catering. 

 

Whether you're looking for a late night snack, to stock up on food, or are missing some household supplies, we are open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year to serve your needs.

What began as a small family business, Feature Foods is now one of the largest producers of herring and sauce products in North America.

OUR PRODUCTS

We produce a variety of herring, sauces, and condiments ranging in size from small glass jars to pails and barrels. History in the Baking
Bread, Cakes, Pastries & Pies
Producing the finest quality bread products to the Edmonton region for over 60 years.
BAKERY
View More
DELI
View More
CAFFÈ
View More
Serving Edmonton since 1960

Growing up in the Italian culture, we learned the significance of sharing a meal with family. Food was art, meals were made with attention, care and pride. Using only fresh and quality ingredients. It was an expression of love. Italian Bakery has taken that knowledge alongside with our experience in the industry to create a place where friends and family a like can gather, shop and enjoy. It’s not just a market to us, it’s our lifestyle, where we come from and what we hold most important.

Our Specialties
We've take our passion and experience in the industry and have created quality Breads and Pastries that we are proud of.

We welcome family, friends and our community to come and enjoy them all.

FAMILY OWNED
SINCE 1989

Our small, family business may have grown a little since 1989, but our commitments have always remained the same: affordable organic spreads, responsible creation, and jars chock-full of flavor and nutrition.

READ OUR STORY
THE SPREAD
OF SPREADS

Each spread family member is sure to possess two qualities: one-third less sugar than a preserve and scrumptiousness (a natural side effect from containing the perfect fruit).

FRUIT SPREAD VS. PRESERVES
PREMIUM

These spreads are just like what your Granny made (but with a lot less sugar).

JUST FRUIT

Sweetened with organic apple juice, these jars are fruit through-and-through.

FAR FROM AVERAGE FRUIT

From heritage to unique organic varieties—we source the very best fruit from the very best growers and naturally get the very best taste.

THE FRUIT
WHY WE’RE
THE BERRY BEST
DELICIOUS NUTRITIOUSNESS

Our spreads are purely organic and non-gmo, not to mention a low-sugar, 30 calorie treat. We’re all about what goes into your body...and what doesn’t.

NUTRITION
TIP-TOEING ON OUR PLANET

Wastewater recycling, energy reduction initiatives, waste diversion—our approach to protecting the environment is a cut above.

ECOLOGICAL IMPACT
STRAWBERRY

DIG INTO THIS JAR

PREMIUM SPREAD

Our heritage variety of strawberry is both sweet and tart. The yum factor is so strong, you may even find yourself waking up just to have that midnight snack.

—Jennifer

I would just like to say that I have tried a great many jams, preserves and jellies in my lifetime and your products are absolutely, hands down the best I have ever had. They are perfectly sweetened as you say, I use it on everything, its absolutely delicious! And you can tell just how natural the ingredients are in every bite. Much respect to your company and I hope you keep doing what you’re doing because its perfect!

ALIMENTS BARIL
TRY THEM! PARISIENNES

Ready to eat in just three steps: drain, heat and serve!

Aliments Baril’s parisiennes are ideal for your family meals. Steamed and vacuum packed, these delicious potatoes contain no sulphites or preservatives. They are easy to prepare and make a great addition to any menu!

The four-portion package is perfect for any occasion: a fondue, barbecue or gourmet meal. Our parisiennes can be reheated in the oven or on the stovetop in just a few minutes. They are available year-round in grocery stores and public markets across Quebec. Why not try some today?

CONSISTENT QUALITY

ALIMENTS BARIL – WHAT WE ARE ALL ABOUT

Our friendly and innovative vision

Ever since Aliments Baril was founded in 1964, our respect for people and the environment has played a major role in the development of our family-owned company. The founders and their children continue to demonstrate their environmental commitment at all stages of product and production development.

Seeking new challenges?

For over 50 years, Aliments Baril has demonstrated its expertise in the areas of potato processing and fresh vegetable preparation.

Would you like to work for a local company that is a leader in its sector and offers attractive working conditions in a dynamic environment?

LEARN MORE
DID YOU KNOW?

Vacuum cooking demystified

This technique serves to maintain ingredient integrity. It also controls the cooking temperature and ensures a longer shelf life. Aliments Baril’s bagged potatoes are specially designed for vacuum cooking. The potatoes are cooked to tender perfection and retain all of their flavour. They also require very little preparation: simply reheat and serve!

SQF Certification


In 2017, Les Aliments Baril inc. obtained the SQF certification. Therefore, we are the only company in the business of transformation of fresh potatoe in the province of Québec, that has reached this level of certification.

The SQF (Safe Quality Food) Program is an internationally-credible food safety management system. Customers can rest assured that suppliers provide food that was produced, processed, prepared and handled to the highest possible standards at all stages of the supply chain and processing steps. These standards cover food safety as well as product quality, which is a unique feature.

DELICIOUS, WHOLESOME CULINARY CREATIONS

Our culinary experts specialize in creating all-natural ingredients and flavours that enrich and enhance your edibles. We prioritize using non-GMO ingredients that deliver quality and freshness with every bite, at a price to suit any budget.

Sweet Flavours

more >>

Custom Creations

Collaborate with our culinary experts to create fresh, innovative ingredients and flavours your customers will love

more >>

CUSTOMIZED CREATIONS

If you can envision it, our culinary experts can create it! Whether you’re looking for sweet or savoury, or anywhere in between, we’ll work with you to bring your dream taste to life. There’s no concept we can’t deliver!

OUR COMMITMENT TO SUSTAINABILITY
Imperial Flavours, Inc. is committed to working with and supporting reputable suppliers who share our commitment to practices that put quality and sustainability first. We prioritize using non-GMO ingredients in every culinary creation, bringing you clean-tasting products every time.
LEARN MORE
WORK WITH US
Since 1981, Imperial Flavours has been the food & beverage industry’s premiere choice for wholesome ingredient and flavour solutions. We’re passionate about enhancing your products with exciting new sensations, and proud to deliver our taste solutions on time and within your budget.

Our culinary experts take the time to learn all about your needs, make helpful recommendations, and then work diligently to create several tasting options for you to try. We’re with you every step of the way until you have a flavour solution you’ll be proud to take to market.

LEARN MORE
BOOK A TASTING SESSION!

The best way to get to know our confections is to try them yourself! Get in touch with us anytime to book a discovery call, or arrange a “tasting session” to explore ingredients and flavours that will tantalize your customers’ palates!

Stephen Quickert

President

Letter from The President
 

Why is Reid’s milk better tasting, and better for you? The answer is simple. We minimize the processing beyond basic pasteurizing to preserve the rich nutrient value of milk.

Our experienced and highly trained staff adhere to the highest quality standards of cleanliness to keep your milk the way it should be: natural and wholesome. Observe for yourself on our video monitors in the retail store showcasing how our products are made with pride.

Since the days of the horse and wagon, Reid’s continues to be the dairy of choice. Owned and operated by our family, serving your family and our community since 1910.

Thank you for choosing Reid’s Dairy.

Pure & Safe Dairy Excellence

Peanut-Free, Kosher Certified, and Proudly Made with 100% Canadian Cow Milk in the Bay of Quinte

Peanut-free Facility

R
eid’s Dairy is a peanut-free, tree nut-controlled facility. While we make some ice creams with walnuts and pecans, they are produced separately, with the room thoroughly cleaned before and after each run.

Look for the COW LOGO

O
ur Blue Cow logo proudly represents products made with 100% Canadian milk and milk ingredients. What’s so great about that? We’re glad you asked.

Proudly Made in Bay of Quinte Region's

T
he Bay of Quinte region’s diverse manufacturing sector produces various goods, from food and auto parts to skincare and museum displays. Supporting local products boosts the community and economy.

COR certified

C
OR certification assures consumers they are buying the highest quality kosher products.

Featured Products

Reid’s Dairy supplies 2% of Ontario’s fluid milk, sourcing two thirds locally within 100 km of Belleville. Our products, including milk, cream, and coffee creams, are processed daily for freshness without UHT processing. We offer convenient screw-cap cartons, with coffee creams using only two farm-fresh ingredients. We also produce premium ice creams with 100% Canadian cream and all-natural juices providing 100% daily vitamin C. Experience superior quality and flavour with Reid’s.

REID’S DAIRY CELEBRATES OPENING

Belleville Coun(s). Garnet Thompson and Chris Malette were on hand Saturday to join the Reid’s Dairy team to help celebrate the grand opening of its retail store at 222 Bell Boulevard. The opening is the latest in the long history of the dairy that has served the region for decades. Photo by Derek Baldwin /Derek Baldwin

Our Happy Customers!
 
Indulge in the Reid’s Dairy experience and see why our customers keep coming back for more!  Your satisfaction is our success story.

LA FIERTÉ DE NOS PRODUCTEURS LAITIERS

Le délice commence avec la récolte du lait frais chez nos producteurs laitiers partenaires, et ce, chaque jour. Comme c’est important pour nous de soutenir nos producteurs locaux, on utilise uniquement du lait québécois dans la fabrication de nos produits.

Résultat : un fromage savoureux, toujours frais et 100 % lait.

HISTOIRE DE CASSER LA CROÛTE

RAISING THE BAR FOR FUNDRAISING
#WEFUNDCOMMUNITIES

World's Finest® Chocolate is the sweetest way to bring profit to your organization and smiles to your community.

We pride ourselves in providing the easiest fundraising program in the shortest amount of time.

We continue to lead the fundraising industry with our experienced fundraising specialists, exceptional customer service and premium products.

We provide the best value in fundraising and are committed to helping you achieve your fundraising goals.

Are you ready to plan a successful fundraiser?

WANT TO LEARN MORE?
READY TO START NOW?
8 REASONS TO CHOOSE WFC
EXPERIENCE WITH RESULTS

With more than 80 years of experience, we've helped fundraisers raise over $4 Billion Dollars. We put all of our experience into our products and service options. Our fundraising specialists have an average of 25 years of fundraising experience. We can help!

EXPERTISE

Our highly experienced sales and service professionals are here to help with all of your fundraising needs. Fundraising specialists in your area are dedicated to helping you plan the perfect fundraiser from start to finish — at no additional cost. We have the know-how to help and we care because our success depends on yours.

MAXIMUM PROFIT

Raise BIG profits with little effort. All of our products earn you a minimum of 40%, and as much as 50%, profit after taxes. The more boxes you sell, the more profit you can make!

Use our Online Profit Calculator to get a quick estimate. *Profit excludes shipping.

BEST VALUE PRODUCTS

Our products combine affordability and excellence, ensuring you get the most from your fundraising efforts. We believe in delivering quality and service without compromise, offering products that are both low-priced and high in value.

NO UPFRONT COSTS

Public and Catholic schools are automatically pre-approved for credit. Other creditworthy schools, organizations, and individuals can apply for credit.

FUN TO SELL

It’s fun to sell something people look forward to buying. That means more participants in your campaign, each selling more and hitting your goal faster. In fact, our program wraps up in as little as two weeks. No fuss, no headaches, no hassle.

EASY TO SELL

For many customers, chocolate is their #1 occasional indulgence & they enjoy brands and products unique to fundraising. Our chocolate is so delicious and well-known, it practically sells itself.

BEST QUALITY, BRANDS AND SELECTION

We have the most sought-after brands in the business: World’s Finest® is the #1 fundraising chocolate brand in Canada, and Laura Secord® is Canada's heritage brand and is synonymous with quality. Choose from our chocolate covered Continental Almonds, bars or individually wrapped pieces; we have all the best sellers….. and NOW offer curated non-chocolate products as well.

ESSENTIAL NUTRITION TO HELP ANIMALS THRIVE

The best in animal nutrition is built on four generations of innovation. We are always challenging ourselves to find the right solutions for our partners and the animals we feed.

Our Offerings
EXPLORE OUR BRANDS

At Wilbur-Ellis Nutrition, we are proud to offer customers our trusted product brands — Ametza®, Emmert®, and Rangen®. Each brand carries a storied legacy of excellence and dependability in feed ingredients, manufacturing,
tailor-made formulations, and nutritional solutions.

Ametza® delivers high-quality, nutritional pellet and forage products that enable livestock to thrive.   
Ametza Offerings

Emmert® provides protein and yeast blends for pet, livestock, and aquaculture.

Emmert Offerings

Rangen® feed options provide the right balance of nutrients, vitamins, and minerals for animals and aquaculture.

Rangen Offerings
WHO WE ARE

At Wilbur-Ellis Nutrition, we believe in the power of a handshake and a promise to do things the right way. We create quality, nutritional products for Livestock, Pet, and Aquaculture that make a difference in animals’ lives. We do this with an eye for sustainability and a heart that beats for what’s to come.

About Us
INNOVATIVE NUTRITION FOR A BETTER TOMORROW

We serve diverse industries, including Aquaculture, Livestock, Lifestyle, and Pet. Our premium products and tailored solutions promote productivity, animal health, and sustainable growth.

AQUACULTURE

Utilizing novel and premium ingredients allows us to deliver high-quality, exceptional pellets that are both nutritious for the animal and sustainable for the environment. 

Our Offerings
LIFESTYLE

From premium ingredients to specialized formulations, we prioritize quality and nutrition to ensure Lifestyle animals thrive at every stage of life.

Our Offerings
LIVESTOCK

Our premium feed and forage products help ensure cattle, swine, poultry, and other livestock species maintain optimal health and production yields.

Our Offerings
PET

The health of our pets is a top priority. We deliver high-quality, safe products that meet canine and feline nutritional needs.

Our Offerings
OUR SERVICES

Discover Wilbur-Ellis Nutrition’s specialized material handling, premixing, and bottling services. Leveraging industry expertise, we engineer tailored solutions to optimize operational efficiency, ensuring precision and exceeding industry standards for unparalleled nutritional success.

Learn More
COMMITMENT TO SUSTAINABILITY

The Wilbur-Ellis Purpose is to provide the essentials for the world to thrive.  As we pursue this Purpose, we leverage Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) to ensure our business operates with respect and consideration of the rest of society.

Learn About CSR

ABOUT US
Our Company

Evergreen is a HACCP seafood processing facility, federally licensed by the Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) and operating in good standing. Our facilities are well equipped and our modern processes are reviewed and enhanced on a regular basis. Our goal is to provide our customers with the highest quality seafood products and we will not rest, until we are satisfied that our customers are getting the best there is available.  

Our People

The current owners of Evergreen, all key people averaging more than twenty years experience in the company and seafood industry, are well versed with the requirements and characteristics of the market, work closely with our suppliers and customers, to ensure that products supplied to our customers is always of the highest quality and standards.    

Our Products

Apart from geoduck clams, Evergreen also specialize in all forms of processing sea cucumbers, another high end product in Chinese fine dining. We also supply other high quality seafood items, such as live dungeness crab, live Alaska king crab, Manila clams, live Pacific oysters and fresh shucked oyster meat, processed horse clam meat and other high quality seafood products, to our local and international customers each day.

Our Family Story

Cedar Valley began as a high school project with a mission to share our family's infused recipes, inspired by our heritage in the Beqaa Valley of Lebanon.

After I received a $3,000 grant from my high school, I partnered with my mom to bring her authentic homemade Pita Chips to Canadian families. 

From starting in our home kitchen to opening our own 12,000 square-foot production facility in Windsor, ON, our line of all-natural Pita Chips can now be found in over 1,300 grocery stores across Canada.

Learn More

Unlocking Nature Enriching Life

ADM is a global leader in both human and animal nutrition. We utilize the power and provisions of nature to create ingredients and solutions that generate safe, healthy, and sustainable nutrition for people and animals around the world.

ADM helps to bring nutritional solutions to those who need them. From our vast portfolio of ingredients that can satisfy tastes and fulfill nutritional needs to our ability to innovate full formula, consumer-relevant, science-based nutrition solutions proactively or through co-creation with customers. And through our years of involvement in the nutritional world, we have also created capabilities to sustainably manage and add value to every part of the global nutrition supply chain through operational proficiency with a worldwide footprint.

Creating top-quality ingredients from Canadian bakery by-products is our bread and butter.

With over fifty years’ experience, SPB Solutions enable Canada’s animal feed manufacturers to invest in pure, sustainable and nutritionally superior products made exclusively from food surplus.

LET’S TALK
How does it work?

We collect the inevitable byproducts from Canada’s largest bakeries and other agri-food businesses, and take them to either our Quebec or Ontario facilities. There, we reengineer, process and convert the materials into high-quality additions to animal feed.

And our former food stuff processing goes way beyond that.

SEE HOW
Minimizing waste.
Maximizing value.
Prioritizing Earth.

Quality, consistency and sustainability are our guiding lights. That’s why the SPB Solutions team are unique in that we have specialist support, quality and nutrition teams on site.

MEET THE FAMILY
Products

We don’t do average. Everything we make is premium-grade, specially formulated by animal nutritionists, sourced responsibly and rigorously tested by quality experts.

With SPB Solutions, the future of feed is here. And it’s circular.

EXPLORE THE SPB RANGE
Sustainability

But it’s not just animals and our customers that benefit from what we do. The planet does too.

By upcycling Canadian food surplus that is otherwise destined for landfill, we’re preventing unnecessary loss and giving nature room to breathe.

And, as loyal members of CREM, we’re 100% committed.

SEE WHAT WE’RE UP TO
Work with us

Sure, we’re pioneers of Canada’s circular economy, but we’ve never lost our family feel. At SPB Solutions, we value our people enormously, and welcome anyone with the right skills, mindset and ethos.

If you are interested in developing environmental solutions, and in the process of former food stuff, take a look at our current vacancies!

EXPLORE OPPORTUNITIES AT SPB
Contact

If you want your bakery’s by-products to go further or want to give your animal feed recipes a boost, we should talk. Drop us a line or call us today.

START THE CONVERSATION

Protenergy Foods Corp. is a rapidly growing and profitable mid-size company specializing in the manufacturing of aseptic low acid food and beverage products. Founded in 2004 by industry veterans who recognized an opportunity to bring innovative technologies to the food production industry, the company has a strong track record of growth and solid financial backing. Protenergy operates two state-of-the-art facilities in Canada and the United States. Food safety is our top priority and our entire process is constantly tested and the product evaluated at every critical point.

On May 30, 2014, Protenergy Foods was acquired by TreeHouse Foods of Oak Brook, Illinois. TreeHouse is a food manufacturer servicing primarily the retail grocery and foodservice distribution channels. The acquisition of Protenergy and its line of quality products will add to the assortment of premium products offered within the TreeHouse family.

At Cribit Seeds, we help you get the most out of every acre. As an independent, family-owned seed producer in Waterloo Region, we partner with exceptional genetic suppliers such as SeCan and DEKALB to test, grow, condition and produce pedigreed oat, barley, wheat, corn and soybean seed varieties.



Through our network of retailers across Ontario and regional team of experts, we offer the highest quality seed varieties and hybrids best suited for your farm to improve yields season after season.

EXPERTS IN YOUR FIELDS

Our field success is your field success. Regional differences can have a huge impact on your farm’s growing potential and success; our strength is providing locally tested varieties that perform well on your farm.

LEARN MORE ABOUT OUR SEED VARIETIES

HIGH QUALITY SEEDS.
HIGHER YIELDS.

Our industry partnerships with leading genetic suppliers SeCan and DEKALB ensure that every seed gets off to a great start.  We apply leading-edge seed treatment technology to large volumes of packaged seed.  Through our partnerships, Cribit Seeds is very involved with the research and development of new varieties and products.

LEARN MORE ABOUT OUR RESEARCH

Our other registered enterprise, Wintermar Grains, contracts with Ontario grain farmers to provide us with quality oats, barley, soft white wheat and rye crops.

LEARN MORE ABOUT WINTERMAR GRAINS

COMMUNITY

At Cribit Seeds, we are committed to making a difference in communities, both locally and abroad. We invest in the development and promotion of cover crops used for nutrient and carbon capture, as well as improved land stewardship. By supporting non-profit organizations like Kenyan Kids Foundation and Trees for Woolwich, we strongly believe in the importance of giving back.

Quality Food From People Who Care

At Global Gourmet Foods we believe in empowering people with the opportunity to provide a great meal experience for their friends and family. Our affordable meal options rival restaurant quality with an array of flavors sourced from around the globe. Because after all, life is a little more delicious when you share it.  We are a premium high volume soup manufacturer for retail and foodservice.

​

We are located in Richmond, BC Canada.  

​

Click here to contact us!

About Us

Global Gourmet Foods was founded in 1988 by Anne and Lawrence Hill with a mission of providing “Quality Food from People Who Care”™. This mantra has been the guiding principle throughout Global Gourmet’s history.  As it turns out, our Customers have appreciated the sincere efforts of Global Gourmet to make high quality products with a focus on quality, integrity and Customer service.

 

Today Global Gourmet ships across Canada, the USA and into Japan with both Global Gourmet branded and private label kettle products made from our highly efficient HACCP facilities in Richmond BC, Canada.  Global Gourmet services multi unit chain restaurants, institutions, Supermarket service deli, frozen retail and Club stores.

We care about:

International flavour, nutritional excellence, culinary versatility.

Global Gourmet is the premier custom processor of ready to serve soups, sauces and entrees in Western Canada. We are known for flexible yet efficient production systems and talented R&D staff. We are proud of our high quality, consistent product and order fill rates which are among the highest in the industry.

Our Advantage

Global Gourmet Foods is the premier processor of kettle products in Western Canada. Our unique processing facilities which allow for the in-house processing of fresh local vegetables, rich stocks, sautéed meats and vegetables and traditional rouxs enable us to execute exacting recipes from the discerning Executive Chefs in the same way Chef would do on a stovetop.

​

Our culinary and production capabilities combined with our experience and access to exciting flavours and raw materials from Asia results in fantastic signature soups, sauces and entrees.

Custom Recipes

Global Gourmet Foods is very experienced in custom processing and has done hundreds of proprietary products, some of which have been featured in Bon Appétit and been served at the famous James Beard house.  Customers typically come to Global with a request to create a new product idea, duplicate a recipe that they are currently making in-house or, create a product that duplicates a sample provided.

​

Global works with the Customer to develop the product in stovetop batches and generate idea pricing. Once a product is approved by the Customer, a small production batch is done. Once that has been evaluated and it has been determined if any adjustments are required, full scale production commences. During this process, Global must perform many tasks which include the validation and approval of any potential new suppliers of ingredients, obtain label approval from CFIA for any meat based products, prepare product specification forms, register ECCC net and incorporate product procedures into HACCP plan.

BOUTIQUE EN LIGNE

Chef de file
depuis plus de 65 ans

Des valeurs qui perdurent au fil des générations
L’aventure a débuté en 1955 à la meunerie de Mirabel. Soucieux d’aider ses voisins producteurs agricoles, Réal Mondou y débutait alors la fabrication de moulée. Plus de soixante ans plus tard, l’essence même des Meuneries Mondou repose sur les mêmes valeurs de respect, d’entraide, d’intégrité et de famille qui ont été instaurées par M. Mondou lors de sa création. Son fils, Michel, de même que la dernière génération à y être impliquée, prennent bien soin de faire perdurer ses valeurs.

Un chef de file de l’industrie des aliments et des boissons

Nous développons, fabriquons et commercialisons une vaste gamme de produits de marque privée et de marque nationale à travers l’Amérique du Nord.

En savoir plus

Notre mission

Créer des boissons et des aliments de qualité que les consommateurs aiment et les clients apprécient, dont les employés sont fiers, et qui respectent notre planète.

Nos produits
Boissons aux fruits

Notre sélection de jus frais, de smoothies, de concentrés surgelés, d’eaux aromatisées ou encore de jus faits de concentré se distingue par sa variété, ses formats et ses saveurs.

Sauces, soupes et bouillons

nos gens

Travailler chez Lassonde, ça donne le goût de s’impliquer, de donner un sens à son travail et de bien faire les choses. Choisir Lassonde, c’est retrouver un esprit de famille au cœur d’une grande entreprise nord-américaine, se réaliser aux côtés de gens dédiés et être fier des produits savoureux et de qualité que nous fabriquons.

Travailler chez Lassonde
Travailler chez Lassonde
Joins-toi à notre équipe!

Nous avons plusieurs postes disponibles à travers l’Amérique du Nord.

Voir les postes disponibles
Voir les postes disponibles

« Lassonde fait preuve de bienveillance envers ses employés. De plus, je suis entouré d’une équipe riche en expertise et je bénéficie d’un environnement propice à mon développement en étant impliqué sur des projets de grande envergure. »

Nicolas Brou
Analyste, Trésorerie, Siège social

« Je considère que ma formation et mes collègues m’ont préparé à une belle et fructueuse carrière. »

Brian Kendall
Opérateur de chariot élévateur & Remplaçant Tetra Brik, Usine Kelowna

« J’aime vraiment travailler chez Lassonde en raison du climat d’entraide et de collaboration qui m’incite à donner le meilleur de moi-même. L’engagement de l’organisation à l’égard de la croissance professionnelle et l’attention sincère qu’elle porte à ses employés font de Lassonde un lieu de travail inspirant! »

Chris Kholer
Directeur de l’approvisionnement, Bureaux États-Unis

« Depuis que je me suis jointe à l’entreprise il y a sept ans, je me suis sentie soutenue, écoutée et, surtout, vue. Travaillant sur le terrain, j’ai l’impression que mes idées sont appréciées, que l’équipe de direction se soucie sincèrement de moi et que mon point de vue est respecté. »

Brenda Smith
Représentante des ventes au détail, Canada

« Lassonde nous encourage constamment à réussir en nous fournissant les outils, autant pour notre physique que notre mental, qui nous aident à atteindre nos objectifs. »

Andrew Meltzer
Directeur des ventes, Bureaux États-Unis

« Pour moi, être employée chez Lassonde, c’est faire partie d’une équipe diversifiée et tournée vers l’avenir dont les membres s’engagent à s’entraider et à se soutenir mutuellement tout en apportant une contribution à l’entreprise et à la communauté. »

Liane Houssami
Spécialiste acquisition de talents, Bureaux États-Unis

« Nous sommes traités comme une famille et je suis sûr que moi et toutes les personnes qui ont cherché d’une manière ou d’une autre des options de vie à l’extérieur de notre pays pouvons apporter à l’entreprise et au Canada toutes nos bonnes manières, notre formation et nos connaissances. »

Nestor Rosas
Travailleur étranger temporaire, Usine 5e Avenue

« Pour moi, travailler chez Lassonde, c’est travailler entourée de collègues incroyables sur qui on peut compter, expérimenter une liberté d’expression et une fierté du devoir accompli, tout en reconnaissant que je suis comprise, acceptée et respectée. »

Mireille Henry
Réceptionniste, commis payables, Usine Boisbriand

« Je suis ravie de faire partie de la famille Lassonde, car nous représentons le meilleur fabricant de jus, ce qui me remplit de fierté à l’égard de nos produits! En tant que spécialiste des jus, j’ai aussi l’occasion de travailler avec d’autres chefs de file de l’industrie pour créer des présentoirs amusants et attrayants pour nos clients! »

Donna Van De Walle
Représentante des ventes au détail, Canada

« Travailler chez Lassonde me rend heureux : on y trouve une excellente culture, un environnement respectueux et une ambiance amicale. »

Shailesh Mehta
Électricien spécialiste, Usine Toronto

la cidrerie
EXPLORE LA CIDRERIE MILTON

Là où la diversité des cidres rivalise avec la beauté de la vue sur le mont Yamaska. Enracinés à Sainte-Cécile-de-Milton depuis un siècle, notre mission est de partager notre expertise. À la Cidrerie Milton, on crée des moments inoubliables autour de la pomme. Avec des vergers dénombrant 51 variétés, nos experts de la pomme ont un ou deux trucs à raconter.

NOS CIDRES

AU DELÀ DE LA CIDRERIE

En plus de tous nos breuvages à base de pomme, on a un univers gourmand complet à partager. Des plats cuisinés sur place, des pommes fraîches et des produits locaux à mettre dans ton panier. Dans un bistro décontracté, choisi parmi une sélection de sandwichs et de soupes, et n’oublie pas de faire un tour au bar où on offre des dégustations de cidre.

Difference About Us
WELL-TENDED ROOTS

Since 2003, our goal was to build a thriving global produce business, offering premier products at competitive prices with exceptional service. And we’ve grown so far!

DEDICATED LEADERSHIP

We believe in the pursuit of excellence, being a positive influence, and taking responsibility while embracing our values to provide exceptional direction for our company.

COMMUNITY SUPPORT

Nurturing communities is at the heart of Fresh Direct Produce, where every fruit shared and every race run supports local charities and organizations, fostering a culture of compassion and collective growth.

À Propos

Histoire

Delta Pharma a été fondée en 2000 par le couple formé de Robert Fairbairn et de Kathleen Muloin.

Robert Fairbairn, Ph. D, est un chimiste fort de plus de trois décennies d’expérience dans l’industrie des produits pharmaceutiques, cosmétiques et de santé naturels, demeure le moteur de l’innovation chez Delta en matière de recherche et de développement.
Après avoir passé la majeure partie de ses 25 ans de carrière comme directrice des ventes et du marketing, Kathleen Muloin s’est jointe à l’entreprise à plein temps et supervise actuellement l’ensemble du développement des affaires et des partenariats stratégiques.

Ensemble, ils ont bâti une entreprise dynamique qui a fait ses preuves grâce à une livraison efficace de produits et une équipe performante qui accorde la priorité à la qualité, à la conformité et au service à la clientèle.

En tant que société privée et indépendante, Delta Pharma a pour seul objectif la réussite de ses clients et après plus de 15 ans en affaires, nous mettons tout en œuvre pour apporter une valeur ajoutée et mesurable à nos partenaires.

Notre équipe

Delta Pharma, établi à Montréal, QC, est un sous-traitant de premier plan destiné aux industries Pharmaceutiques, cosmétiques et de produits de santé naturels, pour la fabrication, l’emballage ainsi que la recherche et développement.

Nous sommes spécialisés dans la fabrication sur mesure de crèmes, lotions, gels, onguents, sérums, liquides, suppléments vitaminiques et plus encore.

Dominion Citrus Divisions
Dominion Citrus Wholesale
Dominion Citrus has been in the business of buying and selling fresh produce since 1935. We operate out of the Ontario Food Terminal in Toronto and offer an extensive commodity lineup and operate both domestically and internationally.
More Info ›
Country Fresh Packaging
Country Fresh Packaging is a divsion which offers fresh produce under our unique "Country Fresh™" brand as well as value-added services including grading, bagging, colour sorting, packaging and stroage for retail and food service customers
More Info ›
Dominion Farm Produce
Since 1956, Dominion Farm Produce Limited has been operating in Bradford, Ontario. It packages, markets and distributes fresh produce from the Holland Marsh under the “Country Fresh™” brand, as well as other private label packaging.
More Info ›
Meschino Banana
Established in 1920, the Meschino Banana Company currently operates in Toronto, Ontario. It imports, ripens, monitors and controls the maturation of bananas and plantains for retail and food service customers in Ontario.
More Info ›
Les Aliments Dominion Citrus Limitee (Bo-Fruits)
Bo Fruits is a Quebec based distributor of fresh produce. With our beachhead into Quebec, we help companies on both sides of the provincial border build and expand participation into new geographic territories.
View Info ›

About Dominion Citrus

Dominion Citrus Limited, a wholly-owned company of Dominion Holding Corporation, is a collection of fresh produce growers, packagers, distributors, and sellers.  We have been serving wholesalers, retailers and food service companies both large and small since 1935.  Our various divisions specialize in unique products and services to meet diverse consumer and business needs.  

Dominion Citrus also offers a suite of integrated services including procurement, international logistics, ripening, sorting and grading, packaging, distribution, marketing solutions, and more.

Coastal Enterprises Ltd. was incorporated in 1971 by the late Harley Thompson who came from a family of fish buyers and processors dating back to the early 1900’s. This family owned and operated business has been serving the area for over 30 years.

Our head office is located in the beautiful and picturesque village of Dipper Harbour, N.B. Canada. We have 15-20 employees here, 6-8 employees at our Misty Harbour Seafood Plant. Our buyers are located on most major wharves from Beaver Harbour to St. Martins, N.B. We purchase fresh fish and shellfish directly from the fishermen on the Bay of Fundy.

Beechgrove Country Foods Inc. has developed a very comprehensive product line of pizza toppings and other fully cooked meat ingredients for high profile customers.

Our customers will benefit from the following key features:
Food Safety HACCP Recognized facility with an experienced and dedicated Quality Assurance team. In house laboratory equipped to verify raw material and finished product to meet customer specification.
Full-line pizza meat toppings supplier with equipment and technology that allows for slice, diced and whole piece product.
Comprehensive product line meeting the needs of the food service and alternative markets.
Full line of Halal Certified pizza topping products.
Direct line of communications – fast decisions and quick response time.
Wide range of standard products that can be easily adapted to customized products at excellent product quality and quick turnaround time.
Research and Development done in-house with staffing that have more than 30 years of product development expertise. Product profiles developed to meet and exceed your expectations.
State-of-the-art manufacturing and innovation resulting in long-term partner relationships.
The best products.


Dry cured and traditional cooked pepperoni
can be customized to the customers’ specific requirements. Our fully cooked product can be smoked, and unique flavours and spices can be developed to suit the needs and requirements of the customer.
Ham
can be developed as Savory, Sweet or Smokey. Fully cooked and prepared as slice, dice or whole to be sliced as the customer requires.
Bacon Strips and Bacon Chips
fully cooked to the customer’s needs. Bacon strips and Bacon chips can be prepared with smoke or any flavour profile to create the exact product required by the customer.
Beef, Pork and Bacon crumbles
fully cooked crumbles to the customer’s needs. Beef, pork and bacon crumbles can be prepared with smoke or any flavour profile to create the exact product required by the customer.
Italian Sausage and Sausage crumbles
blended with quality flavours and spices to give the unique and exact flavours required. They can be prepared as hot Italian to sweet and savory.
Chicken Strips
can be developed as Savory, Sweet or Smokey. Fully cooked and prepared to customer needs.
Salami
fully cooked beef salami.
Halal Products
cooked pepperoni, beef crumble, beef salami and chicken strips (regular and tandoori style).
The best partner for
your business.
Beechgrove Country Foods Inc. is a federally inspected meat plant, located in Toronto , Ontario , Canada .

Beechgrove Country Foods Inc. received HACCP Certification from the CFIA (Canadian Food Inspection Agency) in June of 1999 and was one of the first 50 plants in Canada to reach this milestone. We consider this a cornerstone accomplishment in our history as a North American food processor.

HACCP means that food safety is a clear priority at Beechgrove Country Foods Inc. Combined with our devotion to customer satisfaction, service, and quality; Beechgrove pizza toppings and other meat products offer extraordinary value and performance.

Over the years, Beechgrove Country Foods has developed expertise in export marketing and has moved successfully into many international markets. In addition to Canada, our products are distributed in the USA, Mexico, Japan and China; and we have created reliable logistics solutions to guarantee on- time deliveries.

Samosa and Sweet Factory was established in 1989 by the Sandhu Brothers, Mr. Harpal Sandhu and Mr. Harminder Sandhu. ABOUT US

Our goal for the future is to protect, enhance, conserve and continue to restore our salmon stocks so that we can have salmon for tomorrow.

Read More
OUR JOURNEY

Only two populations of Sockeye remain in the Columbia River, and Okanagan Sockeye is one of them. Bringing our salmon back from the brink of extinction required six complementary initiatives.

Read More
WILD SALMON

The Okanagan Sockeye perfectly expresses the unique conditions of our land and water. Peachy rose in colour, this sockeye offers near perfect balance: buttery light and juicy yet refined.

Read More
THE FISHERMAN

Beliefs and traditions are a very important part of First Nations’ culture and often reflect a deep understanding and respect for nature. We honor their roots by using holistic traditional practices of selective fishing—handed down from our ancestors.

STORIED ISLAND TRAIL
INFO

Fortress Louisbourg Association (FLA) is proud to acknowledge that we operate and reside in Unama’ki (1 of 7 districts) of Mi’kma’ki, the ancestral and unceded territory of the Mi’kmaq People.

This territory is covered by the “Treaties of Peace and Friendship” which Mi’kmaq, Wolastoqiyik and Passamaquoddy People first signed with the British Crown in 1725. The treaties did not deal with the surrender of lands and resources but, in fact, recognized the Indigenous title and established rules for what was to be an ongoing relationship between nations.

We are all Treaty People.

FLA also recognizes the 400+ year history of communities of African descent and the 50 Strong and Resourceful African NS communities that exist today. We acknowledge our commitment to the struggle against systems of oppression that have resulted in profound inequities and the denial of self determination rights.

FLA is committed to work actively to deepen our learning and provide learning opportunities about anti-racism and decolonization to the sector, and to develop partnerships with organizations serving and led by underrepresented groups.

00:00

WELCOME
Fortress Louisbourg Association

We are a proud, non-profit, charitable, membership-driven organization. The Fortress Louisbourg Association works with Parks Canada in ways that ensure the commemorative and ecological integrity of the Fortress of Louisbourg National Historic Site is sustained for present and future generations. Founded in 1976, our three period restaurants, bakery, coffee shop, and two gift boutiques help visitors understand, appreciate and enjoy the largest reconstructed 18th century French fortified town in North America.

We are fun, friendly, family, The Fortress Louisbourg Association

The revenue the Fortress Louisbourg Association generates is used to support the Children's Animation Program, and a variety of visitor experiences, and services.

“Largest reconstructed 18th century French fortified town in North America.”

CHOCMOD, Chocolatier Confiseur depuis 1948

Chocmod, la Chocolaterie Moderne, est une entreprise familiale créée en 1948 dans le nord de la France. Leader mondial dans la fabrication industrielle de truffes de tradition française, Chocmod distribue ses produits de chocolat partout dans le monde sous sa marque (Truffettes de France) ainsi que sous marques distributeur.

Expert dans l’art de sublimer le chocolat selon un savoir-faire français, Chocmod propose une large gamme de produits : truffes fantaisie, truffes au chocolat, truffes bio, guimauves et meringues enrobées de chocolat.

TRUFFETTES DE FRANCE
LA PASSION DU CHOCOLAT DEPUIS 1948

Truffettes de France ou la rencontre entre créativité, innovation et excellence. De la truffe au cacao, à la truffe au chocolat élaborée par un Meilleur Ouvrier de France Chocolatier (et champion du monde la discipline) en passant par des guimauves tendres à souhait, rien n'est laissé au hasard : tout est fait pour vous régaler! Depuis toujours et pour toujours, Truffettes de France c'est du bonheur en une bouchée ! Découvrez notre gamme de produits de tradition française remis au goût du jour.

Hello!!! I just wanted to tell you how much I love your donair packages that I buy from Sobeys. I am OBSESSED. I buy them once a week at least. My boyfriend said he is so sick of donairs. I joke around and always put a Mr. Donair kit in the grocery cart when we are out shopping. I am craving one now just thinking about it. My favourite meal is a Mr. Donair kit with some provolone cheese. YUM! It is my Birthday next week and he told me he will cook me whatever I want for supper, little does he know I will be requesting a Donair Kit.  I lived in Alberta for a while a long time ago, and I am not sure if you sell your products there or not but I have sent my friends from out west photos of donairs I have made with your kit and the responses I got were things like "that looks amazing." and "drool". Nova Scotia is the best place for donairs, and I swear yours is the best. You would make a killing for sure if you sold them there.  Thank you very much for your donairs!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
​
~ Tiffany

My name is Daughney, I'm from New Brunswick, and I love Donairs. Growing up, Donairs were an occasional treat. They could be purchase readily in my small town of Miramichi. I now live in Hamilton, Ontario and find it hard to come by a good donair.  A few weeks ago I was killing time in a Giant Tiger when I came across your products. Skeptical about the legitimacy of donairs from a store, I hesitated to buy. My curiosity get the better of me and I bought a box. Your product was soooo good I went back and bought 4 boxes.  I have never sent a feedback on a food product before, but I couldn't help but take the time. Your donairs brought figurative tears in my eyes because for a moment I felt like a kid sitting at my kitchen table eating donairs with my family. Thank you and your team for making Donairs. It was the nostalgic experience I've been searching for. I hope to be making these donairs for my family for years to come. Keep up the great work !

~Warm regards, Daughney

Les Produits Zinda
Zinda est le premier manufacturier au monde à infuser le couscous. Tous nos produits sont fait de saveurs naturelles et certifiés Aliments du Québec, 100% canadiens. Découvrez nos gammes de Couscous Perlé, Quinoa Biologique et Olives Balsavour rapides et faciles à préparer.

FAIT DE BLÉ CANADIEN
Des Saveurs Authentiques
C’est dans les saveurs et surtout dans le savoir-faire
(Un mélange d’instinct, d’amour et de gourmandise) que Zinda trouve toute son inspiration.
En choisissant Zinda, vous optez pour la qualité et la fraicheur d’un produit purement canadien, fabriqué au Québec.
NOS RECETTES
NOS PRODUITS
Tradition Importée... Exportée...
L'HISTOIRE DE ZINDA
NOTRE ENTREPRISE
NOTRE MISSION

Depuis sa fondation en 2000, Zinda offre à sa clientèle le meilleur du blé. C’est dans une fusion entre la qualité hors pair du blé Canadien et de l’héritage du savoir-faire transmis à travers les générations que Zinda est devenu un chef de file nord-américain.

Étant manufacturier de couscous conventionnel et biologique depuis ses débuts, l’entreprise a élargi son offre à travers les années, en 2015, Zinda a fait l’acquisition d’une nouvelle ligne de couscous pour fabriquer le couscous perlé connu aussi sous le nom du “couscous israélien“.

Par le passé, ce produit était importé d’Israël, actuellement, Zinda le fabrique et l’offre même en version biologique pour offrir à sa clientèle un produit frais avec des meilleurs ingrédients

yourbarfactory
Your Customized, Allergen-Free Bar Maker

Since 2001, we have produced hundreds of unique and flavourful bars for large companies and entrepreneurs.

We focus on rigorous quality control practices and fast turnaround to provide you with unparalleled customer service and a tasty bar that will satisfy your customers.

We are YOUR bar factory.

Design your
own protein bar

Whether you want to produce a protein bar with high protein, low sugar, organic, vegan, gluten free, dairy free, we know that it will have one thing : a delicious taste!

We have a large choice of quality pre-established ingredients. We produce protein bars coated with chocolate, lemon... The protein bar can be crunchy as well as soft. We have no limits in the creation of original and delicious recipes.

yourbarfactory
Traditional rice crispy square productor

Over the past 20 years, we have made more than 20 different types of rice crispy squares with more than 20 different flavors for large companies and entrepreneurs.

We are committed to pass the traditional taste of these marshmallow squares by reformulating sweet recipes to meet today's trends and diet limitations that a consumer may encounter.

Creator of Customized Bars
CUSTOMIZED RECIPES

We are experts in the development of allergen-free bars; we are recognized in the industry for our constant innovation, flexibility and speed of response in research and development.

TURNKEY SUPPORT

We assist you throughout the entire production process of your personalized bar, from its creation to its marketing. We will find all the ingredients for your success by targeting your most precise needs.

MODERN PLANT:

Our BRC-certified plant allows us to design your bars in a favourable and ultramodern environment, ensuring a high-quality product. Our team is constantly trained on current regulations regarding quality standards.

PLANT-BASED CHOCOLATE AND BANANA PROTEIN BAR

Our certifications

Ensuring the quality of our products is crucial to guarantee their perfection. Our multiple certifications are proof of our professionalism in quality assurance and our commitment to food safety.
Our plant is BRC and LEED certified. All our products are nut, peanut and gluten free. We also offer, upon request, multiple claims such as organic, vegan or kosher.

TRANSFORM YOUR CAREER

Proud to transform it all

To build a greener tomorrow for future generations.

Our expertise: reclaiming agri-food industry by-products and transforming them into industrial ingredients that are used to create everyday items.

At Sanimax, we make every effort to transform all of the materials we collect.

The agri-food industry generates huge quantities of unconsumed by-products. Sanimax reclaims and transforms them into ingredients that are useful for several industries. Our actions, which are at the very heart of the circular economy, give new life to more than 2 million tons of organic materials each year.

Transforming it all in 3 simple steps
Reclaim

Each day, our Transportation and Logistics team collects agri-food by-products from more than 25,000 sites across the Americas.

Renew

Our automated facilities are equipped with sophisticated control systems that produce high-quality ingredients to be used in a wide range of industries.

Return

The value-added goods manufactured by Sanimax are returned to companies that, in turn, use them to make everyday items.

Careers that make a difference
Careers
Concerned about how human activity is affecting the environment? At Sanimax, we work hard to minimize its impact every day.

At the heart of the circular economy. Connected to our communities

For 85 years and counting

Attuned to the needs of its employees, clients, and the communities in which it operates,
Sanimax distinguishes itself through tangible commitments that deliver results.

Our Sprouted Products

At Silver Hills Bakery, healthy bread is our passion. Our delicious, artisanally-crafted breads, buns, and bagels, are made from whole grains uniquely sprouted to nourish you and your family.

Discover All Products

Whole grains are healthy. Sprouting makes what’s already healthy about whole grains even better. Naturally!

Silver Hills Bakery sprouts the whole grains we use in our sprouted breads, buns, bagels and tortillas to help you get more of the nutrition that’s already there. Sprouted whole grains give you more, better-for-you nutrition that’s easier to digest, and gives you steady energy to fuel your full life.

Learn Why Sprouted Matters

Our Family-Owned Story

Family-owned and run since 1989, at Silver Hills Bakery, we know that for busy families, simple choices often have the greatest impact. That’s why we bake with sprouted whole grains and healthy, non-GMO ingredients.

Read Our Story

Healthy Recipes & Sprouted Inspiration

Sprouted bread is one slice of our mission to empower, educate, and inspire healthier lives. From delicious plant-based recipes that help you make healthy meals in minutes, to stories that help you make small choices matter, we’ve got you covered.

We are Freshouse Foods

We listen to your needs to make it Great!

That’s what separates our company from the rest. At Freshouse, we create custom protein items with the help and direction of you, our partners. We want to build our creations to meet and exceed your needs.

With over 60 years of major retail and foodservice experience, our expertise in product development has enabled the company to react swiftly to customer wants and expectations, where larger manufacturers often lag behind. Our flexibility and versatility on our production floors allow us to offer an array of retail, foodservice and healthcare products.

Our Responsibility

Who We Are

In 1957, Freshouse Founder, Joseph Belli, landed in Canada and opened his first Butcher shop in the meat packing district of Toronto. From those humble beginnings the business has grown to what it is today. Freshouse Foods is a privately owned company operating with two facilities in Southern Ontario.

With over 60 years of major retail and food service experience, our expertise in product development has enabled the company to react swiftly to customer wants and expectations, where larger manufacturers often lag behind.

The one thing that has remained constant from that first day in 1957… “Quality keeps them coming back.”

Who We Are

Together, let’s allow our inspiration to lead into ideas and our ideas into sustainable, profitable and delicious products.

About Us

Bimbo Canada is the country's largest and oldest bakery, feeding Canadians delicious and high-quality baked goods and snacks that they love for more than one hundred years.

Learn More
We’re Hiring!

We value our associates and offer nourishing careers with opportunities for growth, competitive salaries and benefits in an exciting, fast-paced environment.

Join Our Team
Our Brands
We are committed to nourishing Canadians with our very best. Our high-quality breads and snack products are loved by consumers across Canada.

Use Next and Previous buttons to navigate.

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
   
 
 
 
Our Sustainability Strategy

Bimbo Canada together with Grupo Bimbo is Nourishing A Better World by re-designing our present to build a better tomorrow. We are constantly evolving how we do business to maintain our commitment to operating a sustainable, highly productive and deeply humane company.

Baked For You

Providing a better nutritional experience through healthier whole grain and plant-based recipes and empowering consumers with transparent labeling, to make the nutritional choices that meet their needs.

Learn More
Baked For Life

Enriching the communities where we live and work through community support and providing a safe workplace free of discrimination and where all associates can feel they belong.

Learn More
Baked For Nature

Protecting and regenerating our natural systems by reducing our carbon emissions, supporting regenerative agriculture and targeting zero waste.

Learn More

We believe in cultivating long-lasting and positive business relationships.

Premium Live Lobster.
All Year Round.

Serving North America, Europe and Asia with premium, Nova Scotia Live Lobster, fresh from the ocean to your plate.



#novascotia #lobster #oceantoplate

Fresh from the Atlantic Ocean, to your plate.

I. Deveau Fisheries is one of the largest live lobster exporters and distributors from Southwest Nova Scotia, Canada, since 1981.




At I. Deveau Fisheries, our mission is to provide our customers in Europe, Asia and North America with the finest quality of fresh live lobster.




As a leader in the live lobster export industry, we sustainably harvest the very best lobster and deliver only the freshest quality from the Atlantic Ocean, to your plate.

WHY PICK US?

Premium Lobster | Sustainably Harvested
A Leader in Live Lobster Storage

Using a tidal pond storage system to replicate a natural habitat, I. Deveau Fisheries has created one of the largest live lobster storage facilities in North America.




Our motivation? A stronger, healthier lobster, that delivers quality and freshness to the plate.

Whelk

Unfortunately, the natural supply is in decline and we produce a very limited amount and supply is committed to customers early in the year.

Bienvenue aux gourmands !

Menu prêt-à-manger
Menu boucherie

Papillote à l’avant-garde

Notre histoire a débuté en 1982, alors que nous commencions à fabriquer des pâtes fraiches artisanales telles qu’on les trouve en Italie : préparées avec des ingrédients de toute première qualité, des œufs frais et de la semoule de blé dur. Qu’elles soient courtes, longues ou farcies, accompagnées des sauces concoctées par noter équipe, elles comblent les plus exigeants.

Quatre ans après notre ouverture, pionniers dans le prêt-à-manger, nous avons lancé les papillotes prêtes à manger qui sont la référence pour les gens qui cherchent fraîcheur et goût dans leur quotidien.

Découvrir le prêt-à-manger

Destination saveurs

Une boutique entièrement consacrée aux découvertes culinaires!

Magasinez vos marques favorites et découvrez des produits d’exception. Retrouvez entre autres une vaste sélection d’huiles et de vinaigres importés de plusieurs pays, une grande variété de thés et de cafés, un éventail de livres de cuisine, des pannetons haut-de-gamme, des accessoires d’art de la table, des confiseries et chocolats fins, des produits de notre terroir, etc.

Découvrir la boutique
Commande en ligne

Des produits de qualité

Une boucherie à l’européenne, conçue pour des clients qui recherchent la qualité et l’authenticité.

Nous proposons plusieurs producteurs locaux de viandes, gibiers et volaille, dont quelques-uns sont certifiés biologiques. Retrouvez également des produits complémentaires comme des marinades, des fonds, des sauces, des pizzas et autres produits d’exception pour préparer vos repas quotidiens tout comme vos festins.

Chewters Chocolates, with over 40 years of experience, proudly serves as a contract manufacturer for some of the World’s leading chocolate brands. Drawing on our wealth of knowledge and expertise, we collaborate with these renowned brands to bring their vision to life. Through our commitment to excellence and precision, we craft top-quality chocolates that meet the high standards of our esteemed partners.
Passionate People, Extraordinary Chocolate

Chewters is a passionate team of chocolate makers that partners with some of North America’s leading chocolate brands to produce some of the continent’s prominent chocolate brands that are distributed across conventional and natural channels.

OUR CHOCOLATE CAPABILITIES

CHOCOLATE MANUFACTURING CAPABILITIES

Our cutting-edge chocolate manufacturing facilities are designed to meet the diverse needs of our clients. With our dedicated team and advanced equipment, we deliver exceptional chocolate products that surpass expectations.

CHOCOLATE RESEARCH & DEVELOPMENT

Chewters' Chocolate Research & Development Lab is where chocolate dreams come to life. Our in-house chocolatiers work closely with clients to develop innovative recipes, supported by our state-of-the-art lab equipment and extensive industry experience.

CHOCOLATE PACKAGING SOLUTIONS

We recognize that packaging plays a vital role in the presentation and protection of our clients' products. Our comprehensive packaging solutions ensure that every chocolate creation is showcased in the best possible manner.

Food Roll Sales (Niagara) Ltd. is an industry leader in fully cooked, frozen food manufacturing (IQF), foodservice (bulk) and private label (foodservice or retail packaging), located in the Niagara region. We are one of the first processors of fully cooked, IQF chicken wings in Canada, providing quality, reliable service for over 30 years. We specialize in various types of chicken wings, chunks, drumsticks, and more. We proudly service all types of clients, from small retailers and distributors to large multi‐national retail chains and food processing giants, coast to coast.
After enjoying much success over the past 30+ years, servicing others and providing great products for you under private labels, we are extremely happy to offer you our very own line up of products under the brand “Food Roll™”

ABOUT US

Fresh Mix is a privately owned company dedicated to providing field-fresh, packaged and ready-to-eat produce and prepared foods in a variety of convenient formats. Our customers are the Canadian Retail Trade and the Food Service Industry. Our reputation stands for innovative high quality products, sincere customer care and exemplary service.

FOUNDED IN 1987 by Ester & Kurt Sattler

Fresh Mix is located in beautiful Barrie, Ontario. Here we have enjoyed over 30 years of growth and success; with the help of our amazing staff; and the support of the Canadian Retail and Food Service Industries.

The processing of food carries a significant responsibility to assure not only outstanding quality, but also absolute safety. Every single member of our team at Fresh Mix is well aware of the importance of these factors. Every one of our processing crew has completed in-depth training to understand their individual impact on products produced in our facility. We are proud to be a SQF certified facility.

PACKAGED & READY TO EAT

Bagged Salads . Bagged Vegetables . Custom Product Lines




Crisp Head Lettuce - Bulk, Packaged & Salad Kits

INNOVATIONS

1987- First Fresh-Cut Salad Bags for Retail in North America
1988- First Bagged Salad Kits - Complete Caesar Salad in N. America
1988- First Fresh-Cut Private Label Program in N. America
1990- First Fresh Dressing Program with Canadian Retail Chains
1992- First Organic Baby Lettuce Line co-packed for Canada and US
1992- First Salad Bowl Program in Canada
1993- First Salad Bowl Program including Protein in Canada

Fresh Mix Romain - Bulk, Packaged & Salad Kits

INNOVATIONS

1994- First Fresh Prepared Meal Program HMR w/ over 100 items
1996- First Export of Protein Added Salad Bowls into US Retail
1997- Launch Bulk Prepared Foods - Salsa, Bruschetta, Seafood
1998- First Bulk Protein Added Salad Kits for Food Service
2000- First Salad Basics Program, In-Store-Program Canadian Retail
2001- First Fresh Portioned Salad Dressings for Canadian Retail

Spring Mix - Bulk, Packaged & Salad Kits

INNOVATIONS

2002- Specializing in Custom Programs and Co-Packing
2009- Eat with your Head Brand Development
2009- Launch i am fresh Branded Line
2011- Launch fresh-a-fare Restaurant Maple Avenue, Barrie
2011- Production Launch fresh-a-fare Food Service and Brand
2011- Launch fresh-a-fare Restaurant Welham Road, Barrie
2012- Launch fresh-a-fare Restaurant Bayfield Street, Barrie

 

 

 

 

 
GROCERS
Fresh Mix Limited was the first to introduce Fresh Cut Salad Bag for retail in North America in 1987.
CUSTOM PACKAGING
Fresh Mix Limited started custom packaging Salad Bowls as well as adding Proteins to Salad Bowls in 1993.
WE ARE YOUR TEAM
We do not just test and package your product, we are here every step of the way ensuring quality and production control.
LETS GET GOING
Let us co-pack your product or use our recipes to brand your business, either way you deserve to work with Fresh Mix.

Fresh Mix Limited complies with all Canadian and Ontario government requirements for an accessible work place. We strive to create an inclusive environment, with equality, respect and decency; that is free of any form of discrimination for staff and customers; regardless of race, gender, ethnicity, age, religious beliefs, disability or sexual orientation. Fresh Mix is committed to an understanding workplace and will make all reasonable efforts to accommodate all staff, customers, or visitors for their individual needs. We work toward removing any barriers that can be without compromising personal or product safety. We welcome the application of individuals with disabilities, and accommodations are available on request by candidates if required. For more information, please contact us.

News and Stories
Innovation. Transformation. Glass Packaging.

Glass is a material unlike any other, capable of creating stunning, memorable experiences, and it’s the most sustainable packaging material on earth. At O-I, we have a history of transforming how the world stores food and beverages – of making glass more accessible to more customers and consumers. We reimagine how glass is made and sold by innovating production techniques, pioneering recycling and sustainable technology, and unleashing the iconic, brand-building potential of this packaging that is the kindest material for the planet and its people.

Read Our Story
OUR VISION
Shaping the Future Through Glass

We create iconic, healthy glass packaging so synonymous with brands, you recognize those brands by their packaging alone, even without a label. We innovate packaging design to enable customers to meet their own ambitions, from connecting with consumers on an emotional level to creating a more sustainable future.

Learn Our Vision
Innovation at O-I
OUR STORY
Driven Through Innovation

Innovation and transformation are in our DNA. O-I Glass was founded more than a century ago by a man whose glass bottle making machine was called the most significant invention in glass in 2000 years. Founder Michael J. Owens’ motto was “It can be done.” And we’re doing it. We’re reimaging what glass can do, making it the world’s most versatile, charismatic and sustainable packaging material.

OUR MISSION
Our Sustainability Vision

Glass is the ideal packaging material to support a low-waste, circular economy. But sustainability isn’t just about what we make – it’s also about how we make it. Sustainability is woven into everything we do, from transforming our glass-making technology and processes to our customer approach to how we engage our employees and support our communities.

Learn Our Mission
1
2
3
Power of
Glass Packaging

Glass is pure, sustainable, and the kindest packaging material for the health of people and the planet. Glass has an element of magic to it. It is beautiful and iconic. It can turn into shapes. It plays with the senses. Glass is 100% recyclable and infinitely recyclable. It does not increase ocean pollution. Glass is virtually inert, which means it doesn’t interact with the foods and beverages it holds.

We love glass and we aspire to create a healthier, more sustainable, and more exciting world through glass packaging.

Discover Benefits of Glass
Guided by Our Values

At O-I, we deeply care about our people and our culture. Guided by our values and behaviors, we’re constantly seeking to transform how we support and engage employees and the communities in which we work and live.

See Our Careers

CE QUI NOUS DIFFÉRENCIE

Nous accompagnons nos clients dans leur processus de décision, pour leur permettre de se différencier et d’augmenter la satisfaction de leurs clients pour ainsi stimuler leurs ventes.

Grâce à notre flexibilité au niveau de nos lignes de production et de notre équipe de R&D qui travaille de façon conjointe avec notre équipe des ventes, nous avons la possibilité d’offrir une gamme de produits plus étendue et adaptée aux goûts du jour, allant même jusqu’à développer certains produits à la demande de nos partenaires d’affaires.

NOS RECETTES

Jetez un coup d’œil à nos fiches recettes pour des idées de collations et de desserts succulents !

VOIR NOS RECETTES
NOS CLIENTS

Chaque jour, des milliers de Canadiens choisissent nos pâtisseries pour combler leurs fringales. On retrouve notamment nos collations dans des cafés, dépanneurs, épiceries, écoles et hôpitaux, ainsi que dans l’offre de multiples cafétérias ou traiteurs.

Nos produits sont aussi disponibles chez plusieurs détaillants, tels que : Loblaws, Club entrepôt Provigo, Métro, Sobeys (IGA), Mayrand, Pasquier, Aubut ainsi que dans les dépanneurs Couche-Tard, Boni soir, IGA Express et Transit Café (Parkland).

Nous sommes aussi très fiers de souligner notre collaboration comme manufacturier à des succès tels que Cookie Bluff et Félix & Norton.

EMPLOIS
PRODUCTION ET VENTE DE FROMAGES ET DE BEURRES BIO

Depuis 30 ans, les 9 familles fondatrices de L’Ancêtre mettent le bien-être animal au cœur de leurs valeurs. Leurs vaches nourries à l’herbe profitent des pâturages dès que la température le permet, font de l’exercice et vivent en meilleure santé plus longtemps. En appliquant les pratiques biologiques incluant l’agriculture régénératrice et la culture sans pesticide ni engrais chimique de synthèse, ils s’assurent de la santé des sols, de l’eau et de la biodiversité. Ces mêmes pratiques captent et stockent le carbone dans les sols, contribuant ainsi à la limitation des émissions de gaz à effet de serre et à la lutte contre le changement climatique. Autant de conditions pour produire un lait de haute qualité, plus nutritif et mieux équilibré que l’on retrouve dans nos fromages et beurres biologiques.

We keep it Simple!  We make it Great!
A Premium Product

All our pastas are uniquely made with rice grains freshly wet-ground and put to production.   To prevent cross-grain contamination at production, all our pastas are made with one type of grain only, i.e. rice.  No other grain, no wheat, corn, dairy, nuts, peanuts, preservatives or emulsifiers.

​

Our entire production and all machines is strictly committed to make rice pastas.  We do not use GMO ingredients and all our pastas are Non GMO Project Verified.  Vegan. Koshered.

​

One ingredient + vegetable powder (for vegetable rice pastas).  We have always your wellness and enjoyment in mind.  Certified Gluten-free, great for gluten avoidance, perfectly textured to fulfill any mission for indulging pasta meals!

ENJOY DELICIOUS CHINESE FOOD

Are you looking for Chinese food restaurants in Calgary? Walk into any Ginger Beef restaurant for a memorable dining experience. Ginger Beef Restaurants opened our doors in the mid-1980s, and for the last 40 years, we have provided the people of Calgary with three easy ways to experience Chinese food.

 

You can enjoy Ginger Beef Restaurants as:

​Ginger Beef Bistro House: A full-service restaurant with delivery and takeout options.

​Ginger Beef Express and Ginger Beef Peking House: Locations that only offer delivery and Chinese takeout with minimal seating. Amenities in food courts.

GINGER BEEF RESTAURANTS OFFER A WIDE RANGE OF MOUTH-WATERING CHINESE FOOD.

OUR LOCATIONS

Look for our full-service Chinese food restaurants in Calgary by the names of the Ginger Beef Bistro House and the Ginger Beef Peking House. Our food court, delivery and takeout locations go by the name of Ginger Beef Express.

GINGER BEEF BISTRO HOUSE

Our full-service, sit-down Chinese food restaurants in Calgary are perfect for sharing a hot meal with family and friends. Our bistro house locations also offer takeout and delivery. Located in Country Hills and Marlborough.

GINGER BEEF PEKING HOUSE

Our Peking House is a smaller restaurant that is located in the Brentwood Village Mall. This location provides sit-down services, as well as takeout and delivery.

GINGER BEEF EXPRESS

Our express locations offer takeout and delivery only. We have six locations across Calgary for convenient, fast, and delicious Chinese food any time you want it.
