Founded in 1975, Mortimer’s Fine Foods (MFF) manufactures a wide range of Frozen Pot Pies, Handheld Pastry Items,Quiche, Shepherd’s Pie, Frozen Entrées, Fruit Pies and increasingly Desserts

Ability to do refrigerated and fresh versions of these products as well we are licensed to produce any frozen entrée


We operate out of a substantial Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) approved manufacturing facility located in St Catharines,Ontario

 

 

We have two continuous pie lines:
A unique line for for handheld products and dessert pastries, scotch pie and shepherd’s pie capability, frozen entrées and quiches


Our facility is USDA and CFIA certified food processing plant authorized to produce, sell and distribute across North America


We primarily produce under private label and co–packing as well as through our own brand

Our Products
Product Capabilities

We have strong capabilities within the Pot Pie, Handheld, Quiche, Shepherd’s Pie, Frozen Entrées, Fruit Pie and increasingly Dessert categories

We are able to efficiently produce high quality product in a range of sizes and flavours

MFF is delighted to offer innovative products as well as more traditional flavours on a wide array of products within the above categories

For over 60 years, Smith's Quality Meats has been one of Manitoba's leading processors and distributors of high quality meat products. The Smith's brand is well recognized and well respected.

A proud Winnipeg-based company, Smith's has received third-party audit certification from the British Retail Consortium (BRC) Global Standard for Food Safety. BRC certification meets the Global Food Safety Initiative (GFSI) compliance requirements for suppliers to major retailers. Smith's Quality Meats also operates under H.A.C.C.P. recognition and government approval as a Federally Inspected Establishment #294.

Smith's Quality Meats offers a wide range of smoked, cooked and sausage products including corned beef, roast beef, salami, pepperoni and smokies. Smith's also supplies portion-controlled beef, pork, lamb, veal, and bison to the food service industry.

Sambro Imagination Library

Sambro Spirit Awards

Sammy Sambro

More

Sambro Area Community Association

The Sambro & Area Community Association (“SACA”) was formed to organize and run the annual Sambro Sou’Wester Days, a festival celebrating the rich history of Sambro and our Sambro Island Lighthouse.

​

Held the weekend after the Natal Day weekend in August, it’s a long time favourite which draws an ever-increasing crowd from near and far each year.  We love to see old friends come home to reconnect, as well as meet new friends who are just discovering our little corner of paradise.  Check out our News tab for more info!

​

SACA has expanded to run other events such as raffles, children’s movie nights, community breakfasts, and the Shay & McKay Annual Fishing Derby which raises money for a J.L. Ilsley scholarship. 

We've also recently become a committed affiliate of Dolly Parton's Imagination Library.  The Sambro Imagination Library, once sufficient funds are raised, will be mailing brand new age appropriate books out for up to 120 enrolled children in the Sambro Ketch Harbour Elementary School's catchment area.  You can help by making a charitable donation HERE which will benefit children in our own community.

​

In 2018, we consolidated with the Lionheart Society, combining resources to create a strong, effective and cohesive group working towards a better community.

​

SACA’s long-term goal is to build and maintain a full-service community centre for the area. This will be a great space for local clubs, groups, and individuals for events such as weddings, birthday and anniversary parties, meetings, health and wellness services, support groups, classes of all types, local business expos and more, and will include the option for licensed events.

​

We’re also working on building a mobility accessible fishing wharf and picnic area at Grand Lake.
 

Having our own permanent building would also mean the success of our annual Sou’Wester Days Festival would be less weather dependent, which is always a risk in Nova Scotia!

​

SACA sends out newsletters from time to time to let folks know about upcoming 50/50 draws and other fundraisers and upcoming events.

​

To make sure you don’t miss a thing, be sure to subscribe here

​

Donate

Donations are always appreciated. 

Etransfers can be sent to treasurersaca@gmail.com

Cheques can be made out to the Sambro Area Community Association

THE WORLD'S LEADING PRODUCER OF FRESHWATER LAKE SMELT.
“Our focus is only on providing our customers with the finest quality lake smelt, expertly processed to ensure its uncomparable freshness, sweet taste and maximum nutritional value.”


John Neate, President, Chief Executive Officer

RECOGNIZED FOR QUALITY, SERVICE AND INTEGRITY AROUND THE GLOBE.

Our history for fishing rainbow smelt from the freshwaters of Canada’s Lake Erie, dates back to 1911. Today, seasoned Captains and crew carry on the tradition, sailing Great Lakes Food trawlers from fishing villages between May and November ensuring consumers, our trade partners and the food service industry around the globe can enjoy our premium quality products.

About Us
Shaping Futures, Enriching Lives through Sustainable Ventures

The Nunatsiavut Group of Companies (NGC) is Nunatsiavut’s economic development corporation. Overseen by the Labrador Inuit Capital Strategy Trust, NGC is comprised of wholly-owned and majority owned companies and partnerships. Established in 2011, NGC is a for-profit corporation with diversified holdings in areas such as aviation, marine, logistics, construction, the fishery, real estate, and mining and development services.

Cheese Reimagined

Can you imagine a life without cheese? Sounds impossible, right? Now, picture a plant-based cheese that's irresistibly rich and satisfyingly creamy. With us, it's not just possible — it's a guarantee. You'll never have to live without the joy of cheese again.

Melty
Creamy
Stretchy
Cheesy
Unbelievable Melt, Pure Indulgence

Get ready for a melt that'll make you melt! Daiya's dairy-free cheese is a game-changer, melting flawlessly for that ooey-gooey satisfaction you love. Thanks to our Daiya Oat Cream™ blend, each bite is a creamy, dreamy delight. Who knew plant-based could taste this good and melt so right?

Dairy-Free
Non-GMO
No FOMO
Cheese Bliss
Is there any comfort food more iconic than cheese? Our new dairy-free cheese melts impeccably, offering a mouthwatering experience that stands out on its own… minus the actual dairy. Try melty, mouthwatering shreds, slices, sticks, and more – all made extra delicious with the first-ever Daiya Oat Cream™️ blend. Explore the whole starting lineup right here.
Discover Cheese
Pizza Perfection

Why can't every night be pizza night? With Daiya, it can be! Each bite of our pizza is plant-based perfection: featuring a crisp, thin crust, melty dairy-free cheese, and a perfectly balanced amount of toppings.

Explore Pizza & Flatbread
Mac & Cheese Magic

Mac & Cheese is *peak* nostalgia. Our dairy-free Mac & Cheese is no exception, incredibly melty, exceptionally creamy, and bursting with rich cheesy goodness. One bite and you'll be transported back to simpler times.

Explore Mac & Cheese
The Daiya Way
Inclusive Indulgence
Deliciously Easy, Incredibly Cheesy

Maybe it's our Pacific Northwest roots, maybe it's just being realistic, but at Daiya, we're about creating delicious moments that everyone can feel good about—plant-devotees, the plant-curious, and cheese aficionados alike. We're bridging the gap with our Daiya Oat Cream™ blend, ensuring that choosing Daiya means indulging in creamy, melty, and rich flavors crafted from plants. This is comfort food meant to be relished by all. So, let's raise a toast to a world where cheese doesn't come with conditions, and every bite is a celebration of taste and choice.

ORGANIC TUSCANY-STYLE MINESTRONE

Inspired by the rustic kitchens of Florence, our Organic Tuscany-Style Minestrone is a hearty, flavour-packed soup that’s brimming with organic vegetables and beans. Each spoonful transports you to the heart of Italy with its rich blend of tomatoes, beans, and perfectly seasoned broth. Ideal for those who crave the warmth and comfort of a traditional Italian meal, this soup is both nourishing and satisfying, offering a taste of Tuscany in every bite.

LEARN MORE
ORGANIC COCONUT CURRY

Indulge in the exotic flavours of our Organic Coconut Curry, where the velvety smoothness of coconut cream meets the subtle sweetness of organic sweet potatoes. Infused with fragrant curry spices, this vegan-friendly soup offers a symphony of warmth and comfort that will brighten even the chilliest of days. Perfect for those looking for a creamy, dairy-free option, this soup is both indulgent and nourishing, with layers of flavour that keep you coming back for more.

LEARN MORE
ORGANIC LENTIL SOUP WITH VEGETABLES

Hearty and wholesome, our Organic Lentil Soup with Vegetables is the perfect blend of tender lentils, nutrient-rich organic vegetables, and savoury spices. This soup is a warm embrace on a cold day, delivering all the nutrition you need without compromising on flavour. Each spoonful offers a satisfying balance of textures, making it the ideal choice for a comforting meal that fills you up and nourishes your body.

LEARN MORE
ORGANIC SWEET POTATO RED LENTIL SOUP

Savour the rich and creamy goodness of our Organic Sweet Potato Red Lentil Soup. This delightful soup combines the natural sweetness of organic sweet potatoes with the heartiness of pureed red lentils, all expertly spiced to create a satisfying, nourishing meal. It's perfect for those looking for a comforting, plant-based option that’s both wholesome and bursting with flavour.

LEARN MORE
WHY SPRAGUE?
PLANT-BASED AND READY-TO-EAT

Making healthy eating a breeze when you’re pinched for time or just don’t feel like cooking yourself.

MADE WITH HIGH-QUALITY INGREDIENTS

Sourcing local and Canadian grown ingredients whenever possible. All ingredients are the same you would use in your kitchen if you were making a soup from scratch.

RECYCLABLE PACKAGING

Pressure-cooked in 100% BPA-free and recyclable packaging. We avoid using plastic packaging due to its environmental impact.

NO PRESERVATIVES

Our products contain no preservatives, ever.

CFIA AND FDA REGULATED. BRC, ORGANIC, AND KOSHER CERTIFIED.

ABOUT

PRODUCTS

CONTACT

 

<

>

Hand Crafted Quality Confections Since 1922

 Peanut/Nut Free | Gluten Free | Egg Free | Dairy Free | Fat Free | Soy Free| Gelatin Free| Shellfish Free

Kosher - Parve | Vegan/Vegetarian Friendly

Bulk Fruit Slices

Packaged Fruit Slices

Hard Candy

Fruit slices are available in either regular size (14g per piece) or mini size (2.5g per piece). Bulk cases are 6x5lbs. Wrapped Fruit Slices are sold in a 20lb master case.

 

We would be happy to discuss your private label packaging requirements. Our packaging capabilities include trays from 2.5oz (70g) to 1lb (454g) as well as tubs and gable top boxes. We use high speed packaging equipment to ensure quality packaging at a fair price.

We manufacture a large range of traditional hard candy products which are all free of major allergens and Kosher certified.

ABOUT US

Company History

The company dates back to 1922 when two Englishmen, George Bond and Ronald Samuel started a confectionery manufacturing company in Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada called Bond and Ronald. The company manufactured sugar confectionery items and some chocolate specialties.  For many years, the firm remained small and localized to the Manitoba market.  Fruit slices were originally made from imported Agar seaweed strips which were cut, soaked overnight and then used to produce jelly in eighty pound batches. The jelly was cooked in an open gas-fired cooker and allowed to cool at ambient room temperature. The manufacturing process was slow and very labour-intensive. However, as Agar was and still remains one of the very best natural gelling agents to bring out true fruit flavour in jelly, our fruit slices always proved to be a popular item in the company's product line.

In 1957, Charles Fletcher bought the company and expanded operations. The fruit slice products were expanded, new packaging was developed and the product marketed throughout Canada. Fruit slices quickly became listed in grocery stores, department stores, and mass merchandise stores throughout Canada. In 1967, Mr. Fletcher split the growing company into two separate entities; Cavalier Candies Ltd., to concentrate on the manufacturing of sugar confectionery and Cavalier Foods Ltd. (formally Bond Foods Ltd.), to concentrate on imported confectionery products. In 1970's, flow wrapping of the fruit slices was introduced and the Pizazz "individually wrapped bulk line was developed.

In 1986, Walter Fletcher entered the family business and expanded operations further, including the Pizazz fruit slice line. Many of the fruit slice products' labour-intensive functions were mechanized and automated. Today, Cavalier Candies Ltd. is Western Canada's largest sugar confectionery manufacturer and the largest manufacturer of Agar Fruit Slices in North America.

Cavalier uses the finest ingredients in the manufacture of its fruit jelly slices. Quality ingredients have been carefully selected over the years and, where possible, natural colors, flavours and other ingredients are used. Cavalier fruit jelly slices are certified Kosher throughout the year and are annually certified "Kosher for Passover" under the careful supervision of Rabbi Babad from Congregation Tartikov, Brooklyn, NY.

 

We are SQF certified, click here to view SQF certificate. Cavalier markets and ships its products to customers throughout Canada and the United States.

OUR PRODUCTS

What we can make for you!

 Peanut/Nut Free | Gluten Free | Egg Free | Milk Free | Fat Free | Soy Free| Gelatin Free| Shellfish Free

Our Fruit Slices are always a great treat!  Made with Agar, our jellies are soft and sweet, not gummy and sticky like pectin based gels.

 

These agar jelly slices are packed full of flavor! You can never just eat one!

 

 Available Flavors:

Peach, Blueberry, Orange, Lemon, Lime

Cherry, Key Lime, Blue Raspberry, Raspberry, Strawberry, Apple, Grape, Watermelon, Pear, Grapefruit, and more!

 

● Packed in 5 lb (2.27 kg) Boxes

● Case packed 30 lb (6 x 5 lb)

● Approximately 32 count/lb (14g ea)

● Fat & Gluten free product

● 60 cases per pallet

● Kosher product

CERTIFICATIONS

Everyone at Cavalier Candies works very hard to ensure that all of the products we produce are of the highest quality and safety. Our plant is annually audited by an independent SQF Auditor and is Level 2 SQF Certified. We achieved the highest possible rating of Excellent on our 2017 audit. Please click here to view SQF certificate.

All products manufactured by Cavalier Candies are Kosher Parve certified and once a year we manufacture Kosher for Passover Jelly Fruit Slices under the supervision of Rabbi Babad from Congregation Tartikov, Brooklyn, NY. We adhere to the highest Kosher standards possible and ensure products which are not Kosher certified never enter our manufacturing facility. Please click here to see a copy of our latest Kosher certificate.

Cavalier Candies Jelly Fruit Slices are certified Gluten Free. Both our Fruit Slices and Hard Candy are also:

* Peanut/Nut Free

* Dairy Free

* Egg Free

* Soy Free

* Gelatin Free

* Fish/Shellfish Free

* Fat Free

* Vegan/Vegetarian Friendly

Winnipeg Old Country Sausage: Manitoba’s Choice For Quality Meats

To our family, Winnipeg Old Country Sausage isn’t just our business, it’s our passion and our legacy. For three generations we’ve preserved our recipes, from our time-honoured seasonings to using the same natural smoke, we’ve instilled tradition and heritage in to our products. Based in Winnipeg, our quality meats can be found everywhere from large commercial chains to small mom and pop grocers across Manitoba. We also handle large-scale orders for social and community events, we just ask for 4 days’ notice to get the order together. We have a broad range of quality products, here’s a list of just a few to whet your appetite:

World famous wieners

Natural casing bung Bologna

Bacon

Fresh sausage

And much more!

Our In-House Lab Ensures Our Products are Safe and of the Highest Quality

While we believe in our time-honoured traditions and recipes, we are committed to ensuring the quality of our products. That’s why we’ve invested millions of dollars over the last few years to build a modern, in-house lab to test raw meat coming in, and our finished product going out. This way we can personally ensure the quality and safety of our products. 

Our facility is Hazard Analysis and Critical Control Points (HACCP) recognized, which means we utilize a systematic preventative approach to food safety. This means that we don’t just inspect our finished product, but we also analyze our entire production system to identify and eliminate all potential hazards before they arise. To learn more about our commitment to quality, and taste, please give us a call!

Our Story

From humble roots to commercial success, learn the story of our family and our business.

Wrap It Up With Jardi Packing!
Learn more
About Us

 

Jardi has evolved into a dynamic company since its establishment in 1987. While being a solution provider, we focus on one principal core business: Packing and Co-Packing. We pack and co-pack all types of dry food products in a variety of containers for third parties who wish to outsource their packaging operations and work with a specialist. We are a solution provider and have been packing in cups, stand up pouch, pillow bags and lately aluminium cans, for over 35 years. In addition to our core business, we also offer an excellent distribution and importation services. As a matter of fact, Jardi owns 4 home brands distributed across Canada. The 4 home brands owned by Jardi are Amira, Jardi, Snack Pow and Candi Pow and account for over 200 different skus. 




Located in Sherbrooke (Canada), only one hour from Maine, Vermont and Montreal, Jardi offers an extensive range of bulk and packaging options. We take pride in importing products from all around the world while also offering eco-friendly options for packaging.

Expertise, Quality, And Cutting-edge Technology

 At Jardi Packing, our commitment to expertise, quality, and cutting-edge technology defines our identity and strengthens our position as the preferred packer.




Our facility, spanning over 24,000 square feet, is equipped with multiple production lines which offer impressive capacity and flexibility. But quality remains our absolute priority. Every step of our packaging process is rigorously monitored to ensure that your dry food products reach your customers in perfect condition, preserving their freshness and flavor. Being efficient and agile combined to the quality make us an ideal partner.




We don't just follow standards; we set them. Our state-of-the-art facility, coupled with our unwavering commitment to quality, makes us your trusted partner in the dynamic world of packaging.




Flexibility and Maximum Agility

 At Jardi Packing, we understand that each product and market comes with unique requirements. That's why we provide an impressive range of various formats and packaging options Every market and customer is different, and we understand that.




Our set up and operations offer maximum flexibility to customize the packaging of your products. Whether you're looking for practical, aesthetic, or eco-friendly packaging, we have the tailored solution for you.




At Jardi Packing, we thrive to help you find the perfect packaging which will showcase your products and sets them apart in the market. We are constantly evolving to meet the changing needs of the market. Our agility allows us to innovate and anticipate trends, ensuring a product offering that is continually improving.

You may also want to distribute our home brand families. In the event you wish to get our nuts, confisery, baking, spices.. etc. Please refer to the contact section.

About us
Domingos Meat Packers

is a family owned and operated business. Created by Horacio Domingos back in 1980, DMP is constantly striving to provide you with the best and freshest pork meat in the market. In order to do so, Domingos Meat Packers employes highly skilled workers and the most recent technology for meat processing and distribution.

HACCP Certified
HACCP Advantage

HACCP is a food safety program developed by the Ontario Ministry of Agriculture (OMAF) with input from the Canadian General Standards Board (CGSB). HACCP stands for "Hazard Analysis Critical Control Points" which means, all points in a production area that might have the potential to be a critical point is monitored as a measure of prevention. This ensures that only the safest quality food is shipped to customers

Pork Meat
Pork Meat Facts

PORK is moderately low in calories. PORK Leg, Inside Round - 138 calories; PORK Tenderloin -139 calories; PORK Loin, Centre-Cut Round -157 calories ; PORK is a very high source of Protein. PORK contains all eight essential amino acids needed to build, repair and maintain body tissues. (eg: PORK Loin, Centre-Cut Chop, broiled has 85g protein per 85g / 3oz serving)

WE MAKE DOGS HAPPY!®

An innovator and best-in-class manufacturer, Eurocan markets some of North America’s most trusted brands, including Barnsdale Farms and Bullwrinkles. Our products are available in pet specialty stores, large retail outlets, grocery stores and other retailers.

RIGHT HERE IN NORTH AMERICA

Eurocan Pet Products is located in New Hamburg, a small town near Kitchener, Ontario. With over 220,000 sq. feet of human-grade manufacturing, packaging, and shipping facilities, Eurocan has been producing high-quality pet products with the highest safety standards in mind for over 28 years. Our brands' chews and treats are CFIA and FDA inspected, are 100% traceable back to the farms we source from, and scored a Safe Food Quality score of 98%. We're proud to say we've sold tens of millions of chews and treats to satisfied customers.

We have developed a deep understanding of the supply-chain; from raw materials to store shelves, it is reflected in our dedication to quality and customer service. 

OUR BRANDS
BULLWRINKLES

Bullwrinkles are high quality pizzles, made in Canada from Federally-inspected and licensed suppliers. They are dried naturally so your dog will enjoy one of the longest lasting and most pleasurable chewing treats ever. These high protein, low fat treats have become a phenomenal success story all across North America.

HOUNDSTOOTH

Introducing a line of high quality all natural, hand made, slow baked dog treats. Dogs of all ages and sizes can enjoy our incredible line of products. Our treats are highly digestible, additive and preservative free. We make all of our treats in a food-grade plant. CFIA / FDA inspected, 100% traceable back to the farms we source from.

BARNSDALE FARMS

At Barnsdale Farms, we work hard to produce a wide assortment of quality dog treats your pet will love and you can trust. Whether you choose from one of our many premium packaged treats, or if you prefer one of our robust bones or bulk packaged items, you can be confident your best friend is getting our best, every time.

René Rey Chocolates Ltd. was established in North Vancouver, B.C. in 1974.

René Rey Chocolates Ltd. was established in North Vancouver, B.C. in 1974. The owner and founder, Mr. René Rey, was born in Switzerland and has been active in the chocolate business since 1957. His family business has a long, traditional history in chocolate manufacturing in Switzerland and was well known for outstanding quality products.

René Rey was educated in Switzerland and achieved high standing diplomas in the confectionary industry. He was a member of the Swiss Masters Confectioners Association and had many years of international experience in the chocolate industry in Sweden, England, Switzerland and Canada.

About Us
OUR STORY

We sold our first cheese in 1996, the culmination of six years of trial and error on the farm and in the kitchen by our founder David Wood. Then, as now, our cheeses are all handmade, using traditional methods and only natural ingredients. The list of what we put in our cheese is short – 100% pure goat milk, sea salt, dairy culture, and rennet. The quality of those ingredients is the key to its great taste.

Our cheese is made on beautiful Salt Spring Island, and we continue to be an entirely family owned and operated company with a team dedicated to the highest quality. We pride ourselves on delivering great taste in beautiful packaging and we guarantee that every cheese receives individual care and attention.

Our goal is to make simply the best tasting and looking cheese you will find, from one of the most beautiful islands in the world.
Join Our
CHEESE CLUB

Join our Cheese Club and receive first access to our  carefully curated monthly Cheese Boxes. Sign up for the General and/or Cheese Box newsletters to ensure you are aware of what we have available each month. From Valentines Day to Christmas Day, our boxes cover all the occasions when cheese makes a great gift.

RegisterLog In
Shop
OUR CHEESES

Artisan Goat Cheeses

At Salt Spring Island Cheese Company, we specialize in hand packaged artisan goat cheeses. All our cheeses taste just as good as they look, and we take care to make sure that all of them are beautiful.

 
Lemon Chèvre
 
Basil Chèvre
 
Truffle Chèvre
 
Pepper Chèvre
 
Smoked Salmon and Capers Chèvre
 
Spicy Feta
 
White Juliette
 
Garlic Chèvre
 
Romelia
SHOP ONLINE
Farm Shop & Café
VISIT US

While on Salt Spring Island, you will be warmly welcomed at our Farm Shop and Café (open July until Labor Day). You can also wander around the farm to see the animals, enjoy the scenery, and watch cheese being made through our viewing windows in our production facility. Be sure to grab a bite of our latest culinary creations in the café or at a quiet table in our garden.

FARM SHOP

We offer samples of all our cheeses, as well as selling accompanying foods and beverages. We sell a selection of local foodstuffs including chutneys, jams, crackers, vinegars, honeys, smoked salmon, and more, as well as a host of goods from further afield, such as olives and olive oils, teas, and cordial.

Feel free to wander around the farm, see the animals and enjoy the scenery or watch the cheese being made through our viewing windows in every room of our production facility.

In the summer months (starting March time change) we are open from 10-5pm, and in the winter months (starting November time change) from 10-4pm. In January and February we are closed on Tuesdays and Wednesdays.

CAFÉ

Our Café is now closed for the season — It will be opening again in the summer.

We serve simple delicious fare, pizzas, salads and our pride and joy, a goat cheese cake made entirely with our own cheese and served with seasonal fruit and berry compote. We use local ingredients as much as possible. We also serve gelato made out of the same goat milk that we use to make our cheese.

Enjoy your meal in our courtyard and nearby garden. Our café is a perfect place to spend an hour or so at the cheese company, enjoying the setting and ambiance.

ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT
Open Economic Development
Search
Search
KITASOO XAI'XAIS NATION
Empowering Community, Building Unity
IMAGE CREDIT: GREG SHEA
Learn More
WHO WE ARE
Kitasoo Xai'xais History

In the 1860s, our two distinct nations came together in Klemtu: the Kitasoo Nation of the islands and the Xai’xais Nation of the mainland. In addition to coming from different geographies, the Kitasoo and the Xai’xais didn’t speak the same language prior to the introduction of English. The Kitasoo are the southernmost group of the Tsimshianic language family and speak Sgüüxs (a southern dialect). The Xai’xais are part of the Wakashan language family and speak Xai’xais.​

 

Today, our community resides in Klemtu, on the east side of Swindle Island on BC’s central coast (about 500km north of Vancouver), in the heart of the Great Bear Rainforest. We have 517 band members, 319 of whom live on reserve. Our village is served by two grocery stores, a post office, cafe, community sports facility, bighouse, and a health clinic.

Learn More

IMAGE CREDIT: OWEN PERRY

WHAT WE DO
Protecting Our Traditional Lands and Waters

We have always had a plan for the lands and oceans and the creatures they harbour. It lives in our heritage, in our oral history and in our everyday decisions as to where we collect our food, and where we fish and harvest our trees. Since the modern world doesn’t understand our way of managing our lands and resources, we will write it down in order to explain our intentions.

Our vision for our land, sea, and resources is based on the best definition of the terms sustainable. To us this means the wealth of the forests, fish, wildlife and the complexity of all life will be here forever. It also means that we will be here forever. To remain here as the Kitasoo and Xai’xais people we need to protect, manage and enhance the resources and our culture in order to ultimately protect our heritage. We also need to live in the modern world and have jobs to sustain our families and community.

No one speaks for us. Mutual respect and understanding comes from meeting with us and gaining an understanding of our people and our lands. Listen, learn, and understand, then we can work together.  

IMAGE CREDIT: MOONFISH MEDIA

Our Premium brand, "Canadiana Pizza," offers a delectable selection of eight flavors, each carefully crafted to perfection. From classic combinations to unique and innovative creations, Canadiana Pizza brings a gourmet experience to every slice. Made with the finest ingredients, our Premium pizzas guarantee an unforgettable taste that keeps customers coming back for more.

More Info

For those looking for great value without compromising on taste, our Value brand, "La Famiglia,"provides an excellent choice. With six delicious flavors to choose from, La Famiglia pizzas offer an affordable option without compromising on quality. Whether you're seeking traditional favorites or exploring new flavor profiles, La Famiglia pizzas are designed to satisfy cravings while staying within budget.

More Info

With the acquisition of the Tumblers Pizza facility Canadiana Foods is proud to offer Tumblers Pizza brand to chain stores. By combining their expertise in frozen pizza manufacturing, Canadiana Foods is committed to delivering a delightful pizza experience to customers throughout Saskatchewan. With commitment to quality and authentic flavors, Canadiana Foods is excited to expand the reach of Tumblers Pizza and make it available to a wider audience through their extensive network of chain stores.

More Info

Experience the deliciousness of "Halal Dish," our Halal-certified frozen pizza brand. With four mouthwatering flavors, each pizza is carefully crafted using premium ingredients and Halal-certified toppings. Indulge in the perfect blend of taste and cultural authenticity with Halal Dish, offering a satisfying pizza experience for everyone to enjoy.

More Info

Introducing "Pizza for a Purpose": Sell our delicious pizzas to support your fundraisers! Partner with Canadiana Foods and offer a variety of premium and value pizzas, including our popular brands. Whether for schools, teams, or charities, Pizza for a Purpose helps you achieve fundraising goals while enjoying tasty pizza.

More Info

C’est pour cette raison qu’il faut bien s’hydrater tout au long de la journée pour permettre un bon fonctionnement général de notre corps. Pour conserver un bon équilibre en eau, le principe est simple : le volume d’eau qui sort du corps (ex : transpiration, urine, selles)…

Vos fromages préférés depuis 1930
DÉCOUVREZ NOS FROMAGES

Le fromage St-Laurent, c’est le cheddar frais, bien entendu, mais c’est aussi une variété de fromages spécialisés tous aussi succulents les uns que les autres.

TOUJOURS LE MEILLEUR FROMAGE EN GRAINS

Toujours frais du jour, le cheddar en grains de la fromagerie St-Laurent jouit
d’une excellente réputation depuis fort longtemps.

GOÛTEZ À NOS BEURRES ONCTUEUX

Grâce à la qualité exceptionnelle du lait produit dans la région du Saguenay-Lac-Saint-Jean,
notre beurre possède une saveur riche et une onctuosité inimitable.

FABRICATION DE QUALITÉ SUPÉRIEURE

Notre établissement est agréé par l'Agence Canadienne d'Inspection des Aliments. Tous les contrôles, tests, analyses et procédures que nous appliquons ont un but précis: assurer un produit de qualité supérieure et une satisfaction totale de notre clientèle.

Next Prev
NOTRE HISTOIRE

Connue et reconnue dans tout le Saguenay-Lac-St-Jean, la Fromagerie St-Laurent aura été l'œuvre de toute une vie: celle de Maurice Saint-Laurent. Ses proches gardent de lui l'image d'un homme vaillant et acharné.

Découvrez notre histoire
RECETTE DU MOIS
Beurre à la lime

Facile à préparer, notre beurre à la lime possède la réputation d'être délicieusement assorti à vos fondues, pâtes et repas de fruits de mer. Ajoutez cette recette à vos plats et remarquez toute la différence d'un produit St-laurent.

Essayez nos recettes
NOTRE COMPTOIR

Que ce soit pour se régaler de fromage frais du jour ou pour déguster une savoureuse crème molle, notre comptoir laitier est ouvert tous les jours, été comme hiver!

Visitez notre comptoir

L'Érablière le Chemin du Roy

Anniversaire, retrouvailles, réunion pour clubs sociaux : toutes les occasions sont bonnes pour venir profiter de notre magnifique forêt !

L’Érablière Le Chemin du Roy se distingue par son décor enchanteur et sa savoureuse cuisine. Nichée au cœur de la tradition québécoise, notre cabane à sucre des années 1920 vous séduira par son charme authentique.

Dans une atmosphère chaleureuse en pleine forêt, notre cabane est l’endroit idéal pour célébrer toutes sortes d’événements. Réunion d’affaires, repas traditionnel en famille ou entre amis, table champêtre ou rassemblement convivial, nous sommes prêts à vous accueillir avec plaisir.

Contactez-nous pour discuter de votre projet ! Nous avons hâte de partager avec vous des moments mémorables.

Product, Market Share, Growth Opportunities

1
2
Vision Food Innovations has used experience and innovation to develop delicious and nutritious baked goods that include superfoods. Under the hero brand Nature’s Flair we have gained significant traction in the plant based food market.
	
Market Opportunity

The plant based market grew at 27% per year (US CAGR) 2017 – 2019. The market is expected to continue to grow at a CAGR of 11.9% from 2020 to 2027 to reach $74.2 billion by 2027, $161.9 Billion globally. By offering added nutrition through superfoods and making a delicious product, Vision is going after the whole market, not just the plant based market.

There is strong 7% ($420 M) annual growth in sweet baked good snack segment from the current $6 B with buyer’s behaviour tilting towards alternative health and plant-based products (AC Nielson)

	
Business Model
Initial sales into the retail take home bakery market. 80% of sweet bakery good buyer’s purchase muffins. We’ve partnered with experienced brokers to secure listings in larger retailers and developed local delivery to go direct to consumer.

The technology to use superfoods and novel ingredients to ensure the products taste delicious and are nutritious can be used in many other product lines, including cup cakes, brownies and even nutritious dog treats.

	
Efficiencies
Vision has its own facility that is able to produce 600,000 muffins a month. The company can scale through automation and expanding into the next door unit. We have the ability to meet the rapidly expanding demand from the market.
	
Traction

Founded in May 2020, we secured a 20,000sq ft facility in Georgetown, Ontario in September 2020. In the same month we undertook detailed market research to truly understand the marketplace. By Q1 2021, we had completed the construction of the facility and started production.

Working with our partners we have secured orders for Metro Inc., Sobeys Inc. and Whole Foods Market to name a few. Building on the traction, we are continuously adding new partners and expanding across Canada.

Upcoming Event

We are participating in the CHFA NOW, Canada’s largest trade show and conference. We will have the opportunity to present our Plant-Based baked goods, and meet different businesses dedicated to natural, organic & wellness products.

JOIN US LIVE AT CHFA NOW – VANCOUVER CANADA

Vancouver Convention Centre, West Building Booth #2150 on April 1st and 2nd, 2023 at 10AM – 5PM PT

 

Board of Director

I’ll be happy to respond to your questions 

 

Vineet Jain
President & CEO

B,Sc (Agriculture), MS (Food Science Tech), MBA (Ivey School)

Vineet is a bakery Industry veteran and has held many senior and executive position in companies such as Weston Bakeries, Bakerhaus, etc. He has a strong industry relationship and good knowledge of business.

We’re Driving Profitability with Vegan Plant Based Offerings. We’re focused on innovative plant based offerings that are delicious, better for you and don’t cost the earth.

We’re ready to scale.

In Memoriam
Abate Packers LTD

The Abate brand is quality meat from Ontario farmers.

The rabbit is all white meat, and is as versatile to cook with as chicken but has a higher nutritional value. (Recommended by the American Heart Foundation, and the AMA recommends it for people on special diets as it is low in fat and is more heart healthy.)

You will find rabbit in the finest of restaurants, grocery stores, and the world over! Give it a try, YOU’LL LOVE IT!

In addition to rabbit, Abate Packers processes and distributes many other quality game meats such as: Cornish Hens, Pheasant, Quail, Squab, Duck, Roaster Chickens, both Air and Water Chilled, Goose, Muscovy Duck, and Guinea Fowl.

We also have added value products such as boneless Chicken Supreme’s for stuffing and Boneless Chicken parts such as boneless breast, thigh, and leg meat.

DELIVERY

We deliver to most cities and small towns in Ontario.

We have our own fleet of trucks to help meet our customers needs in southern Ontario and the surrounding area.

Northern Ontario Routes are delivered using ERB Transportation as out carrier.

FROM THE OCEAN TO YOUR PLATE
World-class freshness and quality from Brown’s Bay Packing.

Jamie Prodaehl- Photo Taken July 16, 2020

We lost our friend and colleague Jamie Prodaehl in a tragic accident on January 17, 2023. Jamie was a straight talking, hard working, jack of all trades, who was a mainstay for Browns Bay Packing for decades. He never missed a day of work in 27 years, who coordinated football and hockey pools, industry slow pitch and golf tournaments and was proud of his work and his company. 

We are deeply saddened and he will be truly missed! 

Wastewater Innovation Update!

We have had a busy spring and summer processing farmed and wild salmon. Processing wild salmon for food and ceremonial purposes for 11 Vancouver island First Nations was a first for us in 33 years of business. It’s been a while since we have posted pictures of our treated effluent so here is our latest photo. 

Fish Effluent

September 2022

We continue to post the results of all of our effluent sampling please see the link for 2021 results below. 

Our quarterly results for 2022 will be posted as soon as we receive it. There will always be concern for our discharge, which is why we remain committed that the contents of our effluent meet or exceed regulatory standards. Quarterly Reports Click Here

For the most recent work on PRV click here!

We hope the great weather last well into the fall and that you all find time to enjoy it. 

—Browns Bay Packing 


Doug John of Browns Bay Packing  

Vancouver Island Food, Social and Ceremonial Fisheries- August 2022

This past week, we helped nine different Vancouver Island first nations with offloading and processing, and distributing over 60,000 sockeye for their Food, Social and Ceremonial Fisheries (FSC). We experienced again how important that the sockeye is to First Nations. It was like the world stopped last week and the only thing that mattered was ensuring the fish arrived. We were able to experience something that is critical to our Island First Nation neighbors and friends. We experienced first-hand the cultural importance of the sockeye to First Nations.

 

Over the past several decades the coast of B.C. has witnessed the closure and decline of many wild fish processing operations. There is critical shortage of ice and processing facilities, docks, totes, fish pumps and trucking. As an aquaculture service provider, we maintain all of this infrastructure.  After witnessing the logistical challenges of the 2014 and 2018 Fraser River sockeye run, we were ready for the chance to help. Therefore, we were able to easily assist in the food fish and the FSC. We are humbled and grateful to play a role in the 2022 fishery.

Sincerely

Browns Bay Packing Team

Tradition to
Innovation

Phyllo pastries are a staple in Greek, Middle Eastern and Balkan cuisines, an artisan tradition passed down for generations. Akropolis pastries started as a small family neighbourhood bakery in Toronto’s historic Greek town making traditional phyllo pastries and has expanded to serve phyllo pastry lovers across Canada and the United States. Innovation in production and blending North American flavours with traditional has helped appeal to a wider audience.

Proudly Made in Canada from Authentic Italian Roots
The Duso Family travelled from Italy over 50 years ago and founded our company in Canada using authentic family recipes from the old country.
Our Creations

Duso’s Authentic Italian Fresh Pasta and Sauces use only the highest quality, locally sourced ingredients. That’s how we bring the ultimate quality and freshness to you and your family, while proudly supporting our local Canadian farmers and suppliers.

Fresh Pasta

Our thin pasta is made with 100% durum semolina – a hard flour with a higher protein count than regular flour. It gives pasta a great flavour and bite. The second ingredient is cage-free eggs, and we’re the only Canadian pasta maker to use cage-free eggs. The final ingredient is filtered water. It’s that pure and simple!

Learn More
Savoury Sauces

Duso’s creates amazing fresh sauces from our authentic Italian family recipes. Our Alfredo sauce is made using 100% true dairy – cheese is a critical ingredient here, and we carefully select only the best Canadian cheeses. Our tomato-based sauces are thick and chunky, and made from high quality, ripe tomatoes with no sugar added. And our pesto sauce is made using fresh basil – that’s why it is bright green and tastes so fresh!

Learn More
Unique Creations

Duso’s is famous for our unique variety of specialty filled pasta recipes. With more than twenty varieties to choose from, you can treat yourself to extraordinarily delicious fine fare like Lemon Ricotta Mezzaluna, Braised Beef Pot Roast Ravioli, and our best selling Roasted Garlic Chicken Tortelloni!

Learn More
Organic Selections

We want everyone to be able to experience our delicious recipes at home. That’s why we at Duso’s strive to constantly innovate new recipes for your unique tastes – and dietary restrictions. We currently offer a full range of 100% organic pastas, and we are finalizing recipes now for egg-free and fully vegan pasta offerings, including plant based Mushroom Bolognese Ravioli and Vegan Three “Cheese” Tortelloni.

Learn More

About Us

Our Founder, Mauro Duso, and his family moved from Italy to Canada in the 1960s. They brought with them their authentic family recipes, founding Duso’s Fresh Pasta & Sauces and opening our iconic first retail location at Granville Island Market in Vancouver, BC. With business booming, Mauro established our current production facility in Port Coquitlam, BC. Today Duos’s supplies retailers at over 800 locations across Canada with our locally made, authentic Italian pastas and sauces!

Welcome to Anna's Cake House, proudly celebrating 50 years of baking excellence! Founded by Anna, Ronald, and Kathleen Cheung in 1974, we remain a family-owned business dedicated to quality and freshness. We use only the finest ingredients with no additives or preservatives and our treats are baked fresh daily. We don’t cut corners when it comes to ingredients and use Canadian butter and cream as well as local ingredients when they are in season. Join us in celebrating this milestone and experience the exceptional taste that has made us a beloved part of the community for half a century!

Sign up for promotion
Order Online

Order Your Favorites Online! Anna's Cake House now offers four of our most popular cakes for online order, making it easier than ever to enjoy our delicious treats. For additional flavors, simply call or visit one of our four locations. We're here to make every celebration a little sweeter with our delicious, freshly baked treats!

BEST SELLERS
Share Your
Sweetest
Memories
and get a chance to win a special gift!

As we celebrate 50 years, we invite you to share your favorite moments with Anna's Cake House. Whether it's a special occasion or a simple treat, we want to hear your stories. Submit your write-ups for a chance to win prizes and be featured on our website. Join us in celebrating and let's create more cherished moments together!

Dutch Translation Calgary | Certified Dutch Translators

Our company specializes in professional Dutch to English and English to Dutch translations. We are ready to take care of all of your translation needs. You will be amazed at the level of customer service we provide, regardless of the nature of your translation – whether it is a simple birth certificate for immigration purposes or a large ongoing business translation project.

Dutch Translation Calgary invested in gathering a team of professional and experienced translators fluent in both Dutch and English languages those offer not only an incredible knowledge of language but also provide deep industry knowledge. In most cases such knowledge is crucial for successful translation especially in such fields as legal documents translations, or translation of most technical documents, patents and creative ventures. From translating a web-site or marketing campaign to reworking a patent application, Dutch Translation Calgary will provide an unparalleled level of language and intellectual support for all of your translation needs.

Please take a look at the most important features that make us one of the best quality Dutch translation companies in Calgary, Canada:

 

Certified Dutch Translators:

Our Dutch translators are well experienced, certified to translate documents for immigration purposes, courts, medical institutions, insurance companies and any other organizations in Canada. All of them are professionals in their fields and have proven track record.

 

Affordable translation rates:

Comparing to other companies in Calgary – our pricing is one of the most competitive in the translation industry. Our rates for certified translations start from 35 CAD per document depending on the size and complexity of the content. We don’t have any hidden charges and never change the price once it has been given, as long as the source material stays the same.

 

Confidential policy:

As professionals all of our Dutch translators abide by the Translators’ Professional Code of Ethics. We always provide full confidentiality and non-disclosure of clients’ information. If your documents contain sensitive information we can sign confidentiality and non-disclosure agreement prior to start the translation.

 

Local Dutch Translation Agency:

We are Calgary-based Translation Company and most of our clients live or operate in Calgary Area. Even our National-wide clients usually have offices in Calgary. You always can send documents that you want to be translated by e-mail or fax and pick them up in person or through courier that considerably reduce turnaround time.

 

On-time and On-schedule:

Turnaround time for every translation depends on the document’s size and complexity. But if it is necessary we can work within very tight deadlines and translate your documents same business day and deliver them to you next morning. As soon as we receive your documents or texts and our translators evaluate them – we will provide you approximate time range for the project along with a quote for the professional translation.

 

Quality Translations:

The best indicator of quality of our translators’ work is loyalty of our clients. All important translations performed by Dutch native-speaking, accredited in Canada, professional and certified translators with deep knowledge of certain fields (legal, medical, technical) that guarantee the highest quality of work.

 

Personalized Service:

Our commitment to high quality service is the feature that keeps our clients with us for years. Our translators gladly accept any linguistic challenge and it’s what we’ve built our reputation on. You can count on us for certified English to Dutch translations and Dutch to English translations of any complexity.

OUR COMPANY
We’re not just a bakery — we’re a technology company that bakes

For decades, a large part of industrial baking was achieved through low-tech machinery and artificial ingredients. Not anymore. By combining robotics, AI systems, and supply chain innovations, we eliminate the need for synthetic ingredients from the food we all eat. Finally, the cleanest possible recipes and hand-made quality are being delivered at scale, at a price people can afford — and we won’t stop until the whole world is eating great food.

Welcome to Sunora Foods

Sunora Foods Inc. is a Calgary, Alberta, Canada based food oil entity trading and supplying canola oil, corn oil, soybean oil, olive oil and specialty oils to markets located in Canada, the United States and Internationally. Sunora has been active since 1990, and operates under the names “Sunora”, “Sunera” and numerous private label brands.

In addition to mainstream food oils Sunora is recognized for its expeller extracted and organic oils. Sunora’s organic products are certified by Quality Assurance International, a leading certifier of organic products. Sunora products are designed for retail, food service and food processing applications. Packaged food oil is available in both metric and United States sizes.

Sunora products are designed for retail, food service and food processing applications. Drummed oil and bulk products are available for food processors.




Unauthorized use of our “Sunora,” “Sunera” and “Sunya” brand names is strictly prohibited. Any packaging, advertising or web sites incorporating our brand names without our consent, such as the one for so-called Sunora Foods India, is illegal and should be scrupulously avoided.

Any unauthorized use of our brand names, including the purchase of products illegally incorporating our brand names, will be prosecuted to the full extent of the law.




Canola is an oilseed crop which, in North America, is grown primarily in regions of Western Canada.

WELCOME TO CERES INDUSTRIES

South Country Co-op, a 4-H Member, and Ceres Industries work together to make a donation for the HALO Medical Rescue Helicopter.

Who We Are

Ceres Industries is a business dedicated to the best interests of its customers, employees, and owners. We handle ammonium sulphate as a bulk fertilizer and use livestock-grade rock salt to manufacture salt blocks. The business is growing to include more grades and types of fertilizers in bags, as well as bagged livestock-grade salt products.

Our Mission

To be dynamic and diversified while growing our supply and service business by providing competitive advantages to our customers through innovative ideas, efficiency, and high quality staff.

Ceres Industries is a proud supporter of the Hardgrass Bronc Match.

What We Do

Ceres Industries has two primary business activities:

Ceres Industries manufactures mineralized salt blocks and bags for livestock producers. The salt is properly conditioned and mixed with various combinations of essential minerals and elements for livestock and pressed into blocks or bagged loose for producers. These products and more are marketed and distributed throughout Canada and the US under the brand name "Saltec".
We are also a supplier of Ammonium Sulphate (AmSul) crystal and is primarily sold as bulk fertilizer 21-0-0-24 in western Canada. AmSul is also one of the sources of fertilizer for the new bagged fertilizer GroundKeeper, which is targeted to the lawn and turf market.
NEWS AND UPDATES
Swan Valley Co-op Supremix Summer Promotion

Swan Valley Coop winds up their Supremix Summer promotion with the drawing for the free camping package. Here the Swan Valley Agro team presents winner Austin Spencer with his winnings!

READ MORE

Now Available - 2kg Blocks of Our Most Popular Salt Blends

Fits most block stall mount holders. Available at your local Saltec dealer.

READ MORE

Supremix - Now at a New Lower Price!

Tired of the rising cost of everything? So are we! We are pleased to reintroduce Supremix, now at a new lower price! A palatable salt and molasses mixture enriched with high levels of chelated minerals and vitamins to give your cattle what they need to perform during harsh winter conditions. Feed free choice or mix with rations. Formatted for 100 to 130% daily requirement of gestating beef cows at 75 to 100 grams per day consumption.

READ MORE

Vitamin A

Fresh, green grass is typically abundant with vitamin A, or at least its precursor, beta-carotene. So, livestock out on pasture in the summer months usually get plenty of vitamin A in their diets. However, in the winter months, deficiencies are more common because vitamins lose their integrity during the harvesting and storage processes.

READ MORE

New Product Line: Supremix!

Ceres Industries is proud to present its latest product line: Supremix! This three-step premix is meant to provide year-round vitamin and mineral nutrition, suited to the stage of production for a beef cow. Formulated with salt and molasses, these premixes are meant to be fed either free-choice or mixed into a TMR ration. The versatility of delivery makes the Supremix line easy to fit into any feeding program! Contact us to learn more!

About Us
Serving friends and family since 1958!

  

A family run company of renowned Sausage Makers practising time honoured Old World sausage recipes since 1958, purveyors of their own Famous Products Brand and Sausage Makers Brand of over 60 types of Wood Smoked Sausages, Wood Smoked Bacon, Hams, Meat Loaves, Smoked Turkeys. In addition to our Charcuterie and a full counter of Quality Fresh Pork and Beef we are here to serve your needs. Making quality, wholesome foods that will collect compliments from around the table has been our life’s work and we’d like to share that with your family and friends. Our Manitoba Raised Grass Fed Bison and Beef contain no added hormones and are antibiotic free. 

Tour the aisles at Sausage Makers Delicatessen and discover European Imported Groceries, Cheeses, and Chocolates, from Poland, Ukraine, Germany, and more! Come down to the deli with the two cows on the roof and purchase some of our legendary Ham Garlic Sausage, Spicy Pepperettes, Corned Beef or one of our other specialties. ACTUALITÉS
Jefo présente un nouveau podcast de vulgarisation scientifique sur le monde de la nutrition animale

Jefo Nutrition, Inc., un chef de file mondial dans le domaine des solutions nutritionnelles de haute-performance pour les animaux d’élevage, a annoncé le lancement d’un tout nouveau balado dédié à la nutrition animale.

Single Ingredient, All Natural Treats ~ Handmade with Love!
Grand Valley Quail Pet Treats

We are a small town family run business from Grand Valley, Ontario specializing in high quality pet treats.

Our passion and love for animals is what led us to creating delicious healthy treats for them. We started off creating Dehydrated Quail Egg Treats for our dogs because of their allergies.

We were so happy that we found something that our dogs could eat without having allergic reactions. We know what it's like to struggle with the challenges of feeding your pet, and we wanted to help other pet parents who were facing similar problems.

Our Coturnix Quails are sourced from a local farm and we use their eggs to make our treats. We now offer a variety of other great treats and chews for your pets to enjoy. Our other treats are sourced locally from reputable Canadian farmers.

All of our treats and chews are single ingredient and 100% natural. They contain NO chemicals, NO additives and NO food colouring.

Our pets love their treats so much and we can't wait for yours to fall in love with them too!

Click below to find your pets new favourite treat.




View products

As a business that takes food safety of our pet treats seriously, we know that quality is the most important value we can deliver to you.

We are certified in Ontario Food Handlers Safety and trained on proper food handling to avoid any cross contamination.
 
We only prepare and dehydrate one protein at a time.
Our quail eggs are baked in their own dehydrators, and are never in contact with any other products.
 
All of our equipment (utensils, trays etc.) are put through a dedicated dishwasher and sanitized after use. If an item can not be sanitized at high temperatures we have dedicated supplies for each item. Dehydrators are cleaned and sanitized after each batch.
 
As a family with four dogs who are allergic to many things, we know firsthand how important it is.

The Global Leader In Freeze-dried Pet Food & Treats
ABOUT US

Located in Langley, British Columbia, Canada, Canature Processing Ltd. is a global leader in the production of premium, freeze-dried pet food and treats.

Our state-of-the-art facilities, including our in-house R&D center, enable us to focus on providing the highest quality freeze dried pet food products. From product development to nutritional expertise, we are at the forefront of ingredient sourcing, manufacturing and packaging, all of which allow us to create a wide variety of freeze-dried products to meet the global demands of the pet food industry all in house.

READ MORE
PRODUCTS & SERVICES

We offer a wide variety of stock diets and treats providing competitive price points for all markets and channels as well as a dedicated R&D facility to providing innovative solutions so your company can be first to market.

MEALS
TREATS
FD+K

We have a wealth of ingredients to choose from for freeze-drying including, a wide array of fruits, vegetables and meat protein ingredients. Canature has the unique capability and capacity to mix and blend these various ingredients together into a variety of uniquely shaped pet treats and diets.

READ MORE
TECHNOLOGY

Freeze-drying is a natural food preservation technique that retains the flavor, nutrients and bio-availability of the product while being extremely convenient as it extends the shelf life and is easy to transport. The product can be rehydrated and when using a single ingredient it does not require any food preservatives.

READ MORE ABOUT TECHNOLOGY →
QUALITY CONTROL

Canature is proud to have an array of the highest ranking food safety certifications possible for a pet food facility. Our experienced Quality Control and Assurance team rigorously inspect and test all ingredients that are sourced and brought into our facility to the finished product that leaves it.

Pioneering Excellence in Human-Grade Pet Food Manufacturing
From Humble Beginnings to Industry Leaders

Founded in 2013, Cooper Pet Foods began as a heartfelt venture to offer healthier, more natural meals for dogs, inspired by our founders' beloved dog, Dash. Since then, we have transformed from a small, family-run business into a leading player in the human-grade pet food industry. Not just by creating exceptional products for pets but also by offering expert co-packing services to other brands. Our journey is marked by a steadfast commitment to quality, innovation, and the well-being of pets.

Tailored, Full-Service Solutions for Your Brand

We specialize in providing comprehensive co-packing solutions for pet food brands. Our state-of-the-art, HACCP-certified facility is equipped to produce high-quality, human-grade fresh-frozen, & baked dog food. We offer a complete, start-to-finish service, from recipe development to finished goods, tailored to your brand's unique vision and needs.

Quality, Flexibility, and Reliability

Choosing Cooper Pet Foods as your co-packing partner means choosing a team that values quality and safety as much as you do. We bring decades of industry experience, a deep understanding of pet nutrition, and a flexible approach to meet diverse requirements. Our commitment to excellence ensures that every product we co-pack stands out in the market for its superior quality.

"Working with Cooper Pet Foods has been an incredibly positive experience. From initial onboarding to production and distribution, their team has exceeded our expectations in every way. They are knowledgeable, responsive, and dedicated to producing the highest quality products. We are grateful for their partnership and highly recommend Cooper Pet Foods to anyone looking for a reliable and experienced co-packer."

BIO-AG CONSULTANTS & DISTRIBUTORS
In Operation Since 1982

 

Bio-Ag Consultants & Distributors Inc. is a family-owned and operated agricultural, manufacturing and distributing company located in Wellesley, Ontario, Canada.  We are passionate about helping farmers to improve and maintain the health of their livestock, crops and soil - because we are farmers too!

 

We believe in working with nature - naturally.  We strive to keep our products GMO-free and we never use medications.  We produce quality nutritional supplements onsite, balance rations, and put customers first.  Whether you need help with a large dairy herd, a small family farm, or simply some food for your best friend (yes, we make dog food too!) Bio-Ag consultants are happy to assist you.

 

Our Vision: we envision a world that works in cooperation with nature, leaving the environment healthier and more sustainable for the next generation

 

Our Mission: we are committed to developing and distributing quality natural agricultural products and services that do no harm and work in cooperation with nature.

The Highest Quality LiveStock Nutrition
Balanced Livestock Nutrition

FRIESEN is committed to providing the highest quality nutrition to independent livestock producers. Our focus is on providing balanced nutrition designed for today’s dynamic and demanding genotypes and to assist livestock producers in achieving and maintaining market goals.

As a result, our company will achieve customer satisfaction with fair pricing and service with honesty and integrity.

With combined 100-plus years in the livestock premix industry, the management and staff of FRIESEN can provide you with solutions to the most complex nutritional, environmental, genetic, and management difficulties plaguing many barns and independent producers.

Dedicated. Focused. Innovative.

FRIESEN is a leading manufacturers and distributors of swine premixes, vitamins, minerals and supplements. Since 2000, FRIESEN has worked hard to set the standard for innovative feeds and feeding programs. FRIESEN is able to set these standards and be the authority in micro nutrition by working effectively within a family of focused individuals and organizations dedicated to the swine industry.

FRIESEN is also committed to bringing you a highly skilled field sales and service team. Our representatives undergo extensive training and coaching on important topics such as nutrition and physiology, growth modeling, barn observation skills, and record keeping and analysis. The investment in our sales and service team ensures that we meet your needs and provide sound fact-based solutions for your operation.

Our New imPact Beef Mineral Program is Here!

Friesen Nutrition Inc.’s imPact vitamin and mineral supplement packages are designed to match the nutritional needs of your operation depending on quality forage availability and quality, cattle health, and environment factors impacting the nutrient status of your herd.

CANADIAN AGRA CORPORATION, EST. 1981

Your Local Partner in Agriculture

A group of highly specialized, tightly integrated companies

The Integrated Agricultural Concept is at the core of everything we do at Canadian Agra. From production to processing to marketing, our approach adds value to every step in the process.

Exceptional Service, Built on Decades of Experience

For over forty years, Canadian Agra has been at the forefront of innovations in agriculture, responsible land stewardship, and renewable energy.

We are on a mission to provide the best service to Canada’s agriculture sector. From property management, and farmland assembly, to soil and climate protection, we are ready to assist in all areas of agriculture.

We believe in protecting our greatest asset - our land - for future generations of Candians.
The Future of Canadian Agriculture

Our focus is on the future of clean energy through investing in partnerships, research, and training. With the help of our network of farmers, we aim to develop innovative technologies that lead to better resource management.

Just one example, Canadian Agra is proud to have been the first to erect a wind turbine in Ontario, in a joint venture with Ontario Hydro and the Canadian Research Council.

Our Services
We’re always looking for new partners. Interested? Get in touch with us today
FARM PROPERTY MANAGEMENT

With our carefully selected network of local farmers, we’ve built long-term relationships to ensure the maintenance of land quality and crop rotation for the long term sustainability of Canadian farmland.

FARMLAND SALE AND LEASEBACK

Farm your land while taking advantage of the many benefits of our sale and leaseback solution, including retirement planning and improved cash flow.

FARMLAND ASSEMBLY

Coordinating the assembly of first-class farmland parcels for land buyers, institutional investors, and large scale commercial agricultural operations.

PROJECT DEVELOPMENT

By employing our Integrated Agricultural Concept, Canadian Agra is able to bring new and innovative ideas to life. This original concept enables us to tackle large-scale projects by prioritizing partnerships and collaboration.

CANPRO FARMS
WHO ARE WE?

Can Pro is a privately owned company which operates a feed ingredients business. It has been in operation for approximately 50 years and works with a strong base of local producers. Can Pro has a pelleting operation located in north-eastern Saskatchewan, which is in the heart of a very productive farming region that produces high quality alfalfa, oats, canola and flax. Can Pro produces both conventional and organically certified products.

Can Pro also has a sister company that operates a large-scale farming operation. Through this entity it can provide customers product that is identity preserved and has been produced from field to feed bowl.

OUR PRODUCTS

Can Pro’s primary products are high quality Dehy and Suncure alfalfa pellets that are primarily used as a feed ingredient (dairy, cattle and hog operations) and as a petfood ingredient. It is also able to supply other pellet products from forage, grain and oilseeds to meet specific customer specifications. Its alfalfa products are also used in fertilizer and land reclamation activities.

TRANSFORM YOUR CAREER

Proud to transform it all

To build a greener tomorrow for future generations.

Our expertise: reclaiming agri-food industry by-products and transforming them into industrial ingredients that are used to create everyday items.

At Sanimax, we make every effort to transform all of the materials we collect.

The agri-food industry generates huge quantities of unconsumed by-products. Sanimax reclaims and transforms them into ingredients that are useful for several industries. Our actions, which are at the very heart of the circular economy, give new life to more than 2 million tons of organic materials each year.

Transforming it all in 3 simple steps
Reclaim

Each day, our Transportation and Logistics team collects agri-food by-products from more than 25,000 sites across the Americas.

Renew

Our automated facilities are equipped with sophisticated control systems that produce high-quality ingredients to be used in a wide range of industries.

Return

The value-added goods manufactured by Sanimax are returned to companies that, in turn, use them to make everyday items.

Careers that make a difference

HELPING YOUR FARM PROSPER FOR GENERATIONS TO COME.
CUSTOMER CARE

We at Nutrisource listen and work with you to provide products and services that benefit you. We genuinely care about your success and the health and wellness of your herd and farm operation.

PROVEN APPROACH

Nutrisource customers get the advice and support they need to optimize all aspects of their farm operations. Our proven approach will maximize profitability and save you time and effort.

HERD HEALTH

Nutrisource customers get the highest return on feed by keeping their cows healthy and strong. We offer products and services that elevate your animal's health, longevity and dairy output.

REQUEST A CALLBACK

DO YOU…

• Have trouble finding trustworthy, independent nutritional advice?

• Struggle to keep your herd healthy and productive?

• Fight to get the highest return on feed and stay profitable?

• Lack the support you need to make informed and accurate decisions?

• Feel you are continually risking more than you are being rewarded?

Dairy Farming is Hard Work.

The truth is, feed is one of the highest input costs to run your dairy farm. How do you lower your feed costs? This involves a complex look into all factors that influence dairy nutrition such as forage, cow comfort, water quality and calf and heifer raising.

You invest a lot in your farm: time, money, energy...you deserve a team of professionals as passionate as you are to deliver you the highest return.

That's why choosing us, a nutrition-focused company that listens and puts your best interests first, is so important.

We’re more than just feed. 

W

e’re helping farmers feed families.

We’ve fed over 150,000 dairy cows since 2005.

Nutrisource is family owned and 100% Canadian. Knowing the challenges that come with operating and running a dairy farm, Nutrisource works endlessly to give their customers what they need most - healthy and productive cows.

By producing high quality, dairy specific feed and offering progressive and innovative consulting advice, they have created a community that operates a lot like a family. Rooted in care, support, and trust.

You’re Not Just Buying Feed; You’re Joining a Family

Our Promise To You
INTEGRITY

We care about the success of your business like it was our own and give our customers tailored one-on-one attention. Your success is our success!

QUALITY

We purchase dairy only products and partner with high quality ingredient suppliers to ensure you get the most nutritional value for your farm.

VALUE

We will always put your care, concern and needs first. We will work hard to get you the products you need will never sell you something you don’t.

COLLABORATION

We collaborate with your key stakeholders to ensure we are all working toward the same set of goals. Your long-term success is our number one priority.

Who we are

Station 20 West is a place where each organization supports one another to enhance the overall goal of making the core neighbourhoods a better place to live. Our building on 20th Street  is a collaborative space for working, meeting, and creating community in Saskatoon’s west side core neighbourhoods. We know first-hand that when like-minded organizations are co-located together, planned and unplanned collaboration and synergy occurs.

The staff and board acknowledge that this work happens on Treaty 6 Territory and the Traditional Homeland of the Métis.

We pay our respect to the First Nations and Métis ancestors of these lands and reaffirm our relationships with each other. We cherish the relationships that bring a deeper understanding of the truths of our past and provide healing for the impacts of colonization, while we work towards reconciliation.

We know first-hand that when like-minded people work together, planned and unplanned collaboration and synergy create systemic changes.

We would like to welcome you to this space and encourage you to reflect on your relationships with these lands, with the lands that you come from, and with your own histories, as we gather to do this work together.

BIRD FOOD BLENDING   I   CUSTOM PACKAGING   I   FULL LOGISTICS   I   SEEDS

SUPPLYING BIRD SEED TO THE WORLD

WHY ORENDA COMMODITY SERVICES?

Quality and service are our only priorities. With experience in all aspects 
of Special Crops, including commodity markets, farm sourcing, processing, 
blending, packaging, and shipping, we strive for perfection in everything we do.

CUSTOM WILD BIRD FOOD BLENDING

We have the ability to custom blend any mixes a customer requires. Our mixer is designed to blend product consistently while being gentle on the seed. By blending in small batches, we can ensure accuracy and minimize seed separation.

CUSTOM PACKAGING - FROM 2KG TO 1 TON

Orenda Commodity Services Ltd. can package almost any size and style of bag:

As small as 2kg to as large as 1 ton

Plastic heat seal

Poly woven

FULL LOGISTICS

From farm pick-up to direct shipments worldwide, Orenda offers full service logistics to meet all customer needs.

TRANSLOADING

Our facility has the ability to load bulk, intermodal containers, dry vans and shipping containers.

CROSS DOCKING

We can receive product into our warehouse, hold for customers and load out when needed.

BULK LOADING

The facility can load bulk product into hopper trucks, or into containers and intermodals.

SEEDS

We source only the best quality seeds available, and Canadian product whenever possible.

BLACK OIL SUNFLOWER

Black oil sunflowers are the most popular seed for bird food. It is a high energy seed, black in colour that can be used in a variety of feeders.


MILO
Milo is a small round seed that can be red or white. It is used in bird food mixes to add colour and contrast.

MILLET

A specialty for smaller songbirds, millet comes in a variety of colours. It is popular in various mixes due to the wide range of colours and sizes.


SAFFLOWER
Safflower is a large, bright white seed with a high oil content that is perfect for attracting larger birds.

STRIPED SUNFLOWER

Striped sunflowers are a favourite seed for large birds. They are a larger, grey seed easily identified by the white stripe. Ideal for use in hopper feeders.

CANARY SEED
Loved by small birds such as finches, canary is a yellow seed that is easily consumed by smaller birds. It is ideal for use in tube feeders.

ABOUT US

QUALITY
CAREERS
CONTACT
Food Safety

ISO22000 is just one of many food safety certifications that ensures quality product. 

Locally Sourced

Ingredients are sourced locally to ensure freshness, and improved palatability. 

Formulation

All diets are formulated to AAFCO and NRC standards by our nutrition team.

Pet Food

It would be easy to give our customers’ an “a la carte” pet food portfolio instead of customizing solutions that work for their business.  But we don’t do easy.

We currently operate 3 different extruders, and offer a wide variety of products. We have experience manufacturing pet food in the Super Premium, Mid-Range, and Economy sector.  No matter the ingredient declaration; nutrition is the focus. We are proud to say that we will try anything! This idea comes right from the President’s desk. We understand that every customer has unique ideas, and we are keen to attempt extrusion of any combination of ingredients. Experimentation with new formulas is an opportunity for learning and growth, and it allows us to showcase our commitment to animal health.

read more >>
Specialized Extrusion

It would be easy to say “we don’t make that” or “we can’t get into that type of extrusion.”   Species diversity is at the heart of our extrusion business.   We don’t do easy.

We currently operate 3 different extruders, and offer a wide variety of products. We have experience manufacturing feed for any animal; fish, mice, rats and even elephants! 

We are proud to say that we will try anything! This idea comes right from the President’s desk. We understand that every customer has unique ideas, and we are keen to attempt extrusion of any combination of ingredients.

read more >>
Custom Blending

It would be easy to tell others in the pet industry that we are unable to support their custom blending requirements, or that “we’re too busy with extrusion.”  But we don’t do easy.

Mixing and blending custom ingredients is at the core of our business.  Since we accurately mix and blend ingredients for our extrusion process, we also offer those same precision blending capabilities for those with a different end process in mind.

read more >>
Transportation

It would be easy to tell our customers that our product is available “FOB our dock”.  It would be easy to tell our suppliers that “isn’t our problem.” But we don’t do easy.

Spectrum Feed Services Ltd. operates with a fleet of 7 trucks, affording us the ability to haul the majority of our own ingredients. This allows us to have strict quality control over incoming materials and associated transport procedures.

We also have trucks dedicated to the delivery of finished pet food, and offer logistics across Ontario with our own fleet.  Our logistics team can also coordinate shipping with many reliable outside carriers.

read more >>
About Us!

In 1991, Spectrum Feed Services Ltd opened its doors for the first time. The partners came together with the intention of supplying a superior level of nutritional services than was currently available in the industry. Our success came by applying technical knowhow in a practical and efficient way, largely in dairy cow nutrition.

At this time, many new concepts were validated at the university level and proven to improve animal performance and reduce feed costs. To do this effectively, we required our own feed production capability, subsequently purchasing a closed feed mill in Moorefield and extensively renovating it to our needs.



read more >>
