Premium Ingredients for Pet Food Excellence.

Welcome to Big Sky Milling, your trusted partner for premium pet food ingredients. Located in the heart of Canada's pulse and specialty crops production in Alberta, Canada. We are committed to sourcing and producing nutrient-rich pulses, seeds, and specialty crops for the high-grade pet food industry.

Elevating Pet Nutrition with Premium Legumes

Discover our meticulously milled products crafted from the highest-quality, sustainably sourced ingredients in North America.

Our Products
Our Pillars of Excellence

At Big Sky Milling, we have a deep understanding of what discerning buyers in the pet food industry seek. Our premium beans and legumes form the bedrock of nutritious pet food, and we excel in three fundamental aspects:

Sustainably 
Quality 
Reliability
Customized Ingredient Milling for Pet Food Manufacturers

We are more than just ingredient suppliers; we are dedicated partners in the pet food industry. We understand the unique requirements of pet food manufacturers, and our state-of-the-art facilities are tailored to efficiently process these ingredients to your exact specifications. Whether you need ingredients in whole, ground, or blended formats, we have you covered. Our flexible packaging options, including bags, totes, and bulk, cater to your specific needs. 

Safety: Ensuring Industry-Grade Quality

Our commitment to quality and safety shines through our strict compliance with industry guidelines, safeguarding the integrity of our pet food ingredients from production to delivery.

The Power of Pulses for Pet Nutrition

In the quest for optimal pet nutrition, the choice of ingredients plays a pivotal role. Pulses, including peas, lentils, chickpeas, and beans, emerge as the frontrunners for discerning pet owners. Not only do these legumes offer functional processing attributes, antioxidant properties, and wide availability, but they also align with the growing consumer demand for sustainable pet food options. Consumers, increasingly mindful of their pets' health, seek plant-based protein alternatives, making pulses a natural and beneficial addition to pet food formulations.

Welcome to Cra-Vac Industries Inc.

At Cra-Vac Industries Inc. we specialize in the field of animal feed ingredients. We have great pellet binder solutions for every species and diet.


 

High PDI pellet quality with a low-inclusion pellet binder is what we deliver every time. Our pellet binders have a low moisture content and more active ingredients per unit than other pellet binders to help feed manufacturers achieve optimal results. Additionally, we offer on-site pelleting insight and suggestions as needed. We offer assistance to feed producers in choosing the most economical and effective binders for their needs. Not only do we provide performance-oriented pellet binders, but we also provide excellent customer-service. Whether you are using Maxi-Bond®, Ameri-Bond® 2x, LignoBond DD or PellTech, we have pellet binders that will out perform the others.

About

Cra-Vac Industries works directly with feed manufacturers on-site to troubleshoot and optimize their manufacturing processes. Through years of product research and mill trial evaluation, Cra-Vac Industries has developed pellet binders and feed additives to suit the needs of modern feed manufacturers.  Keeping ahead of trends in feed manufacturing, Cra-Vac  has the feed binders which give producers the competitive edge Through on-site mill trials and working with the leading scientists in academia, Cra-Vac Industries has perfected feed ingredients for optimal results. Pell-Tuff®, Sure-Bond Plus® and Protein Plus® are available in the USA and around the world.

At Village Fare, we treat our four-legged friends like family…

by creating and feeding them the very best, healthy treats possible. We do this by ensuring our products are all natural, with no additives, no artificial colours or preservatives, so you can feel good about rewarding your pets!

Maintaining the highest quality and flavour, it’s a combination of our 100% natural ingredients from verified farms across North America, and our family recipe that makes these the perfect treat. We’ll even let you in on our secret – they’re deliciously healthy because we have perfected the drying and manufacturing process. Our technique enhances the flavour without deep frying, artificially processing, smoking or chemically drying them so they remain 100% natural!

EXPLORE OUR FOODS
OUR MISSION

We could see the potential. To situate a pet food manufacturing facility in the heart of Canada’s agricultural basin. Our dream became reality in 2006 when we commissioned our plant and began our journey of making exemplary pet foods. We have grown a lot since. But our values were forged. To be 100% accountable for foods that bore our name. Be passionate about pet health and optimal nutrition. To pay forward our advantages in how we make our foods and where we make our foods to offer unparalleled value for high quality. Compromise is not a word we use. We want to exceed expectations. We know you depend on us to do things the right way. We won’t relent.

FAMILY OWNED.
FAMILY VALUES.

Horizon isn’t a corporate conglomerate. We are three owners that call Saskatchewan home. That have a deep belief in doing things the honest way and doing business with our neighbors. We want to know our suppliers and employees personally and believe in their high standards. We appreciate that the decision you make on a food is for a beloved family member and for that reason our commitment to making food has to be rooted in trust and not corporate profit. This is a craft for us. Passion is the bedrock of what drives us each day.  This is truly from our family to yours.

"What you define as core principles will set your course. Stay true and you will always be on the right path."
SUPPORT LOCAL GROWERS

We are situated in the agricultural heartland of Canada. It means we can source local whenever possible. Knowing our growers and how they grow is an imperative in assuring true quality control.

SELF MANUFACTURE

We are a family owned manufacturer. Everything from sourcing, production, packaging and shipping is done by us. No third party contractors. It’s 100% accountability.

ALWAYS BE AFFORDABLE

Because we self manufacture and because we are based in Canada, we can offer high quality diets at affordable pricing. It is our mission to have more pets on quality foods and affordability is a big factor for many families.

PLAY VIDEO
INGREDIENTS WITH A PURPOSE

Not all ingredients are equal and each ingredient needs to make the food better.  Where its grown, how its grown and what it contributes makes a huge difference in how a food performs.

HIGH QUALITY HAY STARTS WITH THE JUICE

The highest quality hay is an important factor in the health of cows, horses and all livestock. The Juice is an industry leading buffered propionic & citric acid hay preservative with active ingredients that deliver superior results. Hay bales treated with The Juice stay fresh longer, maintain their green colour and retain valuable nutrients. Additionally, The Juice allows you to bale at a higher moisture level, effectively extending your baling window.

Made in Canada by Nuhn Forage Inc., The Juice buffered propionic acid uses a unique dispersing agent to ensure even application and quality. Dispersing throughout the hay to find moisture, The Juice penetrates the entire hay stem.

WHY USE THE JUICE?
CONSISTENT GREEN BALES

Hay treated with The Juice will retain a nice green colour during storage, providing hay producers with a more marketable product. The Juice penetrates the entire hay stem, giving bales a consistent coverage.

MOULD INHIBITOR

When hay is not properly treated, mold will often grow in the bale. This causes the hay to become discoloured and loose it’s freshness. The Juice protects bales, keeping your hay fresh and free of harmful mould and dust.

LEAF RETENTION

Treating hay with The Juice will increase the feed value of your hay by retaining the nutrient filled leaves. Treated hay retains a higher percentage of dry matter per bale versus hay that is not treated with The Juice.

BALE AT HIGHER HUMIDITY

The active ingredients in The Juice allow hay producers to safely bale hay at a higher moisture level without the risk of spoilage or heating. Baling at a higher moisture will extend your baling time and reduce your drying time. 

HAY TREATED WITH THE JUICE IS SAFE FOR ALL ANIMALS
DAIRY COWS

Feeding dairy cows a high-quality hay results in greater feed intake and, as a result, dairy cows produce more milk. Using The Juice helps bales maintain their leaves, increasing the feed value of the hay. The juice also reduces the risk of mouldy hay which can cause illness in dairy cows. Certain mould can even increase the risk of mycotic abortions.

HORSES

Studies have proven that treated hay is not only safe for horses, but the propionic acid in The Juice increases the energy value of the hay. Using The Juice reduces mould growth during hay's cure down period. Mould and dust decreases the feed value of hay and can cause respiratory issues in susceptible horses. 

LIVESTOCK

Feeding beef cattle, sheep or other livestock hay that has been treated with The Juice can provide many benefits to livestock producers. Untreated hay can often grow harmful mould spores. Feeding mouldy hay to livestock can often result in illness, respiratory issues or digestive problems. 

TMR MIX

Added directly to your mix, The Juice is a proven mould inhibitor for total mixed rations (TMR). With a high level of active ingredients such as buffered propionic acid, citric acid and exclusive dispersing agents, The Juice reduces nutrient loss and heating while prolonging the "bunk life" of mixed feed.

USING THE JUICE ON STRAW BALES 
THE JUICE STRAW PRESERVER

Straw treated with The Juice puts the power back in growers hands. It gives added insurance for top quality return for your forage. At the same time, livestock owners have one less thing to stress over as their bedding material is kept at peak performance. A proper environment encourages healthy livestock and maximum potential. The Juice is the most effective acid forage preservative on the market.




SAVE YOUR STRAW FROM MOULDS AND MYCOTOXINS

Some producers add straw to their total mix ration (TMR) as an additional source of fibre. When you treat your straw with The Juice, you prevent the risk of harmful mould and bacteria spores contaminating your TMR rations. 

Straw is also the most common bedding material for a large variety of livestock. The risk with untreated straw is that it’s quite prone to the growth of mould spores. These spores can then be released into the air as dust, which can affect livestock and also farmers. One of the more common forms of mould  is known as Aspergillus. This particular mould can be very harmful to animals, often causing disease and respiratory issues.  

There are over 100 known strains of Aspergillus fungi. Among these, Aspergillus fumigatus, Aspergillus flavus and Aspergillus niger are the most common. All of these can cause many harmful symptoms and have been linked to a number of chronic and acute diseases in livestock. The strain Aspergillus Fumigatus is especially dangerous to horses. When inhaled into a horses lungs, the fungal spores invade the tissue in the upper air ways, causing respiratory problems. Straw that is properly treated with The Juice generates less dust and is less likely to grow harmful mould.

A HEALTHY ENVIRONMENT FOR YOU AND YOUR HERD  

Dust can be a significant problem in straw especially when used for livestock bedding. Dust can carry mould spores and bacteria that can be harmful to animals and their owners. When applied to straw, The Juice reduces the number of airborne dust particles. Farmers Lung is a common name for the damaging respiratory effects of dust inhalation. Dust exposure can cause chronic symptoms in farmers that are similar to asthma. If dust particles are not removed removed from the lung, serious long term effects on the respiratory system can result. The Juice is a great tool to keep your work place safe for both you, and your animals.

CATERING?

Hoards Station Sale Barn is looking for anyone or any group  interested in catering on any Tuesday sale in our kitchen. This is a great way to raise money for your organization.  We do have a few open dates.

Please contact Kim at 705-653-3660.
Come and enjoy the farming atmosphere.

Welcome to Hoards Station

If it seems as though farmers in Eastern Ontario are missing every Tuesday afternoon, it might just be the truth. Starting at noon, Hoards Station Community Livestock Exchange hosts a weekly Livestock auction. Every Tuesday there are a variety of livestock going through the barn including pigs, sheep, goats, dairy cattle, springers and beef cattle. It’s not uncommon to see horses, donkeys, mules and llamas as well.

Hoards Station also hosts the Quinte Cattlemen’s seasonal stocker sales and an annual spring equipment consignment sale. Hoards station draws large crowds for their popular Tuesday Livestock Auction, filling the parking lot to overflowing. There are buyers, sellers, staff, flea market tradesmen, spectators and don’t forget the diner where local church groups host home-cooked meals for the crowd. It’s a large-scale production with many players.

Many modernizations of the popular Sale Barn, including a digital scale, RFID technology and a customized computer system enabling cheques and invoices to be printed onsite immediately after your animals are sold, have made them one of the most efficient Livestock Barns in Ontario.

Hoards Station Sales Barn was built in 1949 and the auction method of price discovery here hasn’t changed much since the first auction was held outside with a snow fence as the ring. Over the years a second and third ring have been added to accommodate various types of livestock. In 1997 the main cattle barn was torn down and a new addition was erected. With more pens and wider allies, the barn can sort and sell larger volumes of cattle with less stress on the cattle and the men.

Largest pig ever sold here, 1075 pounds, sold for 11 cents a pound
The exterior of the building 1949/50 era, in the early days under the ownership of R. Williams.


Click here for more on the history of Hoards Station Livestock Exchange

Hoards Station is one of the only sale barns in Eastern Ontario that has 3 rings running simultaneously. The DeNure family, a 3rd-generation family of auctioneers, welcomes you to join them every Tuesday afternoon for some good food, good times and most importantly some great auctioneering!

The farm was founded in 1987 and it’s main business is the production of animal feeds: hen scratch, starter and grower mixes for turkeys and broilers; feed for poultry, horses, hogs and goats.
On the other hand we grow mixed organic vegetables on the 4 acres of farmland in the back, and sell them at the Farmer’s Markets in the Metro Vancouver area. We sell certified organic hazelnuts and eggs at the markets as well.
Posted 11 years ago.

We adhere to the highest standards of safety and quality control and our partners have absolute confidence in our superior value. About our brand

10 years ago, hobby farmers Brandon and Natalie Postuma had a dream - to create a unique shopping experience that offers premium products for affordable prices... and to always have fun. We offer the products you need for your pets, home and farm; and also present a variety of exclusive items you won't find anywhere else. As residents of Kakabeka Falls, Ontario, the Postuma's are bringing country to town and everywhere in between! We now work with, and support over 18 Northwestern Ontario Companies. Thank you for supporting local!!

Masterfeeds, an Alltech company, has been a leading nutrition provider for animal agriculture in Canada since 1929. Our long history of serving Canadian livestock and poultry producers is the success of employing quality, motivated people, and of offering nutrition solutions that support milk, meat, and egg production excellence. Masterfeeds has grown alongside the advancements of agriculture, genetics, formulation, and ingredient science to support optimal animal health and development over the decades.

Animal nutrition products and programs for all species, all life phases

A full range of complete feeds and supplements for hog performance developed from continual swine nutrition research.

For over 30 years, BSC Animal Nutrition Inc. has been working with Ontario livestock and poultry producers to provide quality nutrition products at exceptional value.

About Us

BSC Animal Nutrition Inc. is a partnership between the Vingerhoeds and Squire families.  BSC takes pride in working with independent livestock and poultry producers to bring professional nutrition and management services alongside quality vitamin, mineral and amino acid premixes. We believe in balancing innovative technologies with our own experiences to improve the profitability of our customers.

Peter Vingerhoeds

519-272-9041

peter@bscanimalnutrition.com

Jay Squire

519-274-1970

jay@bscanimalnutrition.com

1/1
Customer Service

BSC has competent, experienced staff that take pride in manufacturing high quality formulations with exceptional customer service.  Our fleet of modern auger trucks is adaptable to bulk and bagged product and ready for timely delivery of our livestock and poultry nutrition products.

Feed Assure
TM

You can have confidence in nutrition products from BSC.  Through third party verification, our facility and protocols are dedicated to the highest standard in Canadian feed safety.

Biosecurity

At BSC, we understand the importance of biosecurity and the role it plays in the herds and flocks we work with.  We believe heated washbays for our trucks and standard operating procedures are important to safeguarding animal health and welfare and the profitability of our customers.

What customers think about the store

Arva Flour Mill offers high-quality, locally-sourced flour products that resonate with customers due to their exceptional taste and nutritional value. Customers rave about the unique flavors, consistent quality, and efficient delivery service. The revival of nostalgic favorites like Red River Cereal has garnered immense appreciation, tapping into cherished childhood memories. The mill's dedication to traditional milling methods and avoidance of preservatives resonates with health-conscious consumers.

Locally prepared. Proudly served.
Over 15 years of freshness.

A simple statement with a bold impact. Our raw recipes are designed to model the natural prey diet that cats and dogs would have eaten in the wild; full of meats and fresh veggies that are made without added processes and unproblematic to their digestive systems. Besides being a natural and more flavourful option, switching to raw provides your pet with benefits beyond a licked-clean bowl.

WHY RAW?
Personalize your pet’s raw plan.

Find out which raw recipe is best for your pet by completing our quick product selector questionnaire. Dig in!

START
Join the cubs!

New pet join your family pack? Paw-fect. Sign up your kitten or puppy for our Cubs Club and receive a free Bold by Nature Raw Starter Pack along with monthly coupons and more.

SIGN UP
From Blah to Licked Bowl!

“We got Westley in October. The first time we have ever had a dog that wouldn’t eat what was offered. For 10 months, we tried different foods, different toppers, even different games. We finally decided to give raw a try. We were recommended Bold by Nature Mega Chicken formula. To be honest I was a skeptic. Not only was I not expecting him to eat but I also wasn’t expecting him to eat out of the bowl without assistance. To my surprise he dove right in and finish the whole bowl. I’m not going to lie, tears were shed. Bold by Nature saved us.”

– Christina P (owner) & Westley

Bold by Nature has changed our lives completely.

“Getting Hunter to eat turned into a huge struggle around his first birthday. In the eight months that followed we tried countless high quality kibbles, and without fail after a few days he would refuse.
A friend and our vet recommended we try a few Bold by Nature Turkey patties to see if this was something he would eat. That was it, we had found a food he would get excited for. We started adding in Pork and Duck into our routine.
Hunter has been raw fed for 3 years now and he is thriving, he has gotten a perfect bill of health from the vet who is much happier with his teeth, muscle tone and size on this diet. We constantly get complements on his hair and how soft and shiny it is.”

— Krista (owner) & Hunter

“Before feeding Charlie Bold by Nature, she struggled with digestive issues. We finally made the switch to raw feeding and changes [in] Charlie’s overall health have been amazing. She is leaner, stronger and happier. The yeast in her paws is non-existent and her teeth have never been whiter!

She would leave kibble in her bowl for days at times, the minute she gets her Bold by Nature patty she gobbles it down instantly! It’s been a life changing experience for her and I and I’ll never look back!”

— Alyssa

Better, Bolder.

“My cat was a rescue and, at one year old, had never had a solid bowel movement. The vets tried him on all sorts of hypoallergenic dry foods and wet foods, but this little guy was getting really sick from malnourishment. Then I found … Bold by Nature Cat and by day two his diarrhea was gone. Over time, my little guy is going to get better and better, and I won’t even need the vet except for annual shots! Bold by Nature changed Fox’s life, literally!”

– Fox

– Kirstie (owner), Jackson & Memphis

Emerald Seed Products
The world leader in fenugreek-derived products.

EMERALD SEED PRODUCTS LIMITED MANUFACTURES CANADIAN-GROWN FENUGREEK PRODUCTS INCLUDING FENUGREEK GUM AND POWDER

ABOUT OUR FENUGREEK PRODUCTS

Our fenugreek products are natural (made solely from fenugreek seed)

We are Non-GMO, sustainable, and plant-based 

All of our fenugreek is traceable to a Saskatchewan farm

We produce clean products by using a propriety, water-only process (fenugreek gum and powder) — meaning no additives or chemicals

All of our fenugreek products are processed in Avonlea, Saskatchewan, Canada under a strict control process providing the highest quality products

All of our fenugreek is Canadian-grown and manufactured

Our state-of-the-art facility is strictly maintained and Health Canada-approved

We have cutting-edge proprietary technology for our manufacturing process that is unique worldwide

COORDONNÉES
AGRI-SOLUTIONS | COMPAGNON DE LA FERME À LA MAISON, DU PLUS GROS AU PLUS MIGNON
PASSIONNÉS DE NOTRE MÉTIER

Située à Alma, Agri-Solutions Compagnon propose à sa clientèle une vaste gamme de produits et services qui touchent les secteurs des animaux domestiques, d’élevage, cervidés et zoologiques.

Fièrement seul concessionnaire Purina dans la région, la compagnie offre une gamme complète de nourriture, d'engrais, de semences, de litières et d'accessoires en plus de mettre à la disposition des clients des produits novateurs et éprouvés.

Les producteurs agricoles, les propriétaires d’écuries et les amoureux des animaux domestiques (chiens, chats, rongeurs, lapins, mini-cochons) y trouveront leur compte à chacune de leur visite. Nous mettons également à votre disposition une équipe formée pour répondre à toutes vos questions et établir avec vous un régime alimentaire précis pour votre élevage.

DEPUIS 2004 AU CŒUR DE VOTRE QUOTIDIEN

C’est en 2004 que l’idée de développer une entreprise spécialisée en nutrition animale agricole et domestique germa dans l’esprit de Daniel Hétu et Michel Bouchard. Procédant au rachat de la Meunerie d’Hébertville, au courant de cette même année, Daniel et Michel se lancèrent dans l’aventure Agri-Solutions.

Devenue une notoriété dans le domaine de la nutrition, des semences, de l’engrais et de la litière agricole, l’entreprise s’agrandit en ajoutant la branche Compagnon à ses services. L’ouverture, en 2018, d’une boutique d'aliments et d’accessoires pour animaux de compagnie et d’élevage vint compléter à merveille les activités de la compagnie. Aujourd’hui, Agri-Solutions Compagnon est la référence dans la région pour tous les propriétaires de petits et de gros animaux.

UNE VÉRITABLE VOCATION

Pour nous, chez Agri-Solutions Compagnon, la santé et le bien-être de vos compagnons sont une priorité. Afin de répondre aux demandes des producteurs agricoles avec un service professionnel, nous sommes constamment à la recherche des dernières innovations dans le domaine.

Nous avons pour mission de vous offrir des produits et des outils nécessaires à la mise en place d’un plan d’action rentable pour votre entreprise afin lui assurer une croissance constante.

Desservant aussi le secteur des animaux domestiques et des élevages résidentiels, nous adorons vous recevoir en boutique pour vous présenter nos nouveautés et vous conseiller. Nous sommes fiers de vous fournir une nourriture saine, de qualité et qui saura plaire à vos petits amis poilus.

SERVICES
NUTRITION ANIMALE DOMESTIQUE

Avec des marques telle que : Royal Canin, Nutrience, Oven Baked, 1st Choice, Pronature, Loyall, Grand Cru, Big country Raw et Zanimo, notre offre de produits de nutrition animale domestique est très diversifiée. Chez Compagnon, nos conseillers vous aident à sélectionner la nourriture idéale pour votre compagnon en plus de vous indiquer la ration quotidienne à respecter.

RÉGIME ALIMENTAIRE AGRICOLE

En plus de vous offrir les meilleures gammes alimentaires sur le marché (Cargill et Purina), nos conseillers viennent à votre rencontre pour bâtir avec vous le régime alimentaire approprié à votre situation, votre type d’élevage et votre budget. Nous disposons dans notre équipe d’une experte en milieu équin et d’une en milieu agricole.

BOUTIQUE D’ACCESSOIRES

Nourriture sèche et cru pour chiens, chats, chevaux, cervidés et rongeurs à une panoplie d’items indispensables, nous avons ce que vous recherchez ! Nos allées regorgent de gâteries, d’arbres à chats, de colliers, de litières, de produits pour écurie, de blocs de sel et autres accessoires de qualité qui suivent les tendances et les innovations du marché !

CARTE DE MEMBRE

Fan d’Agri-Solutions Compagnon ? Nous aimons vous offrir ce qu’il y a de mieux, et notre programme de membre est une belle option pour votre portefeuille ! En devenant membre chez nous, vous bénéficiez de 10 % de rabais sur les accessoires à prix régulier en magasin et de 5 % sur toutes les nourritures pour animaux domestiques. Super n’est-ce pas ?

AGRICULTURE

Les propriétaires de fermes, d’élevages et d’écuries peuvent se référer à Agri-Solutions Compagnon pour tous besoins au niveau des semences, des engrais et des litières. Proposant plusieurs produits de qualité (Semican, Agro-100, Agri-Flex, NaturSorb), notre équipe est formée pour vous aider dans l’utilisation de chacun de ceux-ci selon vos activités.

POINTS DE VENTE

La force d’Agri-Solutions Compagnon repose, entre autres, sur sa présence étendue dans les régions de la Mauricie, du Saguenay-Lac-Saint-Jean et de la Côte Nord. Ce sont plus de 24 points de vente que possède la compagnie! Contactez-nous pour connaître la liste détaillée.

ÉQUIPE
DANIEL HÉTU
copropriétaire

« Originaire d’Albanel, j’ai grandi sur la ferme familiale. Dès l’enfance, j’ai développé un goût pour l’agriculture et les affaires, en travaillant sur la ferme, mais également en faisant l’élevage de lapins, de chiens de traineaux et de veaux de grain.

En 1995, je suis déménagé à Alma pour étudier en Gestion et exploitation d’entreprise agricole, domaine dans lequel j’ai obtenu un diplôme. À partir de 1998, j’ai travaillé pour la Meunerie d’Hébertville. En 2004, comme mes patrons désiraient transférer l’entreprise, je me suis joint à Michel Bouchard pour faire l’acquisition de la concession et créer Agri-Solutions Inc.

En 2014, la passion pour la terre m’a poussé à acheter les 200 acres de terre de mon père et à louer 22 acres de bleuetière à mon beau-père. Finalement, en 2018, afin de poursuivre la croissance de l’entreprise et mon désir de pouvoir fournir aux gens une gamme complète d’aliments pour les animaux, du plus petit au plus gros, COMPAGNON a été créé. »

MICHEL BOUCHARD
copropriétaire

« Étant en affaires dans le domaine animalier depuis 1986, c’est en 2004 que nous avons décidé, mon associé et moi, d’unir nos forces et de fonder Agri-Solutions en devenant concessionnaires Purina pour le Saguenay-Lac-Saint-Jean. Notre objectif étant d’offrir une alimentation animale de haute qualité jumelée à un service-conseil exceptionnel. Notre boutique Compagnon offre un vaste inventaire de produits et accessoires pour tous les animaux, petits comme les grands, dans un environnement accueillant et chaleureux. »

ANNIE BOIVIN
représentante équin

« Dès mon plus jeune âge, ma vie fut remplie de l’amour que m’apportent les animaux. J’ai étudié au Cégep de Saint-Félicien en Techniques du milieu naturel, dans la spécialisation en Santé animale. Une formation parfaite pour une passionnée des animaux et de la nature. J’ai ensuite suivi mon parcours en travaillant dans des cliniques vétérinaires, animaleries et refuges pour animaux, ou j’ai appris à conseiller et à écouter les clients.

J’ai ensuite complété un cours en nutrition équine à l’UQAC. Depuis maintenant plus de 20 ans dans le domaine animalier et 10 ans en nutrition équine, mon objectif est toujours de vous partager l’information et vous conseiller au meilleur de mes connaissances. Chiens, chats, poissons, chevaux, poules et bien d’autres, font tous partie de ma vie. Grâce à mon métier, je peux les côtoyer tous les jours, ce qui rend très agréable mon environnement de travail ».

LAURIE-ANNE BELL TREMBLAY
représentante agricole

« Étant née sur la ferme familiale et passionnée d’agriculture depuis mon plus jeune âge, je savais depuis longtemps que je voulais faire de cette passion un mode de vie. Suite à mes études secondaires, j’ai décidé d’aller étudier à l’ITA de Saint-Hyacinthe pour obtenir mon diplôme en Gestion et Technologie d’Entreprise Agricole. Ces études m’ont permis de découvrir de nouveaux horizons, dont le métier de conseillère en production animale et végétale, en allant faire un stage d’été chez Agri-solutions. J’ai eu la chance de travailler avec une équipe hors pair et une entreprise formidable qui offre des produits de qualité et qui a à cœur la réussite des producteurs agricoles. J’ai eu la piqûre pour ce métier !

C’est le meilleur des deux mondes pour moi. J’ai l’opportunité de travailler en agriculture, non seulement sur une ferme, mais sur toutes les fermes présentent sur mon territoire. Wow ! Je peux ajouter mon grain de sel à chacune d’entre elles et grandir avec elles au fil du temps. Je n’ai pas hésité lorsque Daniel Hêtu m’a offert un poste à temps plein en tant que conseillère en production laitière et végétale chez Agri-Solutions. J’adore travailler avec les producteurs pour les aider à faire croître leur entreprise. Mon objectif premier est de fournir le matériel nécessaire pour optimiser la rentabilité de leur compagnie en travaillant avec mon équipe solide et mes outils à la fine pointe de la technologie. Ma passion pour l’agriculture ne cesse de grandir chaque jour !

Au plaisir de travailler ensemble ! »

KARINE LANTAGNE
directrice des opérations

« Suite à mon retour en région, en 2018, Daniel m’a approché avec un beau projet ; ouvrir un magasin de nourriture et d’accessoires pour animaux. J’ai sauté sur l’opportunité de vivre une nouvelle aventure ainsi que de changer de branche pour partir du domaine de la construction et me recycler dans le domaine animalier. C’est là qu’est née notre boutique Compagnon. Mon sens du leadership, de l’organisation, mon expérience d’analyste et de gestion des achats m’ont permis de créer, avec l’aide d’une formidable équipe, une boutique qui donne un service de qualité. Je suis très fière de notre accomplissement. »

STÉPHANIE BOUCHARD
gérante

Passionné du domaine animalier, avec une soif d’apprendre, me joindre à l’équipe d’Agri-Solutions|Compagnon était pour moi un choix naturel. Je suis heureuse de vous partager mes connaissances, vous conseiller et vous offrir un bon service client.

MÉGAN HUDON
conseillère service-client

Étant reconnue depuis ma tendre enfance pour mon amour inconditionnel des animaux, je ne pouvais imaginer mon emploi-étudiant ailleurs qu’au sein de la merveilleuse équipe Agri-Solutions|Compagnon. Étudiante à l’université de Chicoutimi, cavalière dans l’âme et propriétaire de quelques petites bêtes poilues, je me passionne de conseiller et de partager mes connaissances dans le domaine animalier. Aller au travail, c’est pour moi un moment agréable, passé avec des collègues incroyables et une clientèle en or.
Agri-Solutions|Compagnon c’est une entreprise, mais pour moi, c’est une famille! Au plaisir de vous rencontrer et de vous joindre à notre famille!

Nous sommes Votre référence pour les poules, poussins, accessoires et nourriture pour volaille. Profitez de la formation sur les poules en collaboration avec Poules en ville.

En promotion

Voir toutes les promotions

Norpur vous offre des gâteries saines et délicieuses pour votre chien!

Fabriquées par nos experts avec un seul ingrédient sain et 100% naturel, nos friandises santé pour chien sont cuites au four à partir de parties fraiches. Notre chaine de production est approvisionnée hebdomadairement par des producteurs canadiens ce qui vous garantie une qualité incomparable. Ces récompenses pour chien sont nutritives et offrent un apport optimal en protéines, en nutriments essentiels mais aussi en matières grasses, dont les acides gras oméga-3 et oméga-6. En plus de satisfaire le désir de mâcher de vos amis, la consommation de gâteries Norpur contribue à leur hygiène dentaire en participant au nettoyage de leurs dents.

De plus, nos produits sont emballés dans des sachets faciles à refermer qui permettent de préserver la qualité et la fraicheur pour un plaisir durable.

Accueil

Exceptionnellement bien située dans la technopole agroalimentaire de la ville de Saint-Hyacinthe, NUTRANIA Inc., fondée en 2005, se veut d’être l’Alternative naturelle en nutrition animale au Canada & en Amérique du Nord.

LES MOULÉES BELLIFRANCE
PROFESSIONNELS DE L’ALIMENTATION ANIMALE
UNE ENTREPRISE FAMILIALE
PRÈS DES PRODUCTEURS ET
DES ANIMAUX

Les Moulées Bellifrance, c’est l’histoire d’une famille d’agriculteurs passionnés par les animaux qui se spécialise dans l’alimentation laitière, équine et celle des petits élevages, depuis 2005. Au fil des ans, notre entreprise s’est taillé une place de choix dans l’industrie de la nutrition animale grâce à une approche globale qui propose des solutions novatrices et efficaces aux fermes de partout au Québec.

Chez nous, commerce et agriculture vont de pair : nous faisons équipe avec les producteurs agricoles en offrant des services personnalisés et des produits de qualité adaptés à tous les cycles de la production animale.

Entrez dans l’univers de l’Équipe Lafrance, une famille qui cultive le succès depuis cinq générations.


DÉCOUVRIR NOTRE HISTOIRE
DÉCOUVREZ NOS
PRODUITS DE
NUTRITION ANIMALE

En magasin comme à la ferme, notre équipe répond à vos questions en matière d’alimentation animale et vous accompagne vers l’atteinte de vos objectifs d’élevage. Explorez notre vaste gamme de moulées Purina et de suppléments alimentaires pour toutes les espèces d’animaux : vaches laitières, chevaux, alpagas, moutons, chèvres, poules pondeuses et animaux de compagnie.

VACHES LAITIÈRES
CHEVAUX
PETITS ÉLEVAGES
ÉVÈNEMENTS AGRICOLES

Faites la connaissance de notre équipe de professionnels en alimentation animale en participant aux différents évènements agricoles prévus à l’horaire.

Il n’y a rien comme le contact humain… sauf peut-être celui avec les animaux!

CONSULTER LES ÉVÈNEMENTS
À LA RECHERCHE D’UN
NOUVEAU DÉFI?
REJOIGNEZ NOS RANGS!

Travailler chez Les Moulées Bellifrance, c’est l’occasion de faire partie d’une équipe dynamique et de rencontrer des clients fort sympathiques. Rejoignez notre famille pour évoluer dans un environnement stimulant, toujours axé sur des valeurs humaines. En prime, vous profiterez d’une foule d’avantages sociaux.

Farmer Brown
Brown's Milk Replacer

Brown's Feeds is a family run business going back two generations. It all started when the Brown family was feeding over 400 calves per day and decided to formulate and produce a milk replacer. The desire to produce a formula that suited our needs brought forward innovations to use coconut oil and 100% milk protein. Once word spread, neighbours and locals could not keep their hands off. Today, Brown's Milk Replacer is sold across Western Canada. We are proud to provide our community with high quality milk replacers.


More Info!
Brands Available from Hi-Brow Distribution
Horse Feed and Tack

From horse feed to horse tack. We stock the supplies you will need for basic horse care. Be sure to check out Purina horse feed and our Burwash horse halters and leads.

Pet Food and Toys

Products to keep our best friend feed and entertained. We carry Purina Pro Plan and Loyall dog and cat food. Don't forget to spoil them with our selection of treats and toys.

Chicken Feed and Supplies

Chickens are a great way to dip your toe into caring for livestock. Whether you are a seasoned veteran or brand new, we are sure to carry supplies you will need to have happy healthy chickens. From feeder to drinkers we have you covered.

Tofino Kelp Products
Our Indigenous-led team brings you delicious, premium kelp products that are organic, vegan-friendly, and hand harvested from the pristine coast of the Clayoquot Sound.
Shop Kelp
Umami-rich kelp flakes and seasonings

Being wild and fresh, we hand-process our kelp [husmin] immediately after harvest at our own facility right by the dock. From start to finish, these products are made by our team on a small-scale while packing a flavourful punch.

Our product stands out from the rest with bold, natural, delicious flavour you expect from a premium product.

Pair our Smoked Kelp Flakes with your favourite protein for a dimensional, smokey flavour, or use our Classic Kelp Seasoning as a salt alternative in your baking. The options are endless– sprinkle & enjoy!

Symrise Pet Food
Welcome to Symrise Pet Food – the global leader of sustainable high value solutions designed to improve pets’ well-being and enhance owners’ satisfaction.
Today, “pet parents” are more engaged in their companion animals’ lives than ever before. As they project their own preferences into shopping for pet products, they now expect more choices, quality, and enjoyment for these cherished members of the family.
At Symrise Pet Food, we support pet food manufacturers’ response to this evolving market demand with one ambition: to bring all pets a better life by being at the heart of every eating experience by 2030.
We offer ingredients
covering 3 essential aspects of pet food
Consider what’s essential in pleasing pets and their people. Then see how Symrise Pet Food helps manufacturers deliver it all: pet food palatability to ensure pets eat the food; pet nutrition to support animals’ good health; and pet food protection to keep the pet food safe, appealing, and enjoyable.
Here is how our solutions can work for you:

READ MORE

Pet food market

Our worldwide presence gives us unique access to the players and trends shaping markets in every region

Pet behaviors and preferences

Pet owners’ expectations

We gain real insights into owners’ perceptions and buying habits using data from an engaged global community at Yummypets

We are the pet food partner who supports you at every stage of product development.

Our Pledge

'Healthier Animals for Life'...It is our pledge and our heritage...

NOVIBIO is committed to improving the health, performance and well-being of animals. We provide animals with high-performing non-medicated natural feed additives. Our commitment and effort in this sector reflect Novibio's distinguished legacy of operating responsibly and creating value for society. Animal health, performance and animal welfare are the core of our commitment.

Become a Partner

LEARN MORE

Innovations

In search of excellence, the right product with proven benefits.

Our innovation process begins with a careful selection of the functional ingredients with unique features, a true process with state of the art in-vitro and in vivo models, and with understanding of the mode of action. With our nutritionists, veterinarians and feed experts we carry on extensive research efforts to develop tailor-made solutions with proven benefits by mastering microbiota and immunity.

Our rich collection of proprietary data allows us to develop proven and documented functional ingredients taking into account animal species’ diversity to overcome the increasing complexity of farming challenges.



Feed Technology

Feed Tech service : A complete service to support feed manufacturers. Whatever form of production you are using, there will be some challenges along the way. Species- or breed-specific issues, unforeseen challenges, on-site animal health situations or external factors can pose a problem. Whatever the cause, we are here to help.

Who We Are

Techna Vet Industries Inc. is a manufacturer and distributor of innovative pharmaceutical and nutraceutical products for the agriculture and pet industry. We are a company that is dedicated to formulating innovative products using unique formulations in conjunction with reputable laboratories from around the world. The development of these revolutionary products, will not only allow Techna Vet Industries Inc. to excel but also distinguish itself from other companies and their products in the agriculture and pet industry.

The reputation and partnerships that we have built over the years have helped the company develop and grow. We have expanded from Winnipeg to the international and global markets with product lines for companion pets to production animals. We focus on providing animals with the very best standard of living and overall heath. Through our various innovative and unique product lines, we have been able to provide our product users with many positive attributes including positive growth, optimum health, limitations of disease and limited digestive induced upsets. Techna Vet Industries Inc. uses only top quality ingredients, and conforms to the high pharmaceutical and manufacturing standards. This insures our customers are always buying, the very best.

With our growing team and infrastructure we are continually developing new and innovative products to promote the health and wellness of animals of all species.

Top Quality Products That Really Work
 COMPANION 
 EQUINE 
 PRODUCTION 
Mission Overview

Here at Techna Vet Industries Inc. we work hard to promote optimum health in animals. By developing unique and innovative products, along with our personable customer service we are able to work with you to help ensure your animal is healthy and happy. From companion, to equine to production animals, we have a product to fit their needs. With our continual focus on having the highest quality of products and with the highest quality ingredients our customers have seen limitations of disease and digestive upsets, positive growth and overall wellness in their animals. See for yourself, “The Animal Phenomenon”.

Proven Results
Testimonials
“
I purchased the Galozyme Equine Sport about a month ago and I'm very happy with the results so far. My ulcer prone TB is super shiny, happier in his disposition and absolutely LOVES the taste of the product. I add a scoop to his dry feed and he licks the bowl clean 🙂

I was previously using a different pre/probiotic and the results just can't compare to Galozyme. His gut is obviously feeling better, he has more energy to work and his topline looks amazing.

Thank you so much for not only a great product but for answering all my questions before I purchased. You have a new customer for life 🙂

CHRISTINE CHUDY AND VINCENT
Chudy.org
“
Hi there,

I bought your canine product on the first day of the Royal Manitoba Winter Fair in Brandon and must say that in the short time it has been since then, my 3 dogs have definitely been affected positively by your product. No more loose stools in any of them and no tear stains on my cocker spaniel! And the bladder infection that my chocolate lab puppy had is now gone with the help of both your product and some other medications. THANK YOU!!!!! I will definitely be re-ordering your product and my husband is still thinking about using it for some of our show cattle.

Thanks again for coming out to Brandon and answering our questions about the product. I am really happy with my choice to put my dogs on Galozyme® Canine.

TERESA BIRMINGHAM
“
Several months ago, we boarded a Thoroughbred gelding that was a nervous rack of skin and bones when we received him. We were told that the horse was a finicky eater and the owner couldn't keep weight on him. Over the course of the next 6 months, we tried an endless variety of different corn and grain rations and supplements on the horse. The horse did not pick up any condition over that timeframe, and in fact a veterinarian suggested that the horse be destroyed.

Then, we were introduced to Galozyme® Feed Supplement for Equine and decided to try if as a last ditch effort. We were told that it was not an overnight fix and it might take a while before we saw any results. It was recommended that we give the horse 2 tablespoons of product per day in his regular oat ration. By the end of week 1, we noticed that the horse was finishing his grain ration for the first time since we'd had him. Mid way through week 2, we noticed that the horse was beginning to look a lot brighter, was moving more freely in his stall, and his coat was starting to pick up a shine. By the beginning of week 3, something miraculous happened! When his handler opened the door of the box stall to feed him, the horse pushed the handler over, escaped out the open barn door, and went for a canter in our hay field. It was truly a shock and a wonderful surprise! Thereafter, the horse rapidly picked up condition, became less nervous, and even his coat grew in a shinier and thicker . . . in fact, he went home a few months later and looked like a brand new horse! Thank you, Techna Vet for saving a horse and teaching some old owners some new tricks. I would strongly recommend Techna Vet's product to any livestock or pet owners! (p.s. - and presently our nursing mares and foals are excelling on your product! We are lifelong customers!)

Sincerely,

DONNA VALEN, T.AG.
Field Services Manager
“
I have been using the Galozyme® Bovine product for 3 years now at Rainyridge Holsteins and now on our new farm Optimal Dairy. This product really is like none of its predecessors or competitors. We have used probiotic products before and none have satisfied us the way Galozyme® Bovine does. It has been a remarkable tool to use as a top dress in the ration for our donor animals we do embryo transfer on. It has consistently increased the number of embryos produced and especially aided by improving the quality of these embryos. Just recently we flushed three virgin heifers and averaged 22 embryos; well above the national average 0f 6. Perhaps the best use of this product has been in making ration changes in our dairy herd. One bag for 2-3 days during this key transition period has kept our milking cows on track with no production loss. Thanks so much Sav what a great product!
STEVEN B
Optimal Dairy/ Rainyridge Holsteins

At AD Aquaculture Nutrition Services Inc. (ADANS), we're pioneering new paths across the globe. We never stop innovating and pursuing excellence in delivering nutritional solutions that cater to the ever-evolving needs of the aquaculture feed market.

Contact Us
We Face The Challenges Of Tomorrow, Today

The global aquaculture feed market is a dynamic and crucial sector that drives the sustainable growth of aquatic food resources. Challenges like environmental sustainability, finite resource efficiency, and nutritional optimization, demand advanced, scientific solutions.

​

ADANS is at the forefront of addressing these challenges, offering state-of-the-art nutritional services and products backed by cutting-edge statistical analysis and data analytics.

Learn More About ADANS
We Deliver Data-Driven, Sustainable Solutions

We specialize in a range of services including feed formulation, ingredient assessment, and cutting-edge research and development. We also provide comprehensive consulting and training in aquaculture nutrition.

Learn More About Our Services
Choose ADANS for Your Aquaculture Nutrition Needs

Choosing ADANS means partnering with a leader in aquaculture nutrition services. We bring to the table the expert insights of Dr. André Dumas, our founder and a renowned figure in the industry. Our unique approach to shadow pricing, robust data analytics, and commitment to scientific excellence set us apart.

​

​Got questions? We have answers or will find them for you.

AGRO-BIO CONTRÔLE INC.

FONDÉE EN 1987

DEPUIS MAI 2015, L'ENTREPRISE OCCUPE DE NOUVELLES INSTALLATIONS DE PRODUCTION À SAINT-HYACINTHE AU QUÉBEC. GRÂCE À CETTE TOUTE NOUVELLE USINE, AGRO-BIO CONTRÔLE S'EST DOTÉE D'UNE CAPACITÉ DE PRODUCTION ULTRA MODERNE ET RESPECTUEUSE DE L'ENVIRONNEMENT.

Agro-Bio Contrôle a reçu la certification LEED CertifiéTM pour la construction de son bâtiment. Le projet de l'entreprise a été reconnu notamment pour sa performance quant à l'optimisation de la performance énergétique (géothermie), l'utilisation de matériaux régionaux et l'aménagement écologique du site (maximisation des espaces verts, gestion des eaux pluviales, protection des habitats).

Agro-Bio Contrôle inc. est une entreprise innovante qui œuvre dans les secteurs agricoles, acéricoles, agroalimentaires et industriels. Elle offre à sa clientèle un vaste choix de mélanges personnalisés d’acides organiques, en plus de fabriquer des additifs qui empêchent le développement de micro-organismes nuisibles dans les aliments destinés au bétail et à la volaille.

Dans le secteur agricoles, Agro-Bio Contrôle inc. se spécialise dans le développement d’acidifiants liquides et microgranulaires pour les aliments du bétail et de l’eau d’abreuvement. L’entreprise propose une gamme de produits – des inhibiteurs de moisissures – qui assurent une meilleure conservation des moulées et des fourrages. L’ajout de ses produits aux aliments assure aux animaux une croissance et performance optimale.

En acériculture, Agro-Bio Contrôle propose de produits pour le nettoyage des pannes d’évaporateur. L'Acericlean est une solution durable qui ne contient aucun phosphore et qui est 100% biodégradable.

Avec ses installations à la fine pointe de la technologie, Agro-Bio Contrôle peut répondre à tous les besoins d’approvisionnement en divers acides (acides de grade alimentaire, propylène glycol 96% avec inhibiteur de corrosion, acide acétique glacial) des entreprises agroalimentaires et industrielles. Elle offre également des produits désinfectants pour le nettoyage des laiteries et des équipements de transformation alimentaire.

Dans le secteur agroalimentaire, sur les viandes et la volaille, les fruits et les légumes, l'entreprise propose une solution antimicrobienne à base d'acide peracétique autorisée par un organisme de contrôle certification biologique canadien. 





INNOVER À TRAVERS UNE CHIMIE À FAIBLE EMPREINTE ÉCOLOGIQUE.
MISSION

Développer et fabriquer des produits innovateurs qui assurent le contrôle des micro-organismes nuisibles en agriculture et en agro-alimentaire à travers des solutions développées en synergie avec notre clientèle.

VISION

Être l'entreprise canadienne la plus dédiée dans sa quête de connaissances afin d'obtenir le meilleur de la nature à travers des solutions à faible empreinte environnementale.

VALEURS

Partenariat:
Collaborer constamment avec nos clients dans un objectif de progrès mutuel.

Intégrité:
Toujours offrir des produits de haute qualité à un prix juste et équitable.

 Travail d'équipe:
Former une équipe à l'interne pour mieux faire équipe avec nos clients.

© 2025 Agro-Bio Contrôle | Conception : Pika Design

Our Founding Story

WellyTails was born from John Leveris's passion for animal health and welfare since growing up on a dairy farm with multiple pet cats and dogs.


After losing a cherished poodle in the 2007 pet food melamine contamination scandal, he investigated the pet foods and supplements industry and learned that caring pet parents were being extensively duped into buying inferior products by slick marketing.


John holds an Animal Nutrition & Genetics degree from the University of Guelph. He leverages his experience, research journals, and the expertise of fellow pet health industry professionals to craft super premium supplements and Simply-Add-Meat homemade pet food mixes.


Gladys Galeano has always had pet dogs in her life and holds a degree in microbiology. Her expertise ensures ingredients, production operations and finished product quality are always at the highest level.


Our family company’s driven mission is about your pet's well-being as inspired by John's lifelong commitment.

Qui est Nuvac Eco-Science?

Nuvac Eco-Science inc possède une expertise de plus de 17 ans et travaille en association avec plusieurs universités et collèges dans le but de certifier la performance de leurs produits.

Nuvac Eco-Science inc. est une entreprise spécialisée dans le développement de produits à base de bactéries et d’enzymes utilisées en agriculture (fertilisation des sols et traitements des lisiers), en santé animal (additif alimentaire et produits de soins de santé) ainsi que pour le traitement des eaux usées municipales.

Nos produits sont reconnus respectueux de l’environnement et sécuritaires pour l’humain par le gouvernement canadien.

AVEMAR™

Certified as a Dietary Supplement for Cancer Patients in the European Union
View Certificate

Our Mission

At Avemar™, we believe that oncological and auto-immune patients deserve the ability to lead the lifestyle they desire. To this end, we provide a natural, clinically proven and highly effective nutritional supplement that can improve patient’s quality of life. For ease and convenience, we make our dietary supplement available in both granulate and film-coated tablets.



What is AVEMAR™?

Avemar™is an effective dietary supplement for patients with cancer and auto-immune deficiencies. Our product has been successfully tested through rigorous clinical studies. We are proud to offer patients an all-natural supplement to support their ongoing treatments. Medical experts recommend Avemar™ as a useful complement to the diets of patients undergoing various forms of cancer therapy and immunotherapy treatment.

Scientific studies have proven that Avemar™, when taken in conjunction with conventional cancer treatments, – radiation, chemotherapy, and immunotherapy – can improve the efficacy of these treaments. Routine intake of Avemar™ has been shown to have long-lasting positive impacts on quality of life for oncological patients.

	


	


How Does It Work?

Supports cell metabolic regulation

Reduces the Warburg Effect by regulating glucose metabolism at the cellular level.

Increases the immune system’s proficiency in identifying harmful cells for destruction.

Improves the immune system’s ability to find “foreign” and/or “unfriendly” cells.

These “foreign” invaders hide from the immune system’s Natural Killer (NK) cells utilizing a surface molecule called MHC-I.

MHC-I effectively shields foreign, harmful cells from NK cells by sending false, “friendly” messages.

Avemar™Pulvis serves to suppress MHC-I’s ability to shield foreign cells from detection, thereby increasing NK cell targeting and improving immune system purging.

Promotes immune system modulation.

Encourages physiological cellular and humoural (Th1/Th2) immune balance.

Improves T-cell response to antigen presentation.
Regulates and modulates the immune system’s white blood cells for peak performance, including T cells, B cells, NK cells, and macrophages.
Enhances B-cell activation and production of appropriate antibodies.
Increases macrophage function
AVEMAR™ NORTH AMERICA
Avemar™ is an effective dietary supplement for human and animal patients battling cancer and autoimmune deficiencies. It is an all-natural, clinically proven, original product that can positively impact a patient’s quality of life. Avemar™ has demonstrated the capacity to enhance the efficacy of conventional cancer treatments, including surgery, radiation, chemotherapy, and immunotherapy. In addition to being an effective cancer treatment for human patients, Avemar™ is an effective cancer treatment for dogs and an effective cancer treatment for cats. Authentic Avemar™ is available in stevia powder and tablets and has been shown to be safe and effective for patients with diabetes.

Intelligent nutrition solutions for protein producers to grow their business.

More science. More insight. More inspiration. More ways to sustainably achieve better results.

Let’s Do More Together

Pause
Intelligent Nutrition for Your Business

Global scientific research with local insights for your business.

Our global reach and inclusive culture mean we understand the complex challenges protein producers face around the globe, and we help apply those learnings locally. We consider the big picture and gain insight into the complexities of your operation and the world at large. Intelligent nutrition isn’t just about feeding healthy animals. It’s about feeding business. Feeding sustainability. Feeding future generations. We bring it all together to inspire producers to build the best version of their business. A business that works smarter.

Learn More About Partnering with NOVUS

Whether you’re working directly with us or partnering with us to deliver to your clients, our goal is the same, to be a true partner. Our devotion to our customers is unmatched. We go beyond products with comprehensive services designed to help customers elevate their operations.

Contact Us

Advanced Technology, Rooted in Scientific Research

Increased animal health and performance from innovative, scientifically proven products based on decades of leadership.

Poultry

Optimize your production and meet the growing worldwide demand for protein.

Swine

Innovative, science-based solutions built around the challenges you face every day.

Dairy

Our products and programs are designed to optimize your herd throughout lactation.

Commitment to Sustainable Solutions

Sustainability is one of our top priorities. We believe we have a social, environmental, and economic obligation to deliver products, services, and programs that ensure a sustainable future for all of us.

Learn how we drive sustainability

Commitment to Innovation

Innovation is at our core. As scientists and entrepreneurs, we’re driven to create new ideas that improve the health of your animals and your business.

Trouw Nutrition Canada was formed in 2017 following the integration of Shur-Gain, Landmark Feeds, Hi-Pro Feeds, and Nutreco’s combined animal nutrition businesses in Canada.

Through our combined knowledge and ability to create value together for our customers, Trouw Nutrition Canada continues to be a leader in animal nutrition employing 1,450 professionals nationwide.

Need Help Caring for Your Dog?

We offer dog training, doggie daycare, and boarding.

We're Here

Chasin’ Tails is an award-winning Calgary dog care facility on Centre Avenue East right next to the Barlow Trail Animal Hospital. We offer open care boarding and private kenneling with trained staff on the premises around the clock. Our doggie daycare is available from early to late (5:30 AM – 9:00 PM) every day except Christmas. The Free Play option is available without a reservation, as is nail trimming (weekdays 10:00 AM – 1:00 PM). Other grooming services, including bath & brush services, clipping, hair dyeing, and more, are available by appointment.

We offer discounts on our doggie daycare and boarding for First Responders (law enforcement officers, paramedics, EMT’s, firefighters and military).

We’re glad you’re here – and so is your horse!

Stud Muffins® Horse Treats are 100% hand-crafted – every batch is made with care and devotion to produce the ‘ultimate horse treat’ for your equine herd, whether you have 1 or 100.

We’ve been making our treats since 1997; each treat contains grains such as wheat, oats, barley, and corn, and are fortified with flaxseed and other wholesome ingredients, ensuring they’re as healthy as they are enjoyable. Horses go crazy for them!

New Muffin Tops

Stud Muffins is proud to introduce our newest product: MUFFIN TOPS… The treat both you and your horse will get a kick out of! Designed with fun in mind, these treats are humorously decorated , are 100% edible , and taste just as amazing as all of our other products! Muffin Tops will be available for purchase as a 6 pack in a clear tube or as a large 4 oz cookie wrapped in cello.

Of course, Stud Muffins Horse Treats are available in our regular non-holiday tubs and packages, for easy storage in your barn, vehicle, or home. Click the ‘Buy Now’ tab above to find our current list of retailers. If you can’t find our treats in your area, please let us know!

Shop At A & D Bird Seed & Country Store


We are easily found on Airport Road, just south of the town of Stayner Ontario. Our street address is at 1617 County Road 42 Stayner, Ontario Canada.

We offer "fresh from the farm" quality seeds that are localy grown, mixed with absolutly no fillers, and cleaned right here at our farm. What makes A & D Bird Seed so special is that our mixes are thoroughly cleaned before packaging. This insures there are no unwanted dirt, dust, and seed hulls. The entire process is supervised and handled by one of the birding technicians in the Wyant family. All of us here at A & D Bird Seed take pride in our products.

Started in 1992, to complement the Wyant Family's farming business. The bird seed business started to grow out of the nest so a small retail store was built. In 1997 Allen and Dwayne started to create their own line of bird feeders and houses. As of today we have made 27 different custom bird mixes for ourselves in our retail store and our wholesalers.

A & D Bird Seed is your source for your seeds, seed mixes, feeders and bird houses.

Call, email or visit us for products and pricing next time you need bird seed.

Check out some of these birds you might find around your area. Just click the image to find out more.

You are visitor: 

Home          About Us          Seed Products          Bird Feeders          FAQ's            Contact Us            News        Photos       




"We Grow - You Save!"

PLEASE NOTE: We accept CASH, CHEQUE (with proper I.D.) or IN PERSON eTransfer

     Barry & Marlene and Brad, the Bogles, warmly welcome you to our website. We hope you'll spend a few relaxing moments to get familiar with our products and services. Be sure and come out to visit our country farm and experience our quiet country setting. Bogle Seeds Farm is located in Flamborough, an area municipality now part of the City of Hamilton Ontario. You can observe how our wild bird seed (wild birdfeed) mixes are processed, have a friendly chat and take some of our products home with you for your feathered friends.

      Six generations have been farming at this location since 1874, beginning with mixed farming, bee keeping and potato, millet and pedigreed seed production. In 1970, we became the first to commercially grow sunflowers in Ontario. At present, we market most of our 250 acres of various grain crops through our retail farm store. In our area it has become a very popular activity to provide wild bird feed to help the birds find suitable nutrition.

     We are the largest continuous grower of sunflowers in Ontario Canada, selling our 75 acre crop through this retail/wholesale farm business.

Pet Care at a Higher Standard

To provide the highest level of pet care, we pride ourselves on our ongoing commitment to safety and customized approach to pet care.

We utilize the most up to date pet care systems, including our hospital grade air filtration and centralized disinfecting system for our guests to enjoy an active day in a healthy environment.

Our well-trained staff ensure and encourage active but safe play.

Additionally, we provide:

Additional care packages to customize your pets stay, including birthday parties, yummy treats and pampering spa services to make your pet’s stay extra special.

Three indoor large play areas, equipped to provide exercise, socialization and mental stimulation to meet all your dog’s needs!

We can't wait to hear from you! Call us at 516-368-0364, text us at (844) 844-2807, or email us at info@bestinshowpetresort.com

ABOUT MIRAMICHI FEEDS

Locally owned and operated since 1992, Miramichi Feeds produces and sells high quality agricultural supplies from their Miramichi location.

The folks at Miramichi Feeds know farming and pride themselves on having knowledgeable staff ready to offer expert recommendations along with quality customer service.

The offer over 1700 products including pet and livestock feed, lawn seed, gardening and farming supplies and utensils and horse tack supplies.

A few of the brand names we carry are ProSeries Pet feeds, Gallagher Fencing, Eastern Embers, Blue Seal Feeds, Miraco Livestock Water Systems, Scotts, Pro-Mix and more.

St. Jean's Cannery & Smokehouse
What Seafood Should Be

St. Jean’s Cannery & Smokehouse has been mastering the art of West Coast seafood since 1961, back when Armand St. Jean first fired up the smoker. Still proudly carrying on the family tradition—and now owned by the Nuu-chah-nulth Tribal Council—we’ve kept the legacy alive while staying ahead of the tide.

From perfectly smoked wild salmon to our famous canned seafood, we don’t just preserve the flavors of the coast—we celebrate them. Sustainable? Always. Delicious? Absolutely. It’s all about bringing the best of the sea to your table, one bite at a time.

A Canadian Seafood Success Story
Established on Vancouver Island in 1961

From Quebec to Yukon to British Columbia, Armand St. Jean crossed the country to establish the seafood enterprise of his dreams. As one of the last seafood canneries left standing, we’re proud to continue the St. Jean legacy today.

Seafood For Your Pets
Nature's Best Food from Canada's West Coast

After crafting gourmet wild seafood products for seafood fans for more than 60 years, we had a ‘Eureka!’ moment: our pets deserve the outstanding flavour and nutrition from wild seafood, too!

This notion gave birth to Healthy Shores, the new pet food division of St. Jean’s Cannery. Just like the seafood for our human friends, the seafood ingredients for our pets are locally-sourced, Ocean Wise-recommended for sustainability, and traceable back to the fisher who caught them.

À propos
La Meunerie Benjamin À votre service depuis 1979

La Meunerie Benjamin, une entreprise familiale située à St-Césaire en Montérégie, est devenue au fil des ans, grâce à des installations modernes et une gamme de produits et services variés, un centre de fabrication et de distribution alimentaire pour animaux d’élevage des plus complets. En fabricant la plupart de nos produits sur place, nous sommes à même de les personnaliser au maximum et de vous offrir des prix hautement compétitifs. Pour vos achats en petites ou grandes quantités, vous êtes toujours assurés d’obtenir un produit de qualité supérieure et toute l’attention que vous méritez.

Une meunerie accréditée HACCP

La Meunerie Benjamin est fière de participer au programme canadien HACCP, qui permet d’évaluer, de corriger et de prévenir les dangers tout au long du processus de fabrication. L’accréditation est un gage de qualité et ce, sans compromis.

Prairie Micro Tech Inc. has been serving the domestic and international feed and livestock industries since 1980.

Our History

 

Started in 1980 PMT is family owned and operated business steeped in Canadian history. With deep prairie roots our goal was to provide Western Canada with quality micro premixes.  It quickly became apparent that the industry had other needs and PMT quickly became known as the “one stop shop” manufacturing a full line of Milk Replacers and representing/distributing quality products from all over the world. As our root grew as we launched our Milk Replacer facility in Kitchener, Ontario.  Soon after we planted ourselves in Abbotsford, BC expanding our Vitamin Premix business while growing an off shoot office and distribution network in Asia Pacific.

In 1992 PMT launched Essentials Inc. in Abbotsford, BC as another strategic addition to provide the industry with consistent, reliable flavours and sweeteners addressing palatability issues and providing locally grown solutions manufactured right here in Canada. Together we create, manufacture and sell our flavours and sweeteners across Canada, across the border and across the sea.

Our roots are deep have reached from coast to coast with a passion for innovation, customer satisfaction and quality. We have successfully partnered with our customer and suppliers for over 40 years helping animals reach their fullest potential!

Prairie Micro-tech Inc.

PMT is a family owned and operated business steeped in Canadian history providing the Canadian Feed Industry with our branded Wet NurseTM milk replacer and consultant formulations and private label milk replacers, our exclusive WeatherguardTM Minerals, along with proactive immunity products and value added feed ingredients. PMT also has the only Canadian made and manufactured flavours and Sweeteners available in the market.

Read More

Essentials Inc. was created as a result of PMT’s vision to satisfy the industry’s feed palatability and special product needs. We are the first canadian feed flavour house specially equipped to formulate and manufacture solutions to your nutritional and consumption challenges. With the work of our Senior Flavourist we have created an extensive line of Essence flavouring and Palatability Enhancers along with Sweetener Intensifiers.

Bienvenue chez CaniPro

Fabricant de nourriture crue pour chien et chat | Viande crue

CaniPro est un fabricant de nourriture crue pour chiens et chats. Nous opérons dans une usine 100% réfrigéré situé à Ange Gardien. Tous nos produits sont fabriqués avec des viandes comestible destiné à la consommation humaine.

Nos produits de viandes crue:

Nous offrons plusieurs produits tel que des recettes 100% complètes et équilibrés rejoignant les normes de l'AAFCO, des mixtes de base, gâteries, os à gruger, suppléments ect...

Notre engagement via la qualitée de nos produits de viandes crue:

Chez CaniPro, notre priorité est la santé des animaux. Si nous pouvons vous faire une promesse, c'est que la qualité de nos produits sera toujours à son meilleur. Les chiens et chats ne peuvent malheureusement pas choisir ce qu'ils mangent. Ils ont une confiance aveugle en nous, alors par amour pour nos amis les animaux, c'est à nous de leur offrir ce qui a de mieux pour eux.

Pitou

Si vous êtes attentif aux produits sains et naturels pour vous et votre famille, il est normal qu’il en soit de même pour votre chien préféré. De la nutrition aux accessoires, tout y est en un seul endroit.

PARCOURIR NOS PRODUITS ET ACCESSOIRES
PARCOURIR NOS PRODUITS ET ACCESSOIRES
Minou

Votre quête de produits sains et naturels pour votre famille s’étend naturellement à votre félin bien-aimé. De la nourriture aux jouets en passant par une foule d’accessoires, trouvez tout pour votre chat.

DÉCOUVRIR LA NOURRITURE ET JOUETS
DÉCOUVRIR LA NOURRITURE ET JOUETS
Compagnons

Les petits animaux font désormais partie intégrante de la famille et méritent les meilleurs soins. Découvrez notre gamme de produits et accessoires pour vos animaux à poils, volants ou rampants.

CAGES, ACCESSOIRES ET PLUS…
CAGES, ACCESSOIRES ET PLUS…

Annick, Scotch, Whiskey & Clicquot | Succ. Ahuntsic

Au cœur de Pitou Minou & Compagnons se trouvent un profond dévouement à la santé et au bonheur des animaux de compagnie.

Nous proposons une vaste sélection de produits de première qualité, méticuleusement choisis pour répondre aux divers besoins des animaux de compagnie, qu’il s’agisse de régimes alimentaires spécialisés, de jouets enrichissants ou d’accessoires des plus utiles. Chaque article est conforme à nos normes de qualité rigoureuses, garantissant ce qu’il y a de mieux pour nos amis à poils, à plumes ou à écailles.

Cependant, notre mission va bien au-delà de la simple offre de produits. Nous comprenons que le bien-être d’un animal de compagnie ne se résume pas à des biens matériels. C’est pourquoi nous proposons une multitude de ressources éducatives, des FAQ en ligne aux articles d’experts, en passant par les conseils dispensés en magasin par un personnel bien informé. Notre équipe d’employés dévoués offre des conseils, une orientation et un soutien sur toutes les facettes des soins aux animaux, de la nutrition et du dressage à la santé et au comportement.

Les franchises locales de Pitou Minou & Compagnons sont plus qu’une boutique de quartier…

Elles sont un centre d’engagement communautaire. Elles organisent individuellement un certain nombre d’activités et prônent l’adoption responsable et le renforcement des liens entre les animaux de compagnie et leurs familles. Tous nos établissements offrent un environnement accueillant pour les animaux de compagnie, ce qui contribue à créer une communauté dynamique et à favoriser le bien-être des animaux à tous les niveaux.

Les pratiques éthiques font partie intégrante de notre philosophie. Nous défendons l’approvisionnement responsable en animaux de compagnie, l’adoption plutôt que l’élevage commercial et les droits des animaux. Notre engagement en faveur du développement durable nous pousse à proposer des produits respectueux de l’environnement et à promouvoir des pratiques écologiques auprès des propriétaires d’animaux de compagnie.

« Nous ne recommandons que des produits que nous donnerions à manger à nos propres animaux de compagnie. »

Richard Bégin, fondateur de
Pitou Minou et Compagnons.

Mireille & Bingo | Succ. Aylmer

Valeurs
avant tout

Nous regardons attentivement les ingrédients des aliments pour animaux afin de nous assurer qu’ils soient sains et naturels. Nous ne vendons pas de produits alimentaires dont nous ne pouvons certifier la qualité des ingrédients. Vous pouvez être assuré que peu importe le produit alimentaire que vous trouverez chez Pitou Minou & Compagnons, celui-ci contiendra seulement des aliments sains et naturels. Pour nous, la qualité de la nourriture pour animaux est la priorité.

Axé sur les
ingrédients

Nous nous faisons un point d’honneur de choisir chacun des produits que nous vendons pour ses ingrédients et non pour sa marque. Nous évitons les marques populaires qu’on retrouve à l’épicerie car elles comportent des ingrédients pouvant nuire au bien-être des animaux. De plus, la majorité des produits vendus dans les succursales Pitou Minou & Compagnons sont fabriqués au Canada afin de nous assurer d’une qualité de produit supérieure et fiable.

Expertise
en nutrition

La nutrition joue un très grand rôle au niveau de la santé et du bien-être des animaux. Tous nos employés suivent une formation pour devenir des experts en nutrition animale. Tout comme chez l’humain, les animaux peuvent avoir certaines conditions ou maladies nécessitant une attention particulière. Notre équipe d’experts en nutrition animale pourra vous guider vers le produit qui conviendra le mieux à votre animal selon ses besoins spécifiques.

Mission
qualité

Notre mission est de promouvoir des produits alimentaires sains et naturels pour les animaux de compagnie, et ce, à travers tout le Québec. Nous souhaitons que chaque propriétaire d’animaux puisse se procurer de la nourriture pour animaux de qualité, et dont les ingrédients sont bénéfiques pour leur chat ou leur chien. C’est pourquoi nous vendons, à travers le Québec, des produits rattachés à la bannière Global Pet Foods.

Formules médicales

Les formules médicales pour animaux de compagnie sont des produits formulés pour répondre à des besoins spécifiques en matière de régime alimentaire ou de santé des animaux de compagnie.

FORMULES MÉDICALES POUR CHIENS
FORMULES MÉDICALES POUR CHATS
Vous souhaitez acquérir une franchise et fonder votre propre entreprise?

Le succès de nos franchisés est indéniable : nous misons sur l’accompagnement personnalisé, la formation et la force de notre réseau pour faciliter leur rentabilité. Acheter une franchise Pitou Minou & Compagnons, c’est choisir un projet abordable et rentable.

TOUT SAVOIR SUR NOS FRANCHISES

The Science of Knowing™
Monitor your cat's health at home with the help of Blücare®
Health Monitoring

Blücare develops and produces feline health tools for veterinarians and cat parents. Our tests help detect early signs of diseases in cats by tracking biomarkers with great accuracy.

The Blücare® Technology
Blood and glucose can be indicators of feline urinary tract diseases and feline diabetes. Blücare granules are biomarker detection tools that allow you to detect blood and/or glucose in your cat's urine, even at low levels.
White

The test is negative for blood and/or for glucose in your cat's urine. There are no indicators of disease detectable by our granules.

Light Blue (Or Green)

Very small amounts of blood or glucose may be present in the urine. Monitor your cat for the next 24 to 48 hours. If your cat's behavior is unusual and/or you still notice a bluish discoloration, contact your veterinarian.

Blue

The granules have detected blood and/or glucose in your cat's urine. It's advisable to contact your veterinarian.

Approved by Veterinarians

We work with a team of seasoned veterinarians from North America and Europe to ensure scienfitic rigor in the development and production of our products. All of our products are studied and approved internally and externally.
